yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butno jɨk taŋakwan kɨmot kɨmotno noman taŋ naban nandɨsat. Do ji ɨdon Piŋkop do nandaŋek egɨpni.”
Aŋek uŋun do nandaŋ kokwin aŋek egɨpgwit. Amɨn Tagɨ dakon tapmɨm taŋ ɨmgut, do yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun monjɨ tagaŋek niaŋ amɨn kɨnda egɨpdɨsak?”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek guramɨkgaŋ uŋun meŋno ae padɨk padɨknoni.”
Stiwen saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Kalɨp babɨknin mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon egɨpgwit bɨsapmon Piŋkop dakon ɨmal yutni taŋ yomgut. Yut uŋun da taŋakwan Piŋkop babɨknin gat egɨpgwit dakon tɨlak agɨt. Ɨmal yut uŋun awit Piŋkop da Moses yaŋ ani yaŋ iyɨgɨt uŋun da tɨlagon awit.
“Yaŋ iyɨko Pol yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak Sisa da geno nandɨsak do nandɨsat. Do ɨdon dam tebanon egapbo don nepbɨ Sisakon kɨkeŋ.’ Yaŋ yagɨt do dam tebanon sigɨn egɨpjak do yaŋ dagagɨm. Uŋudon egakwan Sisakon kɨgɨk dakon kosit aŋnoman aŋek don yɨpbo kɨsak.”
amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨ ae dɨwarɨ yokwi yaŋ nandaŋ yaŋ asak. Yaŋ aŋek ji kokwin amɨn dagaŋek nandak nandak yokwikon da kokwin aŋ.
Ji yaŋ nandani. Yut kɨnda dakon ami kalbi kabo noknok ni bɨsapmon apjak yaŋ nandagɨt tam, kɨla aŋakwan arɨpmɨ dɨma tuwɨlban.
Awa, kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun Ken dakon aŋpak aŋ. Uŋun Balam da agɨt uŋudeŋ moneŋ tɨmɨt do tek kɨndap aŋ. Uŋun Kora da agɨt uŋudeŋ Piŋkop kwen wɨgɨk aŋ ɨmaŋ, do wagɨl pasɨldaŋ.
Amɨn morap Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdoŋ. Mani amɨn morap Monjɨ dakon gen dɨma guramɨkgaŋ uŋun amɨn egɨp egɨp dɨma abɨdoni. Piŋkop dakon butjapni uŋun amɨnon toktogɨsi tosok.”
Pɨŋakwan nak uŋungwan wɨsɨŋek bɨt kɨlapyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ pɨndakgɨm. Uŋungwan joŋ bɨt kɨlapyo, ae bɨrombak tuŋon amɨnyo, ae mɨnam amɨn da dɨma upmakbi uŋun kɨsi pɨndakgɨm.
Aŋakwan emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn da Yesu ɨŋamɨkon kɨmakban kaŋek yagɨt, “On amɨn asisi Piŋkop dakon Monji egɨpgut.”
Yaŋ yawit mani Sol dakon gen yogokni dakon tapmɨm saŋbeŋek madepsi tagagɨt. Aŋakwan Juda amɨn Damaskus egɨpgwit uŋun yoyɨŋ teŋteŋaŋek asisi Yesu uŋun Kristo yaŋ yoyɨgɨt. Yaŋ yaŋban gen kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma iyɨgɨ kawit.
Nin nandamaŋ, Kristo uŋun telagɨ yut amɨn kɨsit da awalbi ae Piŋkop dakon telagɨ yut bamɨsi dakon wupmɨ gɨn asak uŋungwan dɨma wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun Piŋkop da kapmatsisok altaŋ noman taŋek nin paŋpulugok do aŋek Kwen Kokupsi wɨgɨgɨt.
“Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
Ji yo morapji taŋ damaŋ uŋun yopba amɨn da yumaŋ noni. Yaŋ aba moneŋ tɨmɨgek yoni mɨni amɨn do yomni. Aŋek yo kabɨsi tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon paŋmuwuk yopba uŋudon tagɨsi tokdaŋ. Uŋun tamokon toni kaŋ, yo kabɨsi dɨma pasɨldaŋ, ae kabo noknok da dɨma tɨmɨtdaŋ, ae yo monɨŋ da dɨma nokdaŋ.
Buŋon Erodias da Jon aŋakba kɨmotjak uŋun dakon kosit kagɨt. Altok altok bɨsapnikon Erot da jap noknok ak do amɨn madep paŋmuwukgɨt. Gapman dakon pi amɨn madep ae emat amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨni ae Galili mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn kɨsi paŋmuwukgɨt.
Ae amɨn kɨnda da yɨkni ɨmegek kosit 1 kilomita kɨki do tebaisi gayɨsak kaŋ, yɨk uŋun ɨmegek 2 kilomita kɨki.
Mani Elaija kɨlɨ apgut, aban amɨn da dɨma kaŋba pɨsagɨt, do galaktokni yolek yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ ɨmgwit. Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋunyo kɨsi yo yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ gɨn aŋɨmdaŋ.”
Yaŋban iyɨgɨmal, “Tagɨ pandeŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋbal Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, tepmɨ pakdɨsat uŋun pakdamal.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Dɨma kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmni. Amɨn kɨnda nak dakon man yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ asak uŋun amɨn nikon da nak do yaŋba yokwi tok asak? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma.
Uŋudon egek bɨlak kapbɨ mudaŋakwan Pita kaŋ nandaŋyo ak do Jerusalem kɨko uŋun gat gɨldat 15 yaŋ egɨpgumak.
Abrahamon da wɨŋ Dewiron dagagɨt uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Dewiron da wɨŋ uwalni da tɨmɨk Babilon mɨktɨmon paŋkɨwit bɨsap uŋun babɨkni 14 kabɨ. Aŋakwan Babilon egɨpgwiron da wɨŋ Kristo altagɨt uŋun kɨsi babɨkni 14 kabɨ.
“Kalɨp Israel amɨn da Moses abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, ‘Namɨn da mibɨltok amɨn ae gen kokwin amɨnin manjɨŋ gepmak?’ Piŋkop da uŋun Moses naŋgɨn mibɨltok amɨni ae jɨgɨkon baŋ tɨmɨtjak amɨni yabek yomgut. Aŋelo kɨndap monɨŋon akgɨt uŋun da Piŋkop dakon gen abɨdaŋek Moses yabekgɨt.
Rom dakon aŋpagon yo dɨma aneŋ do gen teban tosok on amɨn bamot da amɨn uŋun tetgɨn ɨlɨk paŋgwamal.”
Mɨŋat amɨnyo burɨkon yoni mɨni uŋun nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ gɨn. Mani aŋpak Piŋkop da dabɨlon garagɨ tagɨ baŋ yolek Kristo dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun nandak nandakni kɨlegɨ mɨnisi. Nido, nandak nandakni gat butni gat Piŋkop da dabɨlon garagɨ tagɨ.
Piŋkop da iyɨ dakon Monji kaloŋɨ naŋ nin da egɨp egɨp uŋun obakon da abɨdoneŋ do yabekban mɨktɨmon pɨgɨt. Piŋkop yaŋ aŋek nin do but dasi galak taŋ nimɨsak uŋun nolɨgɨt.
Mani uŋun amɨn nandaŋ gadatsi aŋek Piŋkop do bɨsit asak. Nandaŋ gadatni tɨmɨsok dɨ yɨpmaŋ degek “Piŋkop da uŋun namdɨsak bo dɨma” yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak. Nido amɨn but bamot aŋ uŋun tap pakbi mɨrɨm da pɨsoŋakwan tamalɨkgaŋ uŋun yombem.
Nak yaŋ gayɨsat, mango uŋun Pita. Aŋakwan tɨp uŋun da kwenon paŋmuwukbi kabɨno paŋ- muwuk yopbo Tɨpdom dakon tapmɨm da arɨpmɨ dɨma pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan toktogɨsi taŋ aŋ aŋ kɨkdɨsak.
Yesu uŋun boron wɨgek pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do wɨgakwan amɨn morapmɨsi abɨŋ muwukgwit.
Mani Yesu uŋun mɨŋat kabɨ tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jerusalem dakon gwani, ji nak do kunam dɨma tatni. Dɨsi gat ae mɨŋat monjɨyosi gat do tatni.
Uŋun amɨn kapbɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, kɨŋ paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon mibɨlni yoyɨni. Aŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dakon gen dɨma nandɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yokwisi asak. Uŋun amɨn do Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn ae takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmni.
Amɨn da Piŋkop tebai wɨsɨŋ koni do aŋek uŋun agɨt. Mani Piŋkop dubagɨkon dɨma egɨsak. Kapmatjok nin da bɨkbɨgon egɨsak.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn da Yesu Judia yɨpmaŋek Galili abɨk uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek Yesukon kɨŋek monji sot aŋ palɨ kɨmot do agɨt uŋun aŋmɨlɨp asak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Mani amɨn dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Uŋun da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn aŋmɨlɨp aban sɨŋtagɨt. Yaŋ agɨt, do ae nido uŋun amɨn dɨma aŋpulugaŋakwan kɨmakgɨt?”
Not kabɨ, Piŋkop da Masadonia paŋmuwukbi do nandaŋ yawok yomɨŋek paŋpulugagɨt uŋun do dayɨkdɨsat.
Nak tepmɨsi abɨŋ dandak do nandɨsat, mani papiakon gen on ji do mandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandɨsat.
Muwugek yaŋ nandat morapmɨsi aŋek Pita da pɨdaŋ agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji kɨlɨ nandaŋ. Piŋkop da pi kokwinɨk nimɨŋek nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon yaŋapbo nandaŋek nandaŋ gadat ani do nak kɨlɨsok manjɨgɨt.
Nin kɨsi morap gulusuŋ morapmɨ amaŋ. Mani amɨn kɨnda gen kagani dakon kɨla aŋek gen yokwi kɨnda dɨma yosok kaŋ, uŋun amɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi, ae uŋun da gɨptɨm dɨwat morapni kɨsi kɨla tagɨ asak.
Aŋakwa Maria da gen uŋun nandaban yo madep aban nandaŋek egɨpgut.
Juda amɨn morapmɨ Yesu Betani kokupmon egɨsak yaŋ nandaŋek uŋudon apgwit. Yesu kok do gɨn dɨma, Lasarus kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdagɨt uŋunyo kɨsi kok do apgwit.
Geni uŋun nandaŋek Pol pɨdaŋ agek tayaŋgok yɨtni yaŋ do kɨsirɨ aŋenagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Israel amɨn ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ, ji Piŋkop gawak ɨmaŋ amɨn, nak do mɨrak yopni!
Kɨŋ Juda amɨn kɨnda kagɨt mani Akwila. Akwila uŋun Pontus mɨktɨmon nani kɨnda. Kɨlɨ yaŋgok mɨŋatni Prisila gat Itali mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek opgumal. Itali mɨktɨm mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yɨpmaŋek apgumal. Rom dakon kɨla amɨn madep Klodias da Juda amɨn kɨsi morap Rom kokup pap uŋun yɨpmaŋ kɨŋ mudoni do gen tebai yɨpgut. Pol uŋun amɨn wam pɨndat do kɨgɨt.
Uŋun wit dakon sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨt kɨndap kɨrɨŋni kɨsitnikon taŋakwan apdɨsak. Abɨŋek bamɨ kokwinɨk tamonikon yopmaŋek sɨbɨt sɨbɨt wɨrɨrɨk maban kɨndap kɨmot kɨmorɨ mɨni uŋudon sokdaŋ.”
“Amɨn da ji do Yesu dakon amɨn kabɨ yaŋ yaŋek yaŋba yokwi tok, ae top gen mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yaŋ damni, ae yokwiyo kɨsi aŋdamni kaŋ, ji kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.
Wɨsawɨsa do mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn gat da muwugek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do yaŋ dagok awit.
Yaŋ aban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep da kaŋ wurɨpdagek yawit, “On amɨn Dewit dakon monji bo?”
Lista kokup papmon amɨn kɨnda kandapmɨ alek taŋbi mibɨlɨkon gɨn yɨgek egɨpgut. Meŋi da yaŋ aŋalagɨt.
Gɨldat pɨgakwan pɨlɨndo sot amɨn gat koŋni toŋ amɨn gat kɨsisi Yesukon paŋpaŋ apgwit.
Yaŋdo, nak Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo iyɨ do manjɨgɨt paŋpulugokeŋ do butno aŋteban aŋek uŋun jɨgɨ morap pasat. Nak Yesu Kristo da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtjak do nandɨsat, ae uŋun gat kɨsi toktogɨsi tɨlɨmnikon egɨ wɨgɨni do nandɨsat.
Kɨŋ altaŋek wain gat pakbi ɨsipmɨ kɨnda mani mea gat ɨktagɨlek ɨmɨŋba nok do kurak tagɨt.
Ji Kristo do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek notji gawak yomɨŋ yomɨŋ aŋek egɨpni.
Nandani! Dat da yo dam do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun nak da jikon yabetdɨsat. Ji tepmɨ dɨma kɨŋek kokup papmon egakwa Piŋkop dakon tapmɨm Kwen Kokup da jikon pɨkdɨsak.”
Gɨldat kabi dɨ egɨ mudaŋek kɨla amɨn madep Agripa gat sami Benaisi gat Pestus kok do Sisaria kokupmon opgumal. Obɨŋek but galak gen iyɨŋek pi tamo on abɨdagɨl uŋun do nandando tagɨsi asak yaŋ iyɨgɨmal.
Amɨn da gɨldat wɨsak ae si pɨgɨsak tet, ae not tet ae saut tet da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak kokupmon abɨŋek jap noknok tamo madepmon yɨtdaŋ.
Bɨsit yaŋ aneŋ kaŋ uŋun tagɨsi. Piŋkop Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin uŋun da yaŋ aneŋ do tagɨsi nandɨsak.
Yesu da Lasarus aban pɨdaŋban kaŋek Juda amɨn morapmɨ da kɨla amɨni yopmaŋ degek Yesukon kɨŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋdo, mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da Lasarus kɨsi aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen paŋkosit awit.
Yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Gen yaŋ gamaŋ amɨn da abɨŋ altaŋakwa gengo don nandakeŋ.” Yaŋ iyɨŋek obip amɨni yoyɨŋban Pol kɨla amɨn madep Erot da kalɨp yut madep agɨt uŋudon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani ani do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban yo dɨ namdamal yaŋ nandaŋek tebai pɨndakgɨt.
Ji tebai agek egɨp egɨp bamɨsi abɨdoni.”
Stiwen yaŋ yaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, yokwini dakon kobogɨ dɨma yobi.” Stiwen yaŋ yaŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Kalɨp nak ji dakon aŋpak tagɨsi do Taitus iyɨŋek manji pawɨgɨgɨm. Ae geno uŋun do mayagɨ dɨma nandagɨm, nido ji dakon aŋpak do gen morap yagɨm uŋun bamɨsi gɨn. Gen morap dayɨgɨmaŋ uŋun bamɨ gɨn. Ae ji dakon man pawɨgek Taitus do gen uŋun yagɨm uŋun kɨsi bamɨsi gɨn.
Yaŋba Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok teŋteŋɨ ji gat egɨpjak. Pɨlɨn tuk tepmɨ apban kosit dɨma kokdaŋ, do abɨsok teŋteŋɨ taŋakwan gɨn teŋteŋɨkon agɨpni. Amɨn pɨlɨn tukgwan akwaŋ uŋun dukwan kwaŋ uŋun dɨma nandaŋ.
Aŋek Juda amɨn morapmɨsi da nandaŋ gadat awit. Ae Grik kɨla amɨn mɨŋat morapmɨ da nandaŋ gadat aŋakwa Grik wɨli morapmɨ uŋun kɨsi yaŋ gɨn awit.
“Amɨn kɨnda uŋun jap yetni pigaga paŋkɨ tɨŋtɨŋagɨt. Tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan jap yet dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba amɨn da bamaŋakwa mɨnam da abɨŋ si nawit.
Amɨn Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon gen nandaŋek butni dɨma pɨsoŋ uŋun jap yet kosiron mawit uŋuden. Yokwi Ami da abɨŋ gen tagɨ butnikon toŋ uŋun gwayeŋ paŋkɨsak.
Aban Yesu da yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, sakwabat yoni mɨni on da amɨn morap da paret yopmaŋ uŋun yapmaŋek moneŋ madepsi yopmaŋdak.
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨsit bamotni ae gekgekniyo yolɨŋban paŋdetni Amɨn Tagɨni kaŋek but galak madepsi nandawit.
Nido dɨsi nandaŋ, kalɨp babɨkji da mibɨlɨ mɨni dɨma nandaŋ pɨsaŋek egɨpgwit jiyo kɨsi yaŋgɨn egɨpgwit, mani Piŋkop da ji yumaŋ naŋek uŋun aŋpagon baŋ pulugaŋ depgut. Ae ji yum do mɨktɨm dakon yo si tasɨk togɨ silwa bo gol baŋ dɨma yumaŋ nagɨt.
Mani ji dɨsi dakon gen monɨŋ monɨŋ ae man ae gen tebanji do yoŋ. Nak uŋuden gen do gen pi ak do dɨma galak tosot. Dɨsi yaŋ paŋmɨlɨp abɨt.”
Not kabɨ, yaŋ do nandaŋek yosot. Bɨsap kɨlɨ kwaŋ tosok, do mɨŋatni toŋ amɨn uŋun mɨŋatni mɨni yombem da egek Yesu yol kɨmagek egɨpni.
Do uŋun Sunduk dakon pi amɨni kɨsi kulabɨk aŋek amɨn da aŋpak kɨlegɨ dakon pi amɨn yaŋ pɨndatni do topmon da pi ani kaŋ, ji uŋun do dɨma wurɨpdatni. Don pi awit uŋun da arɨpmonsi tomni yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Gen bamɨsi baŋ yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ, ae Piŋkop da tapmɨmon pi amaŋ. Nin emat dakon yo amɨn da kɨsit terɨ terɨ da tebai tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun da tɨlak aŋpak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek Piŋkop dakon pi amaŋ.
Piŋkop da ninyo kɨsi paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani. Bɨsit iyɨŋba Kristo dakon gen kalɨp pasɨlɨ tagɨt uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋoneŋ do Piŋkop da kosit yɨpmaŋ nimjak. Nin geni aŋteŋteŋ ano mɨŋat amɨnyo da dɨma galak taŋek dam tebanon nepgwit.
Uwal da kɨsiron yɨpyɨp amɨn da gen kɨnda kɨlɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda nak da mandaŋ noko kaŋ, uŋun amɨn naŋ tebai abɨdoni.”
Jap yet kwaŋek bamɨ tok do aŋakwa joŋ yokwi kɨsi kwaŋ wɨwit.
Aŋek yabekbi kabɨ da Yesu da kɨmoron da pɨdagɨt uŋun do tapmɨmɨ toŋsi sigɨn yaŋ teŋteŋawit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop dakon nandaŋ yawotni da bɨkbɨknikon madepsi taŋ yomgut.
Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Kapaneam kokupmon kɨŋ uŋudon egɨpgut. Kapaneam uŋun Galili Pakbi Ɨdap ɨleŋɨkon, Sebulan ae Naptali mɨktɨmon uŋudon tosok.
Nin da Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tapmɨm madep gat ae tobɨl apdɨsak uŋun do dayɨgɨmaŋ bɨsapmon nin amɨn da nandak nandagon morap gen ɨsalɨ noman tawit uŋun baŋ dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ. Dabɨlnin da Yesu dakon teŋteŋɨ ae tapmɨmni noman taŋ ɨban kagɨmaŋ.
Amɨn da monjɨ ŋakŋak Yesu da kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨsak do paŋopgwit. Uŋun pɨndagek paŋdetni da kɨrɨŋɨk yomgwit.
Abɨdaŋek aŋkɨ dam teban yutnon yɨpmaŋek kɨlani ani do obip amɨn 16 kabɨ yopgut. Aŋek don Yapyap Bɨlak mudaŋakwan amɨn morap da dabɨlon abɨŋ gen pikon yɨp do nandagɨt.
Monjɨno, Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni da gak aŋteban aŋakwan tebaisi akgi.
Luk kaloŋ dagɨn nak gat ekwamak. Mak abɨdaŋbɨ gak gat kɨsi opjil, nido uŋun da nak pikon aŋpulugosak amɨn tagɨsi.
Not kabɨ, Telagɨ Wup da but galak do pi morap dakon tapmɨm nimɨŋ nimɨŋ asak uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani do dayɨkdɨsat.
Gen uŋun yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Babɨknin da mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon mana nawit. Uŋun dakon gen Piŋkop da papiakon yaŋ mandabi da tosok: ‘Kwen Kokup dakon bret amɨn do yoban nawit.’ Do gak niaŋ abi? Tɨlak tapmɨmɨ toŋ niaŋensi kɨnda naŋ abɨ kaŋek nandaŋ gadaŋ gamneŋ?”
Moses dakon gen teban uŋun yo tagɨsi don noman tokdaŋ dakon wupmɨ gɨn, uŋun bamɨ dɨma. Do gen teban yolek bɨlagɨ bɨlagɨ mukwa soŋ soŋ awit, mani gen teban da mɨŋat amɨnyo telagɨ yutnon abaŋ uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aban tagɨsisi arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Piŋkop da Abraham do yaŋ teban tok aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt: “Aisagon da babɨkgo altokdaŋ.” Mani Piŋkop da Abraham aŋkewalek monji aŋak mukwa sosak do iyɨŋban monji kaloŋɨ Piŋkop do ɨmgut.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdet kabɨni da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Abɨsok nomansi niyɨsal. Tɨlak gen dɨma yosol.
Piŋkop dakon gen uŋun yaŋ tosok naŋ manjɨgɨt: “Sipsip dap do aŋ ae sipsip monɨŋ daŋgwi mandak do aŋakwa gen dɨma yoŋ, uŋun da tɨlagon gen kɨnda dɨma yagɨt.
Mɨŋatjok nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma uŋun lamni tɨmɨgek lam kolek do pakbi dɨ gat dɨma paŋkɨwit.
Aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji kosit agɨp do yo dɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni. Wɨn kɨrɨŋ, ae yɨk, ae bret, ae moneŋ, ae paba pɨgɨk bamorɨ dɨma tɨmɨtni.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni, ae Piŋkop dakon amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpakni jikon tosak, ae Telagɨ Wup da ji paŋpulugaŋban but kaloŋsi egɨpni dosi nandɨsat.
Nido nin nandamaŋ, “On mɨktɨm gat yo morapni gat toŋ uŋun kɨsi morap uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨn.”
Uŋun amɨn Ibru amɨn, ma? Nak yo kɨsi Ibru amɨn gɨn. Uŋun amɨn Israel amɨn, ma? Nak yo kɨsi Israel amɨn gɨn. Uŋun amɨn Abraham dakon babɨkni, ma? Nak yo kɨsi Abraham dakon babɨkni.
Juda amɨn da uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni egɨpgut da sɨŋtagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma agɨt. Yaŋ nandawit do uŋun amɨn dakon meŋi datniyo apjil do gen yɨpgwit.
Yo morap Piŋkop da wasagɨt uŋun tagɨsi gɨn, do Piŋkop do ya yaŋ iyɨŋek tɨmɨtneŋ kaŋ, pɨndatno yokwi dɨma ani.
Nin Yesu Kristokon kabɨ kaloŋ agɨmaŋ, do ji but dasi tɨmɨkdat. Uŋun asi.
Nin jikon dɨma kɨŋek Pilipai kokupmon egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋpak yokwi mayak mayagɨ aŋ nimgwit, ae nindapba tepmɨ pagɨmaŋ, uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ. Mani jikon opgumaŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkopnin da nin paŋteban aŋakwan uwalnin yum pɨndagek jikon Gen Bini Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋagɨmaŋ.
Amɨn Kɨla Agakgo yɨpbɨ ninon apjak. Gak dakon gen guramɨt Kwen Kokup tosok, mɨktɨmon ninon yaŋ gɨn tosak.
Ji morap yum pɨndagakwa amɨn da gɨptɨmji mandaŋ amɨn aeno yaŋsi dayɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsat. Aŋpak uŋun ani kaŋ, gen teban morap kɨsi yol kɨmotdo.
Naŋakwa Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On yawino. Amɨn morapmɨ gat saŋbek saŋbek ak do parekdat.
Ae jobɨt tɨmɨtni do dayaŋ amɨn, uŋun Piŋkop da paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni. Ae yokwi aŋ damaŋ amɨn do bɨsit ani.
“Ji yɨk monɨŋjikon gol bo silwa moneŋ bo kopa moneŋ dɨma sɨmɨlek agɨpni.
Mani butnikon gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt, do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok akdak. Jɨgɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋ ɨmni ae Piŋkop dakon gen dakon uwal apni bɨsapmon nandaŋ gadatni yɨpban wɨtdal kɨsak.
“Kɨŋ altaŋba wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ tɨmɨgek, kɨnda aŋak ukwayɨtyo awit, aŋek kɨnda aŋakba kɨmagakwan, kɨnda tɨp baŋ aŋakgwit.
Iyɨ dakon gen teban do, “On uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen” yaŋ yaŋek amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgaŋ. Nak gawak namaŋ uŋun koko yo ɨsalɨ asak.’ ”
Tap uŋun yo galagɨsi. Mani tap dakon galagɨ pasɨljak kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ? Ji tap yombem egek notji gat but kaloŋsi egɨpni.”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pilip da gen uŋun manjɨgɨt uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ iyɨŋek Yesu dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi iyɨgɨt.
Ɨban Jon uŋun Jodan Pakbi oba tosogon mɨktɨm morap toŋ uŋudon agek Piŋkop dakon gen yagɨt. Amɨn but tobɨl aŋek telagɨ pakbi soŋakwa Piŋkop da dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn yabekgɨt uŋun tobɨl yutnon wɨgɨ oman monjɨ uŋun kɨlɨ kɨlek tagɨt kawit.
Yaŋban kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Judia mɨktɨmon Betlehem kokupmon altosak. Kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan yaŋ mandagɨt,
Telagɨ jap nomaŋ bɨsapmon kap abɨdaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨŋek nomaŋ uŋun da yawini do aŋek nin Kristo gat kabɨ kaloŋ amaŋ. Ae bret pudaŋek nomaŋ bɨsapmon uŋun da gɨptɨmni do aŋek nin Kristo gat kabɨ kaloŋ amaŋ.
Josep uŋun Pailaron kɨŋ Yesu dakon bumjotni abɨdok do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban emat amɨni yoyɨŋban bumjotni Josep do ɨmgwit.
Nido Piŋkop da mɨŋat dakon gɨptɨm naŋ wɨli dɨma wasagɨt, wɨli dakon gɨptɨm naŋ mɨŋat wasagɨt.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, bamɨ yosol, mani pɨŋan tewɨgɨ da tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun tagɨ noŋ.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak nido nak do amɨn tagɨsi yaŋ nayɨsal? Piŋkop kaloŋɨ gɨn uŋun amɨn tagɨsi.
Altaŋek Pega kokupmon Piŋkop gen yoyɨŋek Atalia kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal.
Ae uŋun yutnon amɨn da ji but dasi tɨmɨtni kaŋ, ji dakon but yawot uŋun amɨnon tosak. Mani but dasi dɨma tɨmɨtni kaŋ, but yawotji uŋun dɨsikon gɨn tosak.
Ji da nak aŋpulugok do yo ayɨŋ uŋun do tagɨsi nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ aŋkɨsisat. Asi, ji kalɨp nak do nandawit, mani nak aŋpulugoni dakon kosit kɨnda dɨma taŋ damgut.
Uŋun kokupmon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn dɨ pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Pɨndatno uŋun da Sonda kɨnda nin gat egɨpneŋ do niyɨwit. Do uŋun gat egek don mɨktɨm kosit Rom kokup papmon kɨgɨmaŋ.
Gen yaŋ yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni da abɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu yomakon pɨsak do gen yɨpba wɨgɨgɨt.
Mani uŋun gen mandagɨt uŋun do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak, do nikon da nak dakon gen do nandaba bamɨ asak?”
Amɨn Tagɨ da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni yo tagɨsi aŋyomdɨsak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ abɨsak uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok akeŋ do yabekgɨt.”
Mani yaŋ abeŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun niaŋon da bamɨ toŋ asak? Uwalno da yo yaŋsi aŋnamni do yosok.”
Mani on gen teban mandaŋ damɨsat uŋun da kalugɨ yaŋ kɨnda asak. Pɨlɨn tuk uŋun pasɨl do aŋakwan teŋteŋɨ bamɨsi uŋun kɨlɨ yamaŋdak, do uŋun gen teban dakon bamɨ Kristokon taŋban komaŋ, ae jikon yo kɨsi taŋban komaŋ.
Aŋopbal Simeon da Yesu bedaŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋek yaŋ yagɨt:
Yaŋban Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Israel amɨn dakon yoyɨŋdet kɨnda da yo morap on dɨma nandabɨ pɨsosok, ma?
Piŋkop ae Yesu Kristo ae Piŋkop dakon aŋelo kabɨ da dabɨlon noman yaŋsi gayɨsat, gen morap on gayɨsat uŋun yol kɨmagek pi abi. Aŋek amɨn kɨsikon aŋpak tɨlak kaloŋɨkon da pi abi.
Bɨsit aban mudaŋakwan kɨla amɨn kɨsi da kunam tagek Pol bedaŋ mandaŋ nawit.
Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpak si galak tosok uŋun wɨsɨŋ pɨndat do pi ani.
Yaŋ ak do aŋakwan Pol da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gɨptɨmgo goman dɨ abɨm! Dam teban yutnon amɨn nin kɨsi morap oni ekwamaŋ.”
Monjɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ yokwi dɨma tɨmɨtni. Mani nandaŋ gadagɨ mɨni amɨn uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji kaloŋɨ dakon mani dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, do kobogɨ yokwi tɨmɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok kɨlɨ aŋyobi.
Mani Stiwen Telagɨ Wup da aŋpulugaŋek nandak nandak tagɨsi ɨmɨŋakwan geni abɨk do aŋtɨdok awit.
Yesu Matyu da yutnon yɨgek jap naŋek takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn morapmɨ ae yokwi pakpak amɨn morapmɨ da apba Yesu gat paŋdetni gat kɨsi yɨgek jap nawit.
Yaŋba yagɨt, “Nak amɨn 4 tausen do bret 7 kabɨ pɨdaŋ yomgum bɨsapmon, ji jap dɨwat yɨk madepsi niaŋ da sɨmɨlba tugawit?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yɨk madepsi 7 kabɨ.”
Kɨŋ egɨ don wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt. Mani pi kɨla awit amɨn da oman monjɨ obɨsi aŋagek bamɨ dɨ dɨma ɨmɨŋek yolba kɨgɨt.
Amɨn morap Piŋkop bɨsit iyaŋ uŋun yo tɨmɨkgaŋ, ae yo wɨsaŋ amɨn uŋun bamɨ koŋ, ae yoma domon tɨdoŋ amɨn uŋun wɨtdal yomɨsak.
Yo pasɨlɨ toŋ ae yo wɨtjɨŋbi da toŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋɨkon tokdaŋ.
Do nandamaŋ, mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek yɨk yawot kokupnikon dɨma kɨni do yagɨt.
Aŋek amɨn bamot tɨmɨgek gen pikon yop do nandawit, mani pɨlɨn tok do agɨt do aŋwa don yaŋ nandaŋek dam teban yutnon yopgwit.
Pɨndagek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Abraham dat, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam. Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da pakbi jɨmjɨmjok dɨ kɨsirɨkon yopmaŋ paŋabɨŋ melnokon yopban tɨmɨsok dɨ yawotjak. Nak on kɨndapmon egek tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsat!’
Mani, Piŋkop da gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋakwan Yesu mukwa sogok amɨn dagagɨt. Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn Tagɨ da gen kɨlɨ yaŋ aŋteban agɨt, ‘Gak mukwa sogok dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpbi.’ Ae geni uŋun kulabɨk dɨmasi asak.”
Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji takis gapman da dayɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn tɨmɨtni. Ae saŋbeŋek dɨ gat dɨma tɨmɨtni.”
Papia yut mɨŋat monjɨyo yoyɨŋdetni dɨma yapmaŋgaŋ. Mani papia yut tagɨsi wɨgɨ mudaŋek don yoyɨŋdetni yombem aŋ.
Sunduk da paŋkewal morap uŋun aŋ mudaŋek ae bɨsap kɨndakon don aŋkewalgeŋ yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yɨpmaŋ kɨgɨt.
Kɨŋakwal Yesu gat domdom aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Wɨsa dagokdo tagɨsi.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋban kandapmɨ abɨdaŋek gawak ɨmgumal.
Bɨlak 14 mudaŋakwa aeno Jerusalem wɨgɨgɨm. Uŋun bɨsapmon Banabas gat kɨsi wɨgɨgɨmak. Ae Taitus kɨsi abɨdoko wɨgɨgɨmaŋ.
Pɨdaŋ don Yesu da kɨmoron da pɨdaŋakwan telagɨ kokup papmon pukwa amɨn morapmɨ da pɨndakgwit.
Yoyɨŋban paŋdetni da gen uŋun iyɨ gɨn yaŋ nandaŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kɨmoron da pɨdot pɨdot uŋun yo kɨnda nido nandaŋek yosok.”
Uŋun do Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ tosok: “Nandani, yut kodɨgɨkon gwak teban tɨp kɨndanaŋ tɨdosot uŋun nak da kɨlɨ manjɨgɨm. Uŋun gwak tagɨsi ae tebaisi. Uŋun abɨsok yɨpbo Saion kokup papmon tosok. Uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn mayaktok arɨpmɨ dɨma pakdaŋ.”
“Gak tobɨl yutgokon kɨŋek Piŋkop da gak aŋpulugaŋek yo madepsi ak uŋun do amɨn yoyɨki.” Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn uŋun tobɨl kɨŋ kokupni dakon amɨn morap Yesu da aŋpulugaŋek yo morap agɨt uŋun do yoyɨgɨt.
Do amɨn uŋun mɨŋatjok uŋun pasak kaŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ asak. Mani dɨma pasak kaŋ, uŋun da wagɨl tagɨsi asak.
“Mani babɨknin Moses dakon gen nandaŋ guramɨt do dɨma galak tawit. Geni maba kɨŋakwan burɨkon da Isip mɨktɨmon tobɨl kɨk do nandawit.
Mani Yesu dakon gen yaŋbal uŋun mɨktɨmon madepsi ɨreŋtaŋ aŋaŋ kɨgɨt.
Ji aesi nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek yokwi ae saŋbeŋek dɨma ani. Asi jikon da dɨwarɨ Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Ji da mayaktok pani do aŋek gen on dayɨsat.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Saiprus kaŋek uŋun gwandeŋ tetgɨn do taŋakwan nin amɨn tetgɨn da yapgumaŋ. Yapmaŋek Siria mɨktɨmon kɨŋ kokup Tair uŋudon tap wakga paŋkɨ akgɨt. Agakwan tap wakgakon pi monjɨ yɨk ɨlɨgakwa
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yaŋ kaŋ gak namɨn? Gak Elaija bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.” Aeni iyɨwit, “Gak kombɨ amɨn uŋun apjak do jomjom amaŋ, uŋun bo?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨma.”
Agripa da Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨkbɨk gabo gaga do gen ya.” Iyɨŋban mɨrak yopni do Pol kɨsirɨ aŋenagek iyɨ kutnok do gen yaŋ yagɨt,
Jon da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni bamot Yesu yolgɨmal.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Sekaraia gat mukwa sogok amɨn notni gat Piŋkop da dabɨlon mukwa sogok pi awit.
Piŋkop yolek gawak ɨmɨsat yaŋ yoŋ mɨŋat pi tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ani. Uŋun da tɨlɨmni bamɨsi asak.
Nido nin dagɨn Piŋkop dakon amɨn kabɨ bamɨsi ekwamaŋ. Nin Piŋkop dakon Wup da tapmɨmon Piŋkop gawak ɨmamaŋ, ae Yesu Kristo da nin do yo madepsi agɨt uŋun do nandaŋek man madep ɨmamaŋ, do Piŋkop da nin dogɨn nandaban kɨlek tosok. Nin da pi kɨnda ano Piŋkop da nindaban nin amɨn kɨlegɨsi amaŋ uŋun dakon kosit kɨnda dɨmasi tosok yaŋsi nandamaŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda yaŋ yosok: ‘Amɨn Tagɨ Piŋkopji dakon tapmɨm kok do aŋek dɨmasi aŋkewaldo.’ ”
Yaŋba Parisi amɨn da yoyɨwit, “Ji kɨsi bo paŋkewalak?
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pita, nak yaŋ gayɨsat, abɨsok kalbi pup gen dɨma yaŋakwan gak da kosirɨ kapbɨ nak do wasɨp yokdɨsal.”
Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ kɨlɨ tɨmɨkgɨt yaŋ nandani. Uŋun nandak nandak da busuŋ kutnokji asak. Yaŋ aŋek Telagɨ Wup dakon emat agak sɨba abɨdoni, uŋun Piŋkop dakon gen.
Yaŋ nandaŋakwa mɨŋat wɨliyo morapmɨ da Amɨn Tagɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon saŋbewit.
Kɨsi morap yabekbi dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap kombɨ amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap yoyɨŋdet dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ, ae kɨsi morap wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ agak amɨn dagɨn dɨma ekwaŋ,
Yaŋdo, jap ɨmalyonin dɨ taŋ nimni kaŋ, “uŋun arɨpninon” yaŋ yoneŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨyo da yoyɨŋdetni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ. Ae oman amɨn da madepni da tɨlagon egɨpni kaŋ, uŋun kɨsi tagɨ. Yut dakon ami nak do Belsebul yaŋ nayɨni kaŋ, gwakni ji do nandaba pɨŋbisi aŋakwa man wagɨl yokwisi damdaŋ.”
Timoti jikon da ninon tobɨl abɨŋek gen tagɨsi kɨlɨ niyɨk. Ji da nandaŋ gadat tebai aŋek amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do niyɨk. Ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nin do nandaŋek tagɨsi nandaŋ yaŋ yosok. Nin ji dandakdosi nandamaŋ, yaŋ gɨn jiyo kɨsi nin nindakdosi nandaŋ yaŋyo kɨsi niyɨk.
Nin Tair kokup yɨpmaŋek kɨŋ Tolemes kokup papmon altagɨmaŋ. Uŋudon Yesukon saŋbewit amɨn kabɨ gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨno uŋun gat gɨldat kɨnda egɨpgumaŋ.
Kɨŋakwa mɨrɨm madepsi aŋakwan pakbi madepsi tamalɨkgɨt.
Nak Taitus jikon opjak do tebaisi iyɨko opgut, ae uŋun notnin kɨnda gat kɨsi yabekgo opgumal bɨsapmon Taitus da galaktokni yolni do pasɨlɨkon da ji paŋkɨlɨgek yo kabɨsi tɨmɨkgɨt? Uŋun dɨmasi! Taitus gat nit nandak nandaknit kaloŋɨ ae aŋpaknit kaloŋɨsi gɨn.
Kalɨp Piŋkop da Abraham dakon yawi dɨwatni da Israel mɨktɨm don abɨdoni do yaŋ teban tok aŋ ɨmgut. Kɨlɨ mɨktɨm abɨdoni dakon bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan Israel amɨn Isip mɨktɨmon egɨpgwit uŋun madepsi ɨreŋ tawit.
Piŋkop da yaŋ abeŋ yaŋ kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do amɨn uŋun ji da kɨsiron yɨpgut. Yɨpban ji da amɨn yokwi da kɨsiron yɨpba uŋun da abɨdaŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmakgɨt.
Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsit aŋ kɨmotni. Bɨsit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ak do pi tebaisi aŋek Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugosak do bɨsit iyɨni. Kɨla tebai aŋek uŋun aŋpak dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn morapyoni do bɨsit ani.
Mani Yesu da yabekbini yoyɨgɨt, “Dɨsi jap yomgut.” Yoyɨŋban yawit, “Nin japnin morapmɨ dɨma. Bret 5 kabɨ gat ae tap kɨlap bamorɨ gat gɨn. Nin kɨŋ on mɨŋat amɨn morap do jap moneŋ baŋ si yumneŋ do nandɨsal?”
Asisi, kɨmot akdamaŋ yaŋsi nandagɨmaŋ. Nin tapmɨmnin madep dɨma yaŋsi nandaneŋ do jɨgɨ uŋun noman taŋ nimgut. Piŋkop amɨn kɨmakbi kɨmoron baŋ paban pɨdot pɨdot amɨn uŋun dagɨn nin arɨpmɨ tagɨ paŋpulugosak yaŋsi nandaneŋ do jɨgɨ uŋun pagɨmaŋ.
Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨban aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
Mani, amɨn aŋpakni uŋuden mɨni, uŋun amɨn yo dubagɨkon toŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨndakgaŋ ae uŋun amɨn dabɨlɨ mɨni yombem. Piŋkop da yokwi morap kalɨp awit uŋun wɨrɨrɨk yoban amɨn kɨlegɨsi awit, mani uŋun amɨn Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi agɨt uŋun kɨlɨ ɨŋtawit.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban obip amɨn da Pol da gen yoyɨgɨt uŋun aŋaŋ gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ yoyɨwit. Yoyɨŋba Pol gat Sailas gat Rom amɨn bamorɨ yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek si pasalgwit.
Yut wɨgɨni uŋudon gɨn yɨk egɨyo aŋakwa jap daba noni. Pi agak amɨn uŋun tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ji yurɨ yurɨ dɨma agɨpni.
Uŋun bɨsapmon bulmakau wup kɨnda kokup kɨdatni wasawit. Wasaŋek paret aŋek kɨsit da yo wasawit do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi awit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Piŋkop da manji yomɨŋek gɨk kanek gɨldatyo gawak yomni do bɨkbɨk yomgut. Kombɨ amɨn da papiakon gen tosok uŋun da tɨlagon yo yokwi awit. Gen uŋun yaŋ tosok: ‘Israel amɨn ji mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ tɨmon bɨlak 40 egek bulmakau ae sipsip dapmaŋek mukwa sowit, uŋun nak do awit? Uŋun dɨmasi.
Mani amɨn da bɨkbɨgon da si kɨgɨt.
Abel Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat aŋek mukwa soŋ ɨmgut. Aban Piŋkop da Abel dakon mukwa do galak tagɨt. Mani Ken dakon mukwa do dɨma galak tagɨt. Abel uŋun nandaŋ gadat agɨt, mibɨlɨ yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da but galak dakon yo Abel da ɨmgut uŋun do galak taŋek amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt. Abel kɨlɨsi kɨmakgɨt, mani nandaŋ gadatni uŋun da nin sigɨn yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ nimɨsak.
Yaŋba gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda mani Yesu yaŋ iyaŋ uŋun da mɨktɨm baŋ neŋak wasaŋek dabɨlnokon wɨrɨrɨgek yaŋ nayɨk, ‘Gak kɨŋ Silom Pakbi Ɨdapmon pakbi soki.’ Yaŋ nayɨŋban kɨŋ pakbi soŋek dabɨlno kɨlek taŋban yo pɨndat.”
Uŋun do aŋek on amɨn but teban kɨlɨ awit. Gen kalugɨ dɨ gat nandak do kurak taŋek mɨrakni paŋ sopgwit, ae dabɨlni wamaŋ sopgwit. Yaŋ dɨma awit tam, dabɨlni ae mɨrakni ae butniyo da kaŋ nandaŋyo aba pɨsaŋban nagon tobɨlba tagɨ paŋmɨlɨp abom.’
Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma potni, ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ tagɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma potni.
“Kosit yolɨk amɨn, ji dabɨlji mɨni da ekwaŋ. Awa! Ji yaŋ yoŋ: ‘Amɨn kɨnda da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban aŋek ae don tagɨ kɨrɨŋɨtjak. Mani amɨn kɨnda da telagɨ yut dakon gol do yaŋek geni yaŋ aŋteban asak kaŋ, tagɨ dɨma kɨrɨŋɨtjak.’
“Uŋun amɨn madep kɨlɨ agɨt, do iyɨ naŋ iyɨŋba kobogɨ dayɨsak.”
Nandaki, mamago Elisabet mɨŋat pelaŋ kɨlɨ agɨt, mani monjɨ kwapni toŋ, do monji wɨli kɨnda aŋalakdɨsak. Kalɨp amɨn da ‘Monjɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋalasak’ yaŋ yawit, mani abɨsok monjɨ kwap kɨnda awɨlakwan kanek 6 mudosok.
Jomjom aŋapno Pol Asos abɨŋ altaŋ niban abɨdono tap wakgakon wɨgek Mitilini kokup papmon kɨgɨmaŋ.
Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yawit, “ ‘Kwen Kokup dakon pi’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen kobogɨ yaŋ niyɨkdɨsak, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Dat da amɨn kɨnda dakon aŋpakni dɨma kokwinɨkdak. Amɨn da Dat do man madep ɨmaŋ, yaŋ gɨn Monjɨ do man madep ɨmni do aŋek amɨn kokwin agak pi kɨsi morap uŋun Monji do ɨmɨŋ mudagɨt. Amɨn kɨnda Monji man madep dɨma ɨmɨsak kaŋ, Dat Monji yabekban pɨgɨt uŋunyo kɨsi man madep dɨma ɨmɨsak.
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Aŋabɨgɨt! Aŋabɨgɨt! Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgɨt!” Yaŋba Pailat da yoyɨgɨt, “Kɨla amɨn madepji tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgeŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Ninon kɨla amɨn madep kɨnda dɨma egɨsak. Sisa kaloŋgɨn!”
Nak gat ae paŋmuwukbi notno nak gat ekwamaŋ nin da Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn morap Galesia provinskon ekwaŋ ji do gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ dayamaŋ.
Uŋun iyɨ dakon gwakni kɨla tagɨsi aŋakwan monjɨ gwayoni da gawat gawaron da geni tagɨsi guramɨkgaŋ.
Gen teban uŋun yaŋ teban tok gen Piŋkop da kalɨp yagɨt dakon uwalni? Uŋun dɨmasi. Piŋkop da gen teban nimɨŋek uŋun da egɨp egɨp damjak yaŋ yagɨt tam, gen teban yolyol kosiron da nin mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨlegɨ anom.
Asisi, amɨn morap Yesu Kristo gat gadaŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak ak do nandaŋ, uŋun aba amɨn da yo yokwi aŋ yomdaŋ.
Nido nak yabekbi kabɨ dakon pɨŋbinisi egɨsat. Ae amɨn da yabekbi yaŋ tagɨ dɨma nayɨgɨ, nido kalɨp Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi paŋupbal ak do pi madepsi agɨm.
Yaŋba aŋtobɨlek yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban jamba but amɨn ji do gen yaŋ mandagɨt: ‘Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gen kaga dagɨn nak man madep namaŋ, mani but dasi nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ.
Kɨla amɨn kɨnda bo Parisi amɨn kɨnda da uŋun amɨn dɨmasi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgut.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek goman madepni yɨpmaŋ ɨmɨŋakwan ɨsal kɨgɨt.
Stiwen da gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ saŋbeŋek tebaisi yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kwen wɨgɨk amɨn ji amɨn Piŋkop dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ da tɨlagon butji uŋun tebaisi ae mɨrakji da Piŋkop dakon gen dɨma nandabi yombem. Babɨkji da Telagɨ Wup do kurak tawit, jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ.
Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yaŋban kosit bamot agɨt. Yaŋban nandaŋek Pita Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun do nandagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak dakon man kosit kapbɨ wasɨp yaŋaki pup da kosit bamot gen yosak.” Gen uŋun do nandaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋban kunam madepsi takgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok awit uŋun yapmaŋgaŋ, do gulusuŋni taŋ yomɨsak.
Yaŋ kaŋek kɨsitni kɨsirɨkon wutjɨŋban sotni yɨpmaŋ dekgɨt. Yaŋ aban pɨdaŋek Yesu do jap paŋnoman agɨt.
“Kɨŋakwa don gɨldat binap aeni makeron kɨŋ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt. Aeni 3 kilok kɨŋ yaŋ gɨn pi monjɨ dɨ gat tɨmɨkgɨt.
Gak da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ nayɨŋaki uŋudon gɨn monjɨ butnogwan yɨkdak kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek wɨgɨ mok ak.
Kɨŋ yokwini yaŋkwok aŋakwa Jodan Pakbikon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomgut.
Babɨknin Abraham yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Nak asisi uwalji da kɨsiron baŋ pulugaŋ depbo pasol pasolɨ mɨni egek oman amɨno egɨpdaŋ.
Amɨn da lam koleŋ kwoba baŋ dɨma wɨtjɨŋba toŋ. Kwen tamonikon yopba yut kagagwan amɨn ekwaŋ uŋun kɨsi teŋteŋaŋ yomaŋ.
Yoyɨŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ da paŋpulugaŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da nandaŋ gadat awit. Yaŋ aŋek but tobɨl aŋek Amɨn Tagɨkon kɨwit.
Ji tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ yombem. Gen tagɨsi niaŋsi aŋek yoni? Yo ni da butjigwan toŋ uŋun gen yogokjikon paŋalon aŋ.
Gɨptɨm wayɨkgamaŋ uŋun on mɨktɨm dakon, mani gɨptɨm pɨdokdɨsak uŋun Wup da egɨp egɨp ɨmɨsak. Mɨktɨm dakon gɨptɨm tosok, do gɨptɨm Wup da egɨp egɨp ɨmɨsak uŋun yo kɨsi tosok gɨn.
Adam dakon amɨn kabɨ morap si kɨmokgoŋ, ae yaŋ gɨn Kristo dakon amɨn kabɨ morap egɨp egɨp abɨdokdaŋ.
Ji nandaŋ, ae Piŋkop kɨsi nandɨsak, nin da ji dɨma paŋgalak agɨmaŋ, ae ji dakon yo kabɨ do pɨndak galaktok aŋek gen tagɨ uŋun dɨma dayɨgɨmaŋ.
Nak Datno dakon gen teban guramɨgek but dasi galak taŋ namɨsak uŋun da kagagwan egɨsat. Ji yaŋ gɨn nak dakon gen teban guramɨtni kaŋ, but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat uŋun da kagagwan egɨpdaŋ.
Yaŋban mibɨltok amɨn uŋun da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nak madepno da yoŋgamgwan egɨsat, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak. Ɨsal yum gen gɨn yaŋaki oman monjɨno kɨlek tosak. Nak naga mibɨltok amɨno egakwan pɨŋbini egɨsat. Ae emat amɨno uŋun nak dakon pɨŋbino ekwaŋ. Emat amɨno kɨnda ‘Kɨ!’ yaŋ iyɨko kɨsak. Ae kɨnda ‘Ap!’ yaŋ iyɨko abɨsak. Ae oman amɨno kɨnda ‘Pi on aki!’ yaŋ iyɨko pi asak. Do ɨsal yum gen gɨn yaŋaki oman monjɨno kɨlek tosak.”
Yaŋban kɨla amɨn da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, monjino dɨma kɨmagakwan tepmɨ pɨki.”
Yesu da amɨn morapmɨ aŋgwasɨŋek akba pɨndagek paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nin pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda do kɨno.”
Uŋun amɨn da mɨŋat amɨnyo mɨŋat eyo dɨma ani, ae jap dɨwarɨ dɨma noni do gen teban yopmaŋ yomdaŋ. Mani Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek geni bamɨ nandaŋ amɨn da uŋun jap morap tɨmɨgek ya yaŋ iyɨŋek tagɨ noni do wasagɨt.
Ji uŋun amɨn aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomni, aŋakwa paŋmuwukbi morap da ji da amɨn do but dasi galaktaŋ yomaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ damni. Ae nin da ji dakon man ɨsal dogɨn awɨkwamaŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋ dek kɨŋapno mɨrɨm dambɨ da apgut do Saiprus mɨktɨm tɨm tap binap tosok uŋun da yoŋgam aŋakwan nin uŋun tetgɨn da kɨgɨmaŋ.
Aŋakwa Pol da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn gat ae emat amɨni gat yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn kabɨ tap wakgakon dɨma egɨpni kaŋ, ji kɨsi pasɨldaŋ.”
Muwugek Yesu ni kosiron da pasɨlek abɨdaŋ aŋatno kɨmotjak uŋun dakon gen yawit.
Kalɨp Krit amɨn dakon nandak nandak amɨn madep kɨnda da yaŋ yagɨt, “Krit amɨn morap uŋun top yogok amɨn. Uŋun amɨn yokwisi joŋ kɨlap yombem. Uŋun ɨsalsi egek jap morapmɨ nok do gɨn nandaŋ.”
Amɨn kɨnda gen morap on papiakon mandamaŋ uŋun dɨma guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yaŋ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ kokwinɨkba agakwan, ji uŋun da dubagɨkon egɨpni. Yaŋ aŋakwa mayagɨ pasak.
Ae don mɨŋat uŋun kɨsi kɨmakgɨt.
Juda amɨn da yo agɨt uŋun kaŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ni wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kɨnda naŋ nolɨŋbɨ kaŋek gak yaŋ mudaŋ gamɨŋbi da uŋun yo asal yaŋ gandaneŋ?”
Sabat bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu Juda amɨn da muwut muwut yutnon wɨgek yoyɨŋdet agɨt. Uŋudon amɨn kɨsirɨ amɨnsi tetni gɨreŋɨkbi kɨnda egɨpgut.
Dat da nak yabekban pɨgɨm. Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ da galak togon nagon arɨpmɨ dɨma apjak. Dat da nandak nandakni aŋtagap aban nagon tagɨ opjak. Ae mibɨ gɨldaron nak da kɨmoron naŋ abo pɨdokdɨsak.
Yaŋ yaŋek kɨŋ bumjot abɨwit tamo wɨtjɨŋakwan bumjot guramɨkgwit amɨn uŋun akgwit. Agakwa Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Monjɨ gɨmoŋɨ pɨdoki do gayɨsat!”
Yaŋ yaŋban Sunduk da Yesu iyɨŋ aŋaŋ ɨleŋ dubagɨsi kɨndakon wɨgek uŋudon gɨn on mɨktɨmon mɨktɨm madep madep morap kɨsi yolɨŋban pɨndakgɨt.
Nak da gak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yolɨgɨm. Ae gak da but dasi galak taŋ namɨsal yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kabɨ da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, ae nak uŋun amɨn kabɨkon egɨpbeŋ, yaŋ do sigɨn saŋbeŋek gak yolɨkdɨsat.”
Pita da gen yaŋakwan gɨn gɨkwem teŋteŋɨni madep da pɨŋ ɨlɨmɨk yomɨŋakwan gen kɨnda uŋungwan da yaŋ noman tagɨt, “Uŋun Monjɨno, but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsat, ae uŋun do nandabo wagɨl tagɨsisi asak. Ji geni nandani.”
Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolakwa ɨsal dogɨn tepmɨ daba tepmɨ uŋun tagɨ pamaŋ yaŋ nandani kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun do tagɨsi nandakdɨsak.
“Yaŋ yoyɨŋban uŋun amɨn kabɨ kobogɨ yokwisi dagok dagogɨ mɨni pakdaŋ. Mani kɨlegɨ amɨn kabɨ uŋun da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni uŋudon kɨkdaŋ.”
nido paŋmuwukbi tɨmɨsok dɨ waseŋ kɨŋakwa uŋudon da Piŋkop dakon aŋpak namɨn da bamɨsi yolgaŋ uŋun da dolɨsak.
Sɨtnok yaŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋakwa amɨn gen kokwinon yɨkgwit kɨsi da kaŋakwa Stiwen dakon tomno dabɨlyo aŋelo yombem agɨt.
Juda amɨn da amɨn kɨnda mani Aleksanda yɨpba mɨŋat amɨn morap da ɨŋamon agakwan amɨn da yokwi uŋun da bo ak yaŋ nandawit. Yaŋ aŋakwa Aleksanda da Juda amɨn nin da dɨma amaŋ yaŋon da geni kobogɨ yoyɨk do aŋek upbalap dɨma yoni do kɨsirɨ da tɨlak aŋ yomgut.
Piŋkop Datnin gat ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo gat uŋun da nandaŋ yawok damɨŋek butji paŋyawot aban yaworɨ tosak.
“Gak Sunduk dakon monji. Gak aŋpak tagɨsi morap toŋ uŋun dakon uwalni. Top gen yogok mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat ae aŋpak yokwi morap uŋun gagon tugosok. Gak da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋpak kɨlegɨsi paŋ upbal asal. Yokwi morap asal uŋun dɨma yopbi, ma?”
Piŋkop da dabɨlon asisi dayɨsat. Gen mandɨsat uŋun top dɨma.
Ae Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban yolek paret ak do kɨgɨmal. Gen teban uŋun yaŋ tosok: “Kɨnarɨm bamorɨ bo ae yɨgɨ yɨgɨ bulagɨ bamorɨ baŋ mukwa soni.”
Amɨn kɨnda jap do pi madep aŋek kɨlani tebai asak amɨn, uŋun da amɨn dɨwarɨ mibɨltaŋ yomɨŋek pigaga jap pasak.
Kalɨp amɨn nandaŋ gadat awit, aba Piŋkop da aŋpakni do but galaksi nandagɨt.
Timoti yombem amɨn dɨ nak gat dɨma ekwamaŋ. Uŋun ji niaŋ ekwaŋ ae ji paŋpulugok do nandak nandak madepsi asak.
Mani amɨn bamot mɨni pɨndak Jeson gat paŋmuwukbi kabɨ dɨ gat tɨmɨk ɨlɨk paŋpaŋ uŋun kokup pap dakon kɨla amɨnon paŋkɨwit. Paŋkɨŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek sɨtnok aŋyomɨŋek yawit, “On amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ agek yokwi morapmɨ aŋ da abɨsok ɨdon abeŋ da ekwaŋ.
Nin pi gaknin yapmaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ da pi awit uŋun do top yaŋek nin da agɨmaŋ yaŋ yaŋek manin dɨma pawɨkwamaŋ. Nin ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji teban tosak, ae jikon pi amaŋ uŋun madepsi paptosak dosi nandamaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa Parisi amɨn da pɨndagek notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yo morap aŋ ɨm do nandamaŋ uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aneŋ. Pɨndakgɨt, mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kɨsi da yolgaŋ.”
Aban paŋdetni tamtam yaŋek yawit, “On niaŋen amɨn kɨnda da mɨrɨm pakbiyo yoyɨŋban geni guramɨkgamal?”
Amɨn uŋun kɨsirɨkon da abɨdaŋek yaŋban kokup yɨpmaŋek waŋga pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgɨ dabɨlɨkon ɨlɨp sulek kɨsit da wɨtjɨŋ yɨpmaŋek iyɨgɨt, “Yo dɨ pɨndakdal, bo dɨma?”
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni pi monjɨni mibɨltok yabekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek morapmɨ yabekgɨt. Yabekban kwa pi kɨla amɨn da mibɨltok awit uŋudeŋ gɨn yokwi aŋyomgwit.
Yesu Sabat dakon gen teban yapgut, ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Piŋkop uŋun naga dakon Datno yaŋ yaŋek nak Piŋkop gat arɨp yaŋ nandagɨt. Uŋun yagɨt do Juda amɨn da mibɨltok aŋakba kɨmotjak do nandawit uŋun si yapmaŋek wagɨlsi aŋatno kɨmotjak yaŋ nandaba teban tagɨt.
Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Amɨn Tagɨkon gadaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani. Aeno dayɨsat, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpni.
Pol, Sailas, ae Timoti nin da paŋmuwukbi Tesalonaika kokup papmon ekwaŋ ji do papia on mandamaŋ. Ji Piŋkop Datnin ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo gat kɨlɨ gadawit.
Pol gen sigɨn yaŋakwan, Pestus da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Pol gak but upbal al. Nandak nandak kalugɨ tɨmɨt do pi morapmɨsi abi uŋun da nandak nandakgo aŋupbal ak.”
Amɨn Tagɨ da pini kɨla abeŋ do nak tɨlak aŋek yaŋdagok aŋ namgut. Nak abɨsok ji da dubagɨkon egek papia on mandɨsat, nido jikon obɨŋ ji dakon aŋpak paŋmɨlɨp ak do gen tebai yok do dɨma galak tosot. Amɨn Tagɨ da ji dakon nandaŋ gadat paŋteban abeŋ do pi on namgut. Nandaŋ gadatji paŋupbal akeŋ do dɨma namgut.
Nak yokwi asat yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Yaŋ nandaŋ kaŋ yokwi asat uŋun ji da tagɨ aŋteŋteŋ ani. Mani gen bamɨ yosot kaŋ, nido geno do nandaba bamɨ dɨma asak?
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da sipsip ae bulmakau dakon yawini yokwi wɨrɨrɨt do Yut Burɨ Telagɨsi uŋungwan pawɨgɨsak, mani bamɨ yut yomayo da waŋga sosoŋ.
Yesu Nasaret kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili mɨktɨmon kokup kɨnda mani Kapaneam uŋudon pɨgɨgɨt. Pabɨgɨ egek Sabat bɨsap morapmon amɨn yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ: amɨn da gak Piŋkop kaloŋɨsi bamɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ gamaŋ, ae Yesu Kristo gak da yabekbɨ pɨgɨt yaŋ gɨn nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Yaŋ aŋakwa paŋdet Yesu da galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun da Pita yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” Saimon Pita uŋun pi do aŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni kɨlɨ ɨlɨk yɨpgut. Do notni da “Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ mani!” yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek ɨlɨkba pɨgɨk kadɨmni ae paŋek pakbigwan paŋ magɨt.
Uŋun top dɨma uŋun asisi do upbalap dɨma yoni. Tayaŋgok nandaŋ kokwin aŋek yo don ani.
Aŋpak uŋuden tɨmɨkba egɨp egɨpjikon teban toni kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo ɨsal dogɨn dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni. Bamɨ morapmɨ tokdaŋ.
Yesu yaŋsi nandagɨt, Dat da yo morap kɨla abeŋ do tapmɨm namgut yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae Piŋkopmon da apgum, do ae Piŋkopmon tobɨl kɨkdɨsat yaŋ kɨsi nandagɨt.
Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji da wupmon tosak.
Amɨn madep kabɨgwan da amɨn kɨnda da yaŋ tɨdaŋek aŋpulugosak do yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, monjɨno kaloŋɨ kɨndagɨn. Do kɨŋ koki do nandɨsat.
Uŋun nak da manjikon noldak. Nak yombem yokwi da kandap gwɨl napni tagɨ dɨma wɨtdalgeŋ.”
Amɨn kapmatjok akgwit da gen uŋun nandaŋek dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Kɨrɨrɨŋ asak” ae dɨwarɨ da “Aŋelo kɨnda da gen iyɨk” yaŋ yawit.
“Nak ji gat sigɨn egek gen on dayɨsat.
Piŋkop da ji iyɨkon gɨn gadaŋek egɨpni do nandɨsak, ae nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn nandɨsat. Nak da ji Kristo do manjɨgɨm, mɨŋatjok gɨmoŋɨsi amɨn gat dɨma pakbi amɨn kɨnda pasak do manjɨkbi uŋun da tɨlak ji Kristo do manjɨgɨm.
Mɨŋat amɨnin da pi tagɨsi aŋek yo do wadak wadak aŋ amɨn paŋpulugoni dakon nandak nandak tɨmɨtni. Paŋmuwukbi ɨsal egek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak dɨma yolni kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
“Ae 10 tausen danari tɨmɨkgɨt amɨn uŋun da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Amɨn tagɨ, gak da 10 tausen danari kɨla akeŋ do namgul uŋun pini ako 10 tausen danari kɨnda gat oni noman tak.’
Uŋun kokup papmon Julius da tap wakga ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda aŋalon agɨt. Tap wakga uŋun kokup pap Aleksandria dakon tap wakga kɨnda. Uŋun tap wakga Itali kɨk do agɨt do nin uŋudon wɨgɨgɨmaŋ.
Uŋun kosirɨ kapbɨ mandawit. Ibru gen, ae Rom gen, ae Grik genon da kɨsi mandawit. Yesu aŋakgwit mɨktɨm tɨm uŋun kokup pap da kapmatjok tagɨt, do Juda amɨn morapmɨ da gen uŋun manjɨwit.
Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon Piŋkop gen dɨma yoyɨneŋ yaŋ do kosit sopsop ak do pi aŋ, nido Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ dɨma tɨmɨtjak do nandaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kalɨpgwan da yokwi sigɨn aŋek yokwini paŋmuwuk kakwaŋba madepsi aŋakwan apmeŋon Piŋkop dakon butjapni pabɨŋ uŋun amɨnon tagɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Nin kalɨpsi babɨknin da bɨsapmon egɨpgumaŋ tam, nin paŋpulugaŋek kombɨ amɨn dɨma dapnom.’
Yaŋban uŋudon gɨn tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni yopmaŋek Yesu yolgɨmal.
Yaŋ iyɨŋakwa amɨn kɨsi yutnikon kɨŋ kɨŋ awit.
Ae paŋdet uŋun kɨnda mibɨltok kɨmakbi tamokon kɨgɨt uŋun kɨsi wɨgɨgɨt. Wɨgɨ pɨndagek nandaŋ gadat agɨt.
“Gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn ae Parisi amɨn ji jamba but amɨnsi. Awa! Ji amɨn kaloŋɨ kɨnda da paŋdetji dagosak do pi teban aŋek tap kwenon da mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ akwaŋ. Ji Tɨpdom do amɨn aŋ, do amɨn kɨnda abɨdoni kaŋ, iyɨŋ dekba uŋun amɨn yaŋ gɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn akdɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, ji da aŋpak yokwi aŋ uŋun si yapmaŋek uŋun amɨn aŋpak yokwisi asak.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa amɨn dɨwarɨ da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋek yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ wain kalugɨ morapmɨ naŋ da but upbal aŋ.”
Amɨn kɨnda da egɨp egɨpno arɨpmɨ dɨma gwayesak. Naga dakon galaktok yolek egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ. Egɨp egɨpno parekgeŋ ae abɨdokeŋ uŋun dakon yaŋ dagok uŋun nagon tosok. Dat da yaŋsi abeŋ dosi yagɨt.”
Kɨlɨ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn kɨla amɨn da ɨŋamon agek Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨki? On amɨn morap gen yaŋ gaba niaŋ nandaŋ yomɨsal?”
Yaŋ yaŋek Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da dɨwarɨgo yopmaŋ gamɨsat.”
Do nak kɨla amɨn madep egɨpbeŋ bɨsapmon ji jap noknok tamonokon yɨgek jap pakbiyo akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek kɨla amɨn madep yɨyɨt tamokon yɨgek Israel amɨn 12 kabɨ gen kokwin pi aŋ yomdaŋ.”
Ae tɨmɨ kɨndakon Piŋkop da yaŋ yosok: “Gak mukwa sogok amɨn toktogɨ egɨpbi. Gak mukwa sogok amɨn Melkisedek yombem.”
Yaŋ kaŋek Pita da Yesu da gen yagɨt uŋun nandaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, ka! Apma pik kɨndap yokwi tosak do yagɨl abɨsok oni kɨbɨdak!”
Teŋteŋɨ da aŋpak tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morap gat, aŋpak kɨlegɨ gat, ae gen bamɨ gat paŋalon asak.
“Nak Daron kɨŋek ji gen pikon depdɨsat yaŋ dɨma nandani. Moses da ji paŋpulugosak yaŋ nandaŋ teban toŋ, mani dɨma. Moses da iyɨ gen pikon depdɨsak.
Asi Epapras da Gen Bin Tagɨsi on dayɨŋ dekgɨt. Epapras uŋun Kristo dakon oman amɨn tagɨsi kɨnda, ae uŋun nin dakon pi ɨsalnin, nin but dasi galak taŋ ɨmamaŋ. Uŋun da nit paŋpulugaŋek Kristo dakon pi jikon tosok uŋun kɨlani tagɨsi asak.
Piŋkop da yo agɨt dakon geni kalɨp pasɨlɨ tagɨt, mani nagon paŋalon agɨt. Uŋun dakon geni dɨsok kɨlɨ mandat.
Ae pi agak dakon kosit mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ toŋ, mani Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo do tapmɨm yomɨŋakwan pi uŋun aŋ.
Mani Mata uŋun jap dakon oman do nandaba kɨk morapmɨ aŋek obɨŋ Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, padɨgɨno nepmak da naga gɨn pi madep asat. Gak uŋun do dɨma nandɨsal? Iyɨŋbɨ obɨŋ nak aŋpulugaŋban.”
Butjɨk Piŋkop da paŋalon asak uŋun da ninon but tobɨl paŋalon asak. Ae but tobɨl ano Piŋkop da nin yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak, do butjɨk pamaŋ da jɨgɨ dɨma nimɨsak. Mani on mɨktɨm dakon butjɨk da kɨmot paŋalon asak.
“Ji uŋun amɨn dakon mibɨlɨ amɨn dɨma yoyɨŋdetni do yaŋsop tebaisi yaŋ damgumaŋ. Mani ji sigɨn yoyɨŋ degakwa Jerusalem kokup pap amɨn kɨsi da ji dakon gen nandayɨŋ. Ae ji da nin do top kɨnda yaŋ yoŋ. Kɨla amɨn nin da Yesu aŋatno kɨmakgɨt, top yaŋ yaŋ nimaŋ.”
Maria kanek kapbɨ Elisabet gat egek don kokupnikon tobɨl kɨgɨt.
Nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop kaloŋɨ dagɨn egɨsak, ae Piŋkop ae mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon binap amɨn kaloŋɨ dagɨn egɨsak, uŋun amɨn Yesu Kristo.
Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae kɨla amɨn dɨwarɨ gat da gen yaŋ ɨmɨŋba gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma yoyɨgɨt.
Abɨsok yo on altosok uŋun kombɨ amɨn Joel da uŋun do kalɨpsigwan yaŋ yagɨt:
Ae amɨn nandaŋ gadatni dɨma teban taŋbi gat egɨsat bɨsapmon, nandaŋ gadatno dɨma teban taŋbi da tɨlak uŋun gat egɨsat, nido uŋun amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsat. Nak amɨn morap kɨsi dakon aŋpak tɨmɨkgɨm, nido kosit morap kɨsi aŋkɨlɨgek amɨn dɨwarɨ yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do nandɨsat.
Yesu gat, ae mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋmɨlɨp aban telagɨ awit amɨn kabɨ gat uŋun Datni kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn. Yaŋ do aŋek “not” yaŋ yoyɨk do mayagɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil ason kokup komaŋ uŋudon kɨŋ altaŋek uŋudon gɨn donki meŋi kɨnda napmon agakwan monji ɨsal akban pɨndatdamal. Uŋun wɨtdal ɨlɨk ɨdon paŋopjil.
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ kapmatjok akgwit uŋun nandaŋek yawit, “Nandaŋ, uŋun Elaija do yaŋ ɨmɨsak.”
Ji tebaisi akgaŋ yaŋsi nandaŋ teban tosot. Ji do tagɨsi nandɨsat, ae ji da butno aŋteban aŋ. Jɨgɨ morapmɨ noman taŋ nimaŋ, mani ji do nandaŋek uŋun da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madep namɨsak.
Uŋun aŋpak tagɨsi yolek nandaŋ teban taŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk bɨsap madep do jomjom aneŋ. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu Kristo Piŋkopnin Wɨkwisi ae Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin tɨlɨmni gat noman altokdɨsak.
Nak da yo do wadaŋek gen on dɨma dayɨsat. Nak nandak nandak yaŋ naŋ kɨlɨ nandako pɨsagɨt: Nak yo kabɨno morapmɨ bo morapmɨ dɨma, uŋun do nandaba kɨk dɨma asat, kɨsi tagɨ gɨn yaŋ nandɨsat.
Yaŋ yaŋban iyɨgɨt, “Nak eno mɨni.” Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Gak kalɨp amɨn paŋ kwɨnɨt abɨ kosirɨ 5 agɨt, da abɨsok amɨn yɨkgamal uŋun ego dɨma. Gak eno mɨni yaŋ bamɨsi yosol.”
Bɨsap morapmɨ Yesu gat paŋdet kabɨni gat uŋun pigaga muwuk muwuk awit, do uwal da kɨsiron yɨpjak amɨn Judas kɨsi uŋun pigaga kaŋ nandaŋyo agɨt.
Ae mɨŋat monjɨyo, ji meŋ datji dakon gen nandaŋek yo morapmon geni guramɨtni. Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋuden aŋpak yolni do galak tosok.
Uŋun monjɨ wɨli aŋalaŋban mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni dɨwarɨni wɨrɨrɨgek iyɨ do tɨmɨtdɨsak, do mani Yesu yaŋ iyɨki.”
Jap noknok bɨsap madep egɨpgwit uŋun dakon mibɨ gɨldat uŋun bɨsap madepsi. Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da pɨdaŋ agek gen papmon da yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda pakbi do asak kaŋ, nagon abɨŋek nosak.
Mani ji da notji nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ amɨn da dabɨlon paŋkɨ gen yaŋ yomaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma!
“Mani kɨla amɨn madep man ɨba don tobɨl kokupnikon apgut. Kokupnikon abɨŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Moneŋ kokwinɨk yomgum oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ yoba apba moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aba niaŋ da noman tawit uŋun do pɨndakgeŋ.’
“Abɨsok jap naŋek butji paptoŋ amɨn, awa! Don jap do akdaŋ. “Abɨsok jɨkgo yanjaŋ amɨn, awa! Don kunam tagakwa dabɨl pakbisi mokdaŋ.
Yaŋban sot amɨn da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, pakbi da wayɨŋ asak bɨsapmon amɨn kɨnda da nak aŋpulugaŋ pakbi ɨdapmon abɨgɨ dɨma nepmaŋdak. Nak pɨgɨk do aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da ŋwapmaŋek pɨgɨ pɨgɨ aŋ.”
Kaŋakwa Pilip da koŋ morapmɨ yol yomɨŋakwan koŋ da madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek wɨŋ abɨgɨwit. Ae amɨn kɨdarɨ kɨmakbi ae kandapmɨ yokwi uŋun paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo agɨt.
Mani Telagɨ Wup da paŋtagap aban aŋpak tagɨsi amaŋ uŋun yaŋ: amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak, ae kɨsɨk kɨsɨk, ae but yaworon da egɨp egɨp aŋpak, ae but yaworon da jɨgɨ pakpak, ae amɨn paŋpulugaŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomyom, ae bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlegɨsi egɨp egɨp,
Gɨldat kɨnda do Pol amɨn 4 kabɨ uŋun tɨmɨkban gɨptɨm paŋkɨlek ak dakon aŋpak aŋek egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aŋek Telagɨ Yut Madepmon wɨgɨ mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn ni bɨsapmon wasɨp aŋek, ae amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ dakon paretni mukwa soni uŋun do Pol da but pɨso yoyɨgɨt.
Aŋakwan sɨkak pakbi kulup mɨrɨmyo da abɨŋ tɨdaŋ tuwɨlba maŋ tasɨk tagɨt.”
Paŋdetni dɨwarɨ Yesu kawit bɨsapmon kɨnda uŋun notni gat dɨma egɨpgwit, mani uŋun Tomas (ae mani kɨnda Yayat).
Dɨwarɨ da on paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon abɨŋ gak da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsal uŋun dakon geni yaŋba nandagɨmaŋ. Gepmaŋ degek kɨk do ani bɨsapmon Piŋkop da nandɨsak uŋun da arɨpmon paŋpulugok abi.
Piŋkop dakon man madepni dagok dagogɨ mɨni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak teban. Uŋun asi.
Yesu da mibɨltaŋ nimɨŋek nin paŋpulugok do uŋungwan kɨlɨ wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dagaŋek dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨ wɨgɨkdɨsak. Uŋun Melkisedek yombem.
Yaŋba yutgwan amɨn kɨnda da Yesu iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo padɨk padɨkgo yomakon abeŋ da gak gat yaŋ nandat ak do yoŋ.”
Nido Piŋkop Kristokon pi aŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn morap mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun tɨmɨk iyɨkon paŋapban but kaloŋ awit. Uŋun yokwi morapni awit uŋun do saŋbeŋek dɨma nandaŋ yomgut. Ae Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo tɨmɨk iyɨkon paŋapban but kaloŋ ani dakon gen bin mɨŋat amɨnyokon yoyɨneŋ uŋun dakon pi nimgut.
Aŋakwan oman mɨŋatjok uŋun da Pita aeni kaŋek amɨn uŋudon akgwit yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn uŋun Yesu da kabɨkon nani kɨnda.”
Amɨn kɨnda jap do tepmɨ nandɨsak kaŋ yutnikon nosak. Yaŋ aŋek muwutni bɨsapmon gulusuŋ dɨma aŋek kobogɨ dɨma tɨmɨtjak. Gen dɨwarɨ dayɨgɨ uŋun opbeŋ bɨsapmon don dayɨkeŋ.
Ae amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ Moses dakon gen teban dɨma abɨdawit amɨn gat egɨsat bɨsapmon, gen teban da yoŋgamgwan dɨma egɨsat yombem da egɨsat, nido uŋun amɨn tɨmɨt do nandɨsat. Mani Piŋkop dakon gen teban dɨma yɨpmaŋ dekdat, nak Kristo dakon gen teban yoldat.
Asi, nin Piŋkop egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ dakon Monji manji ɨmneŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da kobogɨ yokwisi nimdɨsak do pasol pasol madepsi aneŋ.
Kɨmagakwa bɨt kɨla amɨn da tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ kokupmon bɨt gat ae koŋni toŋ amɨn gat dakon geni amɨn yoyɨwit.
Kɨŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak dakon bɨsap uŋun kwaŋ tosok uŋun dakon gen yaŋ teŋteŋoni.
Yaŋ aba pi ami da aeni oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekdak. Uŋun pi monjɨ busuŋɨkon aŋagek yo yokwisi aŋɨmgwit.
Mani mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨŋek bɨsit asak, bo kombɨ gen yosok kaŋ, uŋun da busuŋni eni abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak. Uŋun busuŋ daŋgwani kɨsi mandaŋ mudosok yaŋ asak.
Kapaneam kokupmon ekwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
“Yoni mɨni amɨn egek kɨmakban aŋelo da abɨdaŋ aŋkɨ yɨpba Abraham gat egɨpgumal. Egakwal yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun yo kɨsi kɨmakban wayɨkgwit.
Nak Pol Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Piŋkop da iyɨ da galak togon yabekbi pi namgut. Nak gat ae notnin Sostenes gat
Amɨn kɨnda don kɨmot do aŋek, yo kabɨni namɨn da tɨmɨtjak yaŋ dakon but pɨso papia kɨnda mandɨsak. Aŋek kɨmotjak bɨsapmon monjɨ uŋun papia yolek dat da yo kabɨ manjɨŋ ɨmgut uŋun tɨmɨt do nandɨsak kaŋ, mibɨltok datni asi kɨmakgɨt amɨn da yaŋ nandaŋakwa yo kabɨni tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.
Ji do bɨsit asat bɨsap morapmon nak kɨsɨk kɨsɨgon da asat.
Yaŋ aban kaŋakwa Elaija gat Moses gat altaŋbal Yesu gat gen yaŋ nandat aba pɨndakgwit.
Amɨn dɨwarɨ iyɨ do amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nandaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ do nandaba pɨwit. Yesu da uŋun amɨn do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt.
“Nak Juda amɨn kɨnda. Meŋno da Tasas kokup pap Silisia mɨktɨmon tosok uŋudon aŋalagɨt. Mani nak on kokup papmon tagagɨm. Yoyɨŋdetno Gamaliel uŋun da nak babɨknin dakon gen teban morap tagɨsi nayɨŋ dekgɨt. Ji Piŋkop dakon pi but dasi aŋ, nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn aŋ kɨmakgɨm.
“Mɨktɨmon amɨn ekwaŋ, awa! Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yokwikon depdaŋ. Mani yokwi ani do yabetdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Sipsip Kɨla Amɨn Mibɨltogɨ da altaŋ teŋteŋosak bɨsapmon tomni wagɨl tagɨsi uŋun abɨdokdaŋ. Tomni toktok teban tosak ae dɨma tasɨk togɨ uŋun naŋ abɨdokdaŋ.
Monjɨ buŋon nani da datni yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Dat, gak peno gat nit do yo morap nim do nandɨsal uŋun nak dakon dɨwarɨno abɨsok kokwinɨk nabi.’ Yaŋ yaŋban datni da yo kabɨni kokwinɨk monjɨ bamotni do yomgut.
Wɨli 7 kabɨ kɨsi da pawit, do amɨn da kɨmoron da pɨdoni bɨsap madepmon namɨn dakon mɨŋatni asak?”
Pol dakon gen da moneŋ ɨlɨt kositnin aŋupbal akdɨsak do nak si pasoldot. Piŋkop madep Atemis dakon telagɨ yut do amɨn da nandaba yo ɨsalɨsi akdɨsak. Aŋek Atemis dakon man madepni mokdɨsak. Esia mɨktɨmon ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi uŋun piŋkop mɨŋat naŋ gawak ɨmaŋ. Mani Pol da uŋun dakon man madep abɨŋ yɨp do pi asak.”
Yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Uŋun asi, nak naga joŋɨgek yaŋkwok asat. Nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun nandɨsat, do yaŋkwok asat uŋun bamɨsi yosot. Mani nak dukwan da apgum ae dukwan kɨkeŋ uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Piŋkop da ji kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt da iyɨ dakon telagɨ mɨŋat amɨnyo egakwa but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak. Do ji aŋpak oden baŋ yolek ani: Ji mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨsi morap do bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek yo tagɨsi aŋyomni. Ji dɨsi do nandaba pɨŋakwa mɨŋat amɨnyo aŋpak yaworɨsi aŋyomɨŋek but yaworon da jɨgɨ pani.
Juda amɨn, bo Grik amɨn, bo Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi da yokwikon moni dakon aŋpak kɨnda dɨma ani.
Yaŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn jiyo kɨsi, awa! Ji amɨn gen teban mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ jɨgɨsi guramɨtni do yoyaŋ, mani kɨsitjok kɨnda yomɨŋek paŋpulugaŋek guramɨt do dɨmasi nandaŋ.
Yɨgakwa uŋun muwut muwut yut dakon kɨla amɨn da gen teban ae kombɨ amɨn gen Piŋkop da papiakon toŋ uŋun baŋ dɨwarɨ manjɨŋ mudaŋek Pol gat dabɨni gat do gen yaŋ yɨpba pɨgɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, ji amɨn dakon but paŋteban ak do gen dɨ yok do nandaŋ kaŋ tagɨ yoni.”
Piŋkop kaloŋ dagɨn gen teban paŋalon agɨt, uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn Gen Kokwin Amɨn egɨsak. Ae uŋun kaloŋ dagɨn mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwikon baŋ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak, ae tagɨ paŋupbal asak. Do gak namɨn da amɨn dakon aŋpakni kokwin asal?
Yesu mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep gen yoyɨŋakwan meŋi padɨk padɨkni paŋabɨŋ yomakon agek Yesu gat yaŋ nandat ak do yawit.
Nin da wupji paŋpulugok do yo tagɨsi ji da binapmon kwaokgɨmaŋ, do ji da nin do gɨptɨm dakon yo paŋpulugoni uŋun da jɨgɨ damjak, ma?
Nak Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo dakon pɨŋbinisi egɨsat, mani nandaŋ yawok namɨŋek pi uŋun namgut. Pi uŋun Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ. Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun Kristo da nin do yo tagɨsi morap agɨt da asak, amɨn nin da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi kokwinɨgek manjɨneŋ uŋun do yosok.
Yaŋ yaŋba aeni yoyɨŋakwan kosirɨ kapbɨ aŋakwan yaŋ yagɨt, “Mibɨlɨ nido? Ni gulusuŋ naŋ agɨt? Aŋatno kɨmotjak da arɨpmon yokwi kɨnda dɨma agɨt kosot. Do yum baljaŋek yɨpbo kɨsak.”
Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm nelagɨ toŋ tɨm yombem, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop gen nandaŋek abɨdoŋ. Uŋun amɨn bamɨ 100, ae kɨnda bamɨ 60, ae kɨnda bamɨ 30, yaŋ taŋ taŋ aŋ.”
Not kabɨ, butningwan da nin gwaljɨgɨ mɨni yaŋsi nandamaŋ kaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon pasol pasolɨ mɨni atneŋ.
Mani nak Belsebul da aŋpulugaŋban koŋ yoldat kaŋ, dɨsi dakon notji koŋ yolgaŋ uŋun amɨn kabɨ ni tapmɨmon da koŋ yolgaŋ? Uŋun amɨn kabɨ da genji kokwinɨgek gulusuŋ yoŋ yaŋ tagɨ dayɨni.
Abɨŋek uŋun oman monjɨ tepmɨ pi ɨmɨŋek yɨpban jamba but amɨn gat kunam tagek iyoŋ iyoŋ yaŋ tɨdaŋek egɨpdaŋ.”
Yaŋban amɨn da gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kristo uŋun altaŋek dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsak, Piŋkop dakon gen teban papia da yaŋ yosok. Do gak da Amɨn Dakon Monji aŋenotdaŋ yaŋ nido yosol? Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun namɨn amɨn kɨnda?”
Yaŋ iyɨŋban kɨla amɨn uŋun yoni morapmɨsi do but yokwi madepsi nandagɨt.
Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨsak amɨn uŋun napbɨ gwapbokon kɨsak. Do gak napbɨ gwapbo tagɨsi uŋudon tebaisi kɨŋek egɨp egɨp teban abɨdoki. Tebai agek nandaŋ gadatgo amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yaŋ teŋteŋagɨl bɨsapmon, Piŋkop da egɨp egɨp abɨdoki do kɨlɨ yaŋ gamgut.
Kalbi dɨpmɨn pokdok ae gɨldat kalba waŋga waŋga agakwan jap yet kwoŋ. Mani niaŋsi aŋek kwoŋ uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ dɨma nandɨsak.
Gen kɨlegɨsi baŋgɨn yoki kaŋ, amɨn da gulusuŋ kɨnda dɨma kokdaŋ. Ae uwal da gen yokwi kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma niyɨkdaŋ, nandak nandak yokwini do mayagɨ pakdaŋ.
Aŋakwan Yesu dakon ɨmalni kwakwagɨsi teŋteŋagɨt. Uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma agagɨ, kwakwagɨsi agɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Yo Sisa dakon uŋun Sisa iyɨ do ɨmdo, ae yo Piŋkop dakon uŋun Piŋkop iyɨ do ɨmdo.”
Mani amɨn kɨsi da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “On amɨn aŋakbɨ kɨmagakwan Barabas naŋ yɨpbɨ ninon apjak!”
Amɨn kɨnda da gen yaŋ gam do aban gen kokwin tamokon kɨk do kosiron kɨnjil bɨsapmon genjil uŋun yaŋ aŋmɨlɨp ak do pi anjil. Yaŋ dɨma aŋek kwal gen kokwin kɨla agak amɨn da obip amɨn da kɨsiron gepban uŋun da dam teban yutnon gepdɨsak.
Jap yet tɨŋtɨŋaŋakwan dɨwarɨ kosiron maŋba mɨnam da abɨŋ nawit.
Nin kɨsi Wup kaloŋɨ gɨn abɨdagɨmaŋ, ae nin gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ. Piŋkop da ji yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn jomjom ani do yaŋ damgut.
Obɨŋ Pita dakon tek nandaŋ burɨkon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandagɨt. Yaŋ nandaŋek yoma dɨma wɨtdalek tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ notni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pita yoma domon akdak!”
Yesu burɨ da bupmɨsi nandaŋek paŋdet kabɨni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Pigaga jap bamɨ madepsi taŋ pektaŋ, mani pi monjɨ bamɨ pakpak amɨn morapmɨ dɨma.
Yaŋdo, nak dakon aŋpak pakyaŋsi yolni.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Gen yosok uŋun koŋni toŋ amɨn dakon gen naŋ dɨma yosok. Koŋ da dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn arɨpmɨ dɨma aŋmɨlɨp agagɨ.”
Iyɨŋban Pol Korin egakwan bɨlak kɨnda mudaŋakwan ae bɨlak kɨnda dakon kanek 6 kabɨ egek Piŋkop dakon gen yoyɨŋ dekgɨt.
Aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi kɨlani aki do yaŋ mudaŋ gabo man madep paki. On mɨktɨm madep kɨsi nak dakon, do amɨn kɨnda do ɨm do nandakeŋ kaŋ tagɨ ɨbeŋ.
Ji nagon saŋbeŋba nak da jikon saŋbekeŋ. Wain kɨlɨŋɨ obikon dɨma saŋbesak kaŋ, bamɨ dɨma tosak. Yaŋgɨn jiyo nagon dɨma saŋbeni kaŋ, bamɨ dɨma tokdaŋ.
Mani nin nin, bo ae aŋelo kɨnda Kwen Kokupsi da pɨŋ, Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨnda nin da yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ damgumaŋ uŋudeŋsi dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Ji kaloŋ kaloŋ notji do jomjom dɨma aŋek jap tepmɨ tɨmɨgek naŋ naŋ aŋek wain morapmɨ naŋek but upbal aŋ. Aŋakwa dɨwarɨ jap do aŋ.
Mani yaŋ nayɨgɨt, “Nak dakon tapmɨm amɨn tapmɨmni mɨnikon pi tagɨsi asak, do nak nandaŋ yawok gamɨŋek tagɨ aŋpulugokdɨsat.” Uŋun da yaŋ nayɨgɨt, do nak abɨsok tapmɨmno mɨni da egɨsat uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asat, nido Kristo dakon tapmɨmni nagon tosak do nandɨsat.
Ji kɨsi morap Kristo dakon gɨptɨm tɨm ekwaŋ, ae ji kaloŋ kaloŋ gɨptɨm dɨwatni ekwaŋ.
Amɨn Kwen Kokup da pɨŋ mɨktɨmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo do egɨp egɨp yomɨsak uŋun Piŋkop dakon bretni.”
Ji dɨsi dogɨn nandaba kɨk aŋek yo dɨma ani, bo man madep pak do aŋek yo dɨma ani. Amɨn dɨwarɨ do gawak yomɨŋek man madep yomni.
Gak nipbɨ kɨmakbi tamokon dɨma tokeŋ. Telagɨ amɨngo dakon gɨptɨm aŋkutnaŋaki dɨma mɨktosak.
aban yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn kabɨ gen yoŋ uŋun kɨsi morap Galili amɨn gɨn, ma?
Amɨn gɨptɨmɨ pap tosak bo ae uŋudon gɨn maŋ pagek kɨmotjak yaŋ nandawit. Mani bɨsap dubagɨ egɨ kaŋba Pol da gɨptɨmon yo kɨnda dɨma altaŋ ɨmgut yaŋ kaŋek nandak nandakni kulabɨk aŋek yawit, “On amɨn uŋun piŋkop kɨnda.”
Piŋkop da busuŋ daŋgwanji niaŋ da toŋ uŋun kɨsisi nandaŋ mudosok, do ji dɨma pasolni. Mɨnam monɨŋ monɨŋ morapmɨ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun madep dɨma, mani ji dakon yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi.”
Ji Yesu dɨma kawit, mani but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ. Abɨsok dɨma koŋ, mani nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋek but galaksi nandaŋ. But galak uŋun da mɨktɨm dakon kɨsɨk kɨsɨk morap yapmaŋ mudosok. Uŋun gen kagɨnin da arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋaŋ mudogɨ. Dɨmasi.
Ae mɨktɨmon datnin do nandani. Uŋun da nin paŋkɨlek ak do jɨgɨ nimɨŋakwa nandano wukwan yomgumaŋ. Yaŋ agɨmaŋ do wupnin dakon Datni da nin paŋkɨlek asak bɨsapmon uŋun do madepsi gawak ɨmɨŋek egɨp egɨp abɨdoneŋsi.
Wɨgakwan Yesu uŋun pik kɨndap akgɨron abɨŋ kwen sɨŋtaŋek Sakius kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sakius, gak tepmɨ pɨ. Nak abɨsok gak da yutnon paŋkɨ yɨtdeŋ dosi nandɨsat.”
Ji aŋpak tagɨsi tebai yol kɨmagek ani kaŋ, namɨn da yo yokwi aŋ damjak?
Timoti, gak nandaŋ gadat asal do nak da gandabo gak monjɨnosi asal. On papia gak do mandaŋ gamɨsat. Piŋkop Dat ae Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon bupmɨni gat ae but yawotni gat gagon tosak.
Yaŋdo, gen kɨnda yoŋ uŋun bamɨ, ‘Amɨn kɨnda da jap kwaokdak, ae kɨnda da bamɨ pasak.’
tamoni do Piŋkop da yo madepsi ɨmdɨsak. Mɨktɨmon egɨpjak bɨsapmon yo morap kalɨp yopmaŋ dekgɨt uŋun dakon tɨlak yapmaŋek yo morapmɨ ɨmdɨsak. Uŋun amɨn da yutni, peni padɨk padɨkyo, sami, meŋi, mɨŋat monjɨyo ae mɨktɨm morapmɨsi tɨmɨtdɨsak. Mani uŋun gɨn dɨma, amɨn da yo yokwi aŋyomdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋakwa bɨsap madep apjak bɨsapmon egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda nak nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨŋek telagɨ pakbi sosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Kwen Kokup do amɨn asak. Ae amɨn kɨnda nak dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Nandaŋ yawot uŋun amɨnon tugagɨt da tosok, do nin kɨsisi gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋpulugaŋakwan gɨsamɨ toŋ ekwamaŋ.
Ae ji Kristo dakon, ae Kristo uŋun Piŋkop dakon.
Mani not kabɨ, Amɨn Tagɨ da ji do but dasi galak taŋ damɨsak. Nin toktogɨsi ji do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Nido Piŋkop da yo morap dɨma wasaŋban noman taŋakwa ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt. Telagɨ Wup da ji paŋtelak aban gen bamɨ nandaŋ gadaŋba uŋun kosiron da ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Ae uŋun da nin paŋpulugaŋban saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ dakon pi amɨn dagagɨmaŋ. Saŋbek saŋbek uŋun gen teban papiakon mandawit uŋun yombem dɨma, uŋun Wup dakon yo. Gen teban da amɨn dapban kɨmokgoŋ, mani Wup da egɨp egɨp yomɨsak.
Do jikon yɨpbo opjak do tagɨsi nandɨsat, nido ji uŋun aesi kaŋek but galaksi nandaŋek egɨpdaŋ, ae nak dakon but kɨsi yaworɨ tokdɨsak.
Yaŋba Yesu da paŋdet kabɨni pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn iyɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma ani, mani Piŋkop da yo morap ak do tagɨ asak.”
Uŋun Telagɨ Yut uŋun ɨmal baŋ yut kabeŋ kɨnda yut burɨ bamorɨ yaŋ wɨtjɨwit. Yut burɨ mibɨltogɨkon teŋteŋɨ yopyop tamo gat, ae bret yopyop tamo gat, ae telagɨ bret gat uŋun da tawit. Uŋun yut burɨ do Yut Burɨ Telagɨ yaŋ yawit.
Yaŋ yaŋban paŋdetni da Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn do yosok yaŋ nandaba pɨsagɨt.
Amɨn do but dasi galaktaŋ yomyom aŋpak asak amɨn jɨgɨ da arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ yɨpmaŋdak. Bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat aŋek aŋpulugosak do jomjom asak, ae jɨgɨ bɨsapmon tebaisi akdak.
Gapman dakon emat amɨn da Yesu abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ gapman dakon yut madepmon wɨgakwa emat amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi abɨŋ Yesu aŋgwasɨŋek akgwit.
Telagɨ Wup dakon but galak dakon yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, mani Wup kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn egɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨkon gadaŋek tebai akgaŋ yaŋ nandamaŋ, do nin egɨp egɨp bamɨsi ekwamaŋ.
Mani amɨn morap tebaisi sigɨn agakwa wɨgɨ mibɨ bɨsapmon wɨgɨsak uŋun Piŋkop da pulugaŋ yopdɨsak.
Uŋun nin dakon tagɨ tɨmnin do aŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Mɨktɨm pɨdosok amɨn gat ae wit gɨp mɨsɨŋɨkdak amɨn bamot bamɨ nokdamak yaŋ nandaŋek pini amal.
Amɨn morapmɨ mɨktɨm dakon aŋpagon da mani pawɨkwaŋ, do nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn abeŋ.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋban nandaŋakwa Sol Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn gat Jerusalem egɨpgwit. Egek pasol pasolɨ mɨni agek Yesu da manon Piŋkop gen yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Not kabɨ, yaŋsi dayɨsat. Amɨn da gɨptɨm dapba kɨmagakwa uŋun da kwenon yo dɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma akdaŋ, do uŋun do dɨma pasolni.
Nandani, amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok buŋon ekwaŋ, uŋun don mibɨltok amɨn akdaŋ. Ae amɨn dɨwarɨ abɨsok mibɨltok ekwaŋ, uŋun don buŋon amɨn akdaŋ.”
Yesu kɨŋ Betpage ae Betani paŋkapmat agɨt. Uŋun kokup bamot Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal. Uŋudon da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
“Nak ɨdon opgum bɨsapmon gen yaŋ ɨmgwit amɨn nak gat kɨsi opgumaŋ. Obɨŋek nak bɨsap noknok dɨma agɨm. Pakgɨmaŋ da wɨsa dagokdo gen pi yutnon yɨgek uŋun amɨn aŋopni do yoyɨgɨm.
Uŋun nak da naga yabekgo abeŋ do gak uŋun gat pɨgɨ kɨk do but bamot dɨma aki.”
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da abɨŋ ‘Nak Kristo’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Ae dɨwarɨ da ‘Nak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda’ yaŋ top yokdaŋ. Yaŋ yaŋek wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ akdaŋ. Aŋek mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ Piŋkop da iyɨ do kɨlɨ manjɨkbi uŋun paŋkewal do pini madep akdaŋ. Mani arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋkewaldaŋ.
Mani Juda amɨn da Pol dakon gen abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba ɨmalnikon jɨmjɨm tawit tarapmɨkban maŋakwa yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Tɨpdom do amɨn ani kaŋ, gulusuŋ uŋun dɨsi dakon, nak dakon dɨma. Nak abɨsok Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon kɨŋ Piŋkop dakon gen uŋudon yokeŋ.”
Yolakwal Yesu da tobɨl pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yo ninaŋ wɨsamal?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨgɨmal, “Rabai, gak dukon egɨsal?” (“Rabai” uŋun gen dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun “Yoyɨŋdet.”)
Mani Amɨn Tagɨ da Ananias yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨki! Uŋun amɨn nak dakon man yaŋ teŋteŋosak do manjɨgɨm. Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ, ae uŋun dakon kɨla amɨn madep kabɨni, ae Israel amɨn kabɨ kɨsikon mano yaŋ teŋteŋosak do yabetdɨsat.
Yesu paŋdetni gat Galili mɨktɨmon muwugek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da uwal da kɨsiron yɨpba
Juda amɨn dakon Yapyap Bɨlak kapmat taŋakwan Yesu Jerusalem kɨgɨt.
Yesu tɨmɨsok dɨ kɨŋek ae amɨn bamorɨ gat pɨndakgɨt, kɨnda uŋun Jems, Sebedi dakon monji, ae padɨge Jon. Uŋun bamot gat datni gat boron yɨgek tap kɨlap sɨmɨl sɨmɨl yɨkni bɨsawɨk paŋmɨlɨp aŋyo aŋakwal pɨndakgɨt. Pɨndagek yaŋ yoban
Ae jap yet tɨpmɨ toŋ tɨmon mawit, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop gen nandaŋ abɨdaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋ dakon tɨlak. Mani gelɨ tagɨ dɨma yɨpban kɨgɨt. Do nandaŋ gadat bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok aŋek paŋkewal altaŋ yoba tepmɨsi Piŋkop manji ɨmɨŋ mudoŋ.
Yaŋ kosok, do kɨŋ koŋ 7 kabɨ iyɨ yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi gat tɨmɨkban kwa uŋun yutnon egek aŋpak yokwisi aŋ. Mibɨltok uŋun amɨn yokwi egɨpgut, mani abɨsok uŋun yapmaŋek wagɨl yokwisi egɨsak.”
Kɨndap tagɨ da bamɨ tagɨ pokgoŋ, ae kɨndap yokwi da bamɨ yokwi pokgoŋ.
Ae bret 7 kabɨ baŋ amɨn 4 tausen do yobo naŋakwa dɨwarɨ yɨk morapmɨ sɨmɨlba tugawit ji uŋun do si ɨŋtoŋ?
Yaŋ yaŋek yutnikon kɨŋ altaŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ dɨma wɨgɨni do yoyɨŋek Pita, Jon, ae Jems gat, ae mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo gat tɨmɨkban yutnon wɨgɨwit.
Disi jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani uŋun amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandɨsak. Nak jap morap kɨsi tagɨ noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsat. Do nido amɨn kɨnda da jap uŋun noneŋ kaŋ uŋun suŋ amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋakwan jap uŋun yopbeŋ?
Nak ae opbeŋ bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ji da dabɨlon abɨŋ nepjak do pasoldot. Kalɨp jikon amɨn morapmɨ da aŋpak ɨŋani morapmɨ, ae yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ awit. Nak obɨŋ dandakeŋ bɨsapmon ji but tobɨl dɨma aŋek uŋun aŋpak yokwi morap sigɨn aba dandakeŋ kaŋ, nak bupmɨsi nandakeŋ.
“Uŋun do aŋek ji kaŋ kɨmotni. Ji yut dakon ami ni bɨsapmon apjak uŋun dɨma nandaŋ. Apjak bɨsap uŋun pɨlɨndo bo kalbi binap bo pup da gen yosok bɨsapmon bo wɨsa dagokdo uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Mani wasok wasogɨkon Piŋkop da amɨn wasaŋek ‘mɨŋat ae wɨliyo kɨsi wasagɨt.’
Paŋkewal jikon noman toŋ uŋun ŋwakŋwarɨ dɨma, uŋun amɨn morap kɨsikon yaŋ gɨn noman toŋ. Ae Piŋkop toktok teban ji gat egek paŋpulugosok, do ji paŋteban aŋakwan paŋkewalon dɨma maŋek tebaisi atdaŋ. Paŋkewal noman taŋ damni bɨsapmon Piŋkop da pulugaŋ kɨni dakon kosit kɨnda yɨpdɨsak, aŋakwan yokwikon dɨma mokdaŋ.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kɨŋ ego iyɨŋbɨ tobɨl apjil.”
Saimon Pita da notni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak tap kɨlap ɨlɨt do kɨsat.” Yaŋban yawit, “Nin kɨsin kɨneŋ.” Yaŋ yaŋek boron wɨgek kɨwit. Mani uŋun kalbi tap kɨlap kɨnda dɨma ɨlɨkgwit.
Yaŋban Yesu da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep tɨmtɨm yaŋek apba pɨndagek koŋ tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Koŋ, gen kaga ae mɨrak sopsop amɨn, gak monjɨ on yɨpmaŋdet! Wagɨl kɨŋek buŋon on monjɨgwan dɨmasi pɨgɨki!”
Kɨla amɨn uŋun aŋpak kɨlegɨsi gɨn aŋakwan amɨn da gulusuŋni kɨnda dɨma koni, ae mɨŋat kaloŋɨ dakon eni egɨpjak, ae iyɨ dakon kɨla tagɨsi asak, ae nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn asak, ae amɨn yutnikon kwa kɨlani tagɨ asak, ae yoyɨŋdet agakni uŋun tagɨsi.
Yum kaŋakwa Kristo da but yawot damɨsak uŋun da nandak nandakji kɨla asak. Nido, Piŋkop da ji iyɨ do manjɨŋek butji yaworɨ taŋakwan gɨptɨm kaloŋɨ egɨpni do nandɨsak. Ae ji yo morap do Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Pol gɨldat morapmɨ Korin egek don paŋmuwukbi galok gen yoyɨŋek Prisila gat Akwila gat tɨmɨkban Senkria kokupmon pɨgɨwit. Pɨgɨ altaŋek Pol Piŋkop do yaŋ teban tok kɨnda kɨlɨ agɨt, do busuŋ daŋgwani mandagɨt. Yaŋ aŋek Siria mɨktɨmon kɨk do aŋek tap wakga kɨnda abɨdawit.
Don bɨlak bamorɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Posius Pestus da Peliks dakon tamo abɨdagɨt. Aŋakwan Juda amɨn da Peliks do nandaba tagɨ asak yaŋ do Peliks da Pol dam tebanon sigɨn yɨpban egɨpgut.
Yaŋ nandagɨl, do moneŋno beŋon yopgul tam uŋun tagɨ. Yaŋ agɨl tam abɨŋ nak da moneŋno gat ae beŋ da dɨwarɨ saŋbesak uŋun gat tagɨ tɨmɨkgom.’
Aŋek yaŋ teban tok kɨnda aŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yo nido nayɨki, tagɨ gabeŋ.”
Nak mɨŋat eyo dɨma awit amɨn do Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban kɨnda tosok do dɨma dayɨkdɨsat. Mani naga dakon nandak nandak baŋ yokdɨsat, nido Amɨn Tagɨ da bupmɨ nandaŋ namɨŋek aŋtagap aban gen bamɨ yogok amɨn dagagɨm.
Yesu yolyol amɨn notji morap da gɨldatni tagɨ dayaŋ. Paŋmuwukbi notji gat domdom ani bɨsapmon but dasi tɨmɨtni.
Gɨptɨm dakon dɨwatni kaloŋɨ kɨnda dagɨn tosak tam uŋun gɨptɨm dɨma.
Ji jamba but amɨn, Piŋkop da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon nandak nandak aŋtagap aban ji do gen yaŋsi mandagɨt:
Uŋuden gɨn notni dɨwarɨ kɨsi mɨŋat uŋun paŋek monji mɨni da kɨmakgwit. Kɨmagakwa mɨŋat uŋun don kɨmakgɨt.
Piŋkop da nak yabekban apgum uŋun dakon pini gɨldat kalba aneŋsi. Pɨlɨn tokdɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda da kalbi pi arɨpmɨ dɨma asak.
Do nin aŋpak tagɨsi ak do dɨma kurak toneŋ. Pi aŋek dɨma alek toneŋ kaŋ, jap bamɨ pakpak bɨsapmon bamɨ wagɨl tagɨsi pakdamaŋ.
On mɨktɨm dakon piŋkop toptopmɨ Sunduk uŋun da amɨn nandaŋ gadat dɨma aŋ dakon nandak nandak kositni sopgut. Aban Kristo Piŋkop yombemsi dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon teŋteŋɨni da uŋun amɨn da butgwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨsak.
Mɨŋat amɨn kabɨno Isip amɨn da yo yokwi morapmɨ aŋ yomɨŋakwa kɨlɨ pɨndat. Ae kunam wuwɨkni kɨlɨ nandat do aŋek Isip da kɨsiron baŋ tɨmɨt do pɨsat. Moses kɨlɨ apbɨ yabekgo Isip mɨktɨmon kɨki.’
Aŋek Yesu da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon obip amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae kɨla amɨn gat Yesu abɨdok do apgwit uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji emat agak sɨba gat ae kɨndap kɨrɨŋ gat tɨmɨgek kabo noknok amɨn kɨnda naŋ yaŋ abɨdok do abaŋ, ma?
Amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ namɨŋek yaŋ yoŋ, “Pol nin gat kaloŋɨ ekwamaŋ bɨsapmon pɨŋbi egɨsak, mani dubagɨkon kɨsak bɨsapmon tebai niyɨsak.” Mani nak Pol da ji Kristo da pɨŋbi egek amɨn do aŋpak yaworɨsi aŋ yomgut uŋun do nandaŋek gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun do pakyaŋsi nandani do nandɨsat.
Kɨmagakwan Telagɨ Yut Madep dakon yoma ɨmal uŋun kwen da sulugɨ pɨŋ mibɨlɨkon dagaŋ kɨ tɨmɨ bamorɨ agɨt.
Mɨŋat kɨnda busuŋni dɨma wɨtjɨsak kaŋ, busuŋ daŋgwani kɨsi mandaŋ mudosak. Ae busuŋ daŋgwani pɨsɨpmɨ bo ae warot pak do mayagɨ nandɨsak kaŋ, busuŋni si wɨtjɨsak.
Amɨn uŋun kɨmokdok kaŋ, but pɨso gen uŋun pini toŋ asak. Mani but pɨso mandagɨt amɨn egɨsak kaŋ, but pɨso mandagɨt uŋun ɨsal tosok.
Yesu Kristo Amɨn Tagɨnin ae Yokwikon Baŋ Tɨmɨt Tɨmɨt Amɨnin, uŋun da ji do nandaŋ yawok damɨŋakwan pakyaŋsi nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Yum kaŋakwa Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni da jikon paptaŋ madep tosak. Aŋakwan uŋun dakon nandak nandak morap saŋbeŋek tɨmɨtni. Yesu uŋun abɨsok ae bɨsap dagok dagogɨ mɨni man madepni taŋ aŋaŋ kɨkdɨsak, do aŋkɨsɨŋ kɨmotneŋ. Uŋun asi.
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da donki kɨnda kaŋ uŋun da kwenon yɨkgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun bamɨ toŋ agɨt.
Datji egapbo ji da nak dakon monjɨ gwayono egɨpni. Amɨn Tagɨ Tapmɨm Ami da gen on yosok.”
Nin Amɨn Tagɨ da yo uŋun agɨt uŋun do nandaneŋ, aŋek nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop yolgaŋ amɨn paŋkewal noman taŋ yomni kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun paŋkewalon baŋ tɨmɨtjak dakon kosit nandɨsak, ae amɨn yokwi kobogɨ do yo yokwisi yomdɨsak, aŋakwan wɨgɨ Piŋkop da amɨn kokwin akdɨsak da gɨldaron wɨgɨkdɨsak.
Obɨŋ gen teban dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨni kɨnda da Yesu aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨgɨt,
Aŋakwa Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn Parisi da kabɨkon nani uŋun da Yesu dakon paŋdetni do yaŋba yokwi tok aŋek yaŋ yoyɨwit, “Ji jap pakbiyo takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn ae yokwi pakpak amɨn gat nido aŋ?”
Sonda wɨsa dagokdo pɨlɨn tuk taŋakwan gɨn Maria Makdala kokupmon nani kɨmakbi tamokon apgut. Abɨŋ kaŋban kɨmakbi tamo dakon yoma sopgwit dakon tɨp kɨlɨ aŋtobɨlba kɨgɨt kagɨt.
Piŋkop gen da uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Gak da mukwa sogok amɨn dagok dagogɨ mɨni egɨpdɨsal. Gak mukwa sogok amɨn Melkisedek yombem.”
Yaŋ yaŋba Pita da tebaisi yaŋek yagɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, amɨn uŋun yoŋ nak dɨmasi nandaŋ ɨmɨsat. Top yosot kaŋ, Piŋkop da nak tagɨ aŋupbal asak!” Yaŋ yaŋakwan uŋudon gɨn pup gen yagɨt.
Ji Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun dɨma manjɨŋ nandawit? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak amɨn da yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.
Awa kaloŋɨ da tɨlagon egek amɨn kɨnda da tebaisi yagɨt, “On Galili amɨn kɨnda! Do asisi, on amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgumal!”
Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ do nandaŋek paŋtagap ano amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomni, aŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomni. Nin uŋun do nandak nandak aneŋ.
Mɨrɨm sɨkakyo madepsi da dagok dagogɨ mɨni aŋakwan gɨldat morapmɨ agɨpgumaŋon gɨldat dabɨl gat ae gɨk gat dɨma pɨndakgɨmaŋ. Ae nin pulugaŋ kɨneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandagɨmaŋ. Nin kɨsisi pasɨldamaŋ yaŋ nandagɨmaŋ.
Gen teban dakon pi uŋun nin gen pikon nipmaŋek pasɨlneŋ do yosok. Mani uŋun teŋteŋɨ madepni gat apgut, do nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop da dabɨlon kɨlek tok dakon pi uŋun dakon tɨlɨmni uŋun wagɨl madepsi daman.
Yaŋ aŋek naga do yaŋsi yokeŋ, “Nak bɨlak morapmɨ tagɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ kɨkeŋ dakon yo morapno arɨpmɨsi. Do yaworɨsi egek jap pakbiyo madepsi aŋek bɨsap morapmɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek egɨpbeŋ.” ’
Mani amɨn nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi Kwen Kokupmon nani baŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun da aŋpak yaŋ aŋ: Mibɨltok nandak nandak gwaljɨgɨ mɨni uŋun yolgaŋ, ae uŋun da buŋon amɨn gat but kaloŋsi ekwaŋ, ae aŋpak yaworɨ aŋ yomaŋ, aŋek pɨŋbisi egek amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon gen nandaŋek ekwaŋ, ae amɨn do bupmɨsi nandaŋ yomɨŋek aŋpak tagɨsi aŋyomaŋ. Uŋun amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋpak tɨlak kaloŋɨkon gɨn aŋyomaŋ. Ae jamba but aŋpak dɨma aŋ, uŋun aŋpak tagɨ yol kɨmokgoŋ.
Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do awit. Kɨsit kɨlda amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Demitius. Uŋun amɨn silwa baŋ kokup kɨdat mɨŋat Atemis uŋun dakon wup wasagɨt. Moneŋ ɨlɨt pi aŋek pi monjɨni moneŋ madepsi tɨmɨkgwit.
Amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban wugɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da uŋun amɨn abɨŋ yɨpdɨsak. Mani amɨn kɨnda iyɨ do nandaban pɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da mani awɨgɨkdɨsak.”
Egakwan mɨrɨm madep aŋakwan paŋdetni pakbi wayɨt do aŋtɨdok aŋakwa pɨndakgɨt. Yaŋ pɨndagek wɨsa wɨsa do pakbi ɨdapmon bamaŋ bamaŋ kɨŋek kɨŋ paŋdetni yap do agɨt.
Mɨŋat kɨnda monjɨ altok do aŋakwan tepmɨ madepsi nandɨsak. Mani monjɨ altaŋakwan tepmɨ uŋun pasak dakon nandak nandak dɨma asak. Monjɨ mɨktɨmon kɨlɨ altosok uŋun do kɨsɨk kɨsɨk asak.
“Yaŋ iyɨŋban amɨn tagɨ da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Gak pi monjɨno gen guramɨt tagɨsi agɨl. Aŋek pigo dakon kɨla tagɨsi agɨl. Yo monɨŋɨsok gabo kɨla tagɨsi agɨl, do yo madep gabo kɨla tagɨ aki. Gak apbɨ kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ando.’
Do iyɨ gɨn gen emat aŋek si kɨwit. Mani dɨma kɨŋakwa Pol da mibɨ gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Telagɨ Wup da kombɨ amɨn Aisaia aŋtagap aban babɨkji do gen bamɨsi kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt:
“Nayɨŋban iyɨgɨm, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, dɨma, on amɨn kalɨp nak da muwut muwut yut morapmon agek amɨn gak nandaŋ gadaŋ gamgwit uŋun baljaŋek dam tebanon yopgum uŋun nandaŋ namaŋ.
Nak ji paŋpulugok do gen tagɨsi kɨnda dɨma wutjɨko tagɨt. Gen kɨsisi muwut muwut madepmon ae yutjikon dayɨŋ dekgɨm uŋun dɨsi nandaŋ.
Uŋudon gɨn nandaŋakwa wuwɨk madep kɨnda mɨrɨm madep aŋ uŋun da tɨlagon Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt. Pɨŋ uŋun yut yɨkgwiron tugagɨt.
Tap uŋuden mɨktɨm arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋpulugogɨ. Bo bulmakau dakon kok gat ɨktagɨlɨ arɨpmɨ dɨma. Tap uŋuden ɨsal mamno kwaŋ. Mɨrakni toŋ amɨn da gen on pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Pol da yut uŋun egɨpgut uŋun si yumaŋ naŋ naŋ aŋek bɨlak bamorɨ egɨpgut. Egakwan amɨn da yutnikon abɨŋ abɨŋ aŋakwa nandaban tagɨsi agɨt.
Amɨn morap kɨsi bɨsap kaloŋgɨn kɨmagek don gen pikon atdaŋ.
Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨŋatjok kɨnda pasak do manjɨŋ ɨmgwit uŋun butnikon da dɨma pakeŋ yaŋsi nandɨsak, ae amɨn da pasak dosi dɨma iyaŋ, ae iyɨ dakon gɨptɨm dakon galaktok kɨla tagɨ abeŋ yaŋ nandɨsak kaŋ, mɨŋat uŋun dɨma pasak. Uŋun da tagɨ asak.
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨni da yagɨt, ‘Kokup pap 5 kabɨ kɨla aki do man madep gamɨsat.’
Kokup kɨdat Sus uŋun dakon Telagɨ Yut Madepni kokup pap da waŋga kapmatjok tagɨt. Uŋun telagɨ yut dakon mukwa sogok amɨn bulmakau wɨli dɨ jareŋ baŋ paŋtɨlɨm abi uŋun paŋabɨŋ kokup pap da yoma kagakon yopgut. Mukwa sogok amɨn gat ae mɨŋat amɨnyo gat kɨsi amɨn bamot do bulmakau dapmaŋek mukwa soŋ yomdo awit.
Yaŋdo, nak kalɨp obɨŋek jɨgɨ damgum uŋudeŋ ae kosirɨ kɨnda gat jɨgɨ dam do dɨma nandagɨm.
Koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ yaŋ asak. Monjɨno tebai abɨdaŋek maban mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek tarak kwakwagɨ da gen kaganikon pawɨŋ tɨmɨkdak, aŋakwan geni wamtɨmsisak, ae gɨptɨmɨ kɨsisi kɨtɨraŋ kɨsak. Nak paŋdetgoni koŋ yolni do yoyɨko aŋtɨdok aŋ, uŋun da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi yolyolɨ.”
Piŋkop da pi madepsi aban kawit, mani uŋun amɨn kabɨkon morapmɨ da aŋpak yokwi aba tagɨ dɨma nandaŋ yomgut. Do mɨktɨm kɨbɨrɨ amɨn da arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ tɨmon paŋupbal aban kɨmagakwa bumjotni tɨmɨ dukon dɨ taŋ taŋ awit.
Uŋun nak dakon yo. Naga dakon galaktok yolek moneŋno tagɨ kokwinɨk dabeŋ. Nak amɨn do yo tagɨsi aŋapbo gak nido nandaba yokwi tok asal?’ ”
Yaŋ aŋek mibɨltok amɨn da emat amɨn 100 dakon kɨla amɨn bamorɨ yaŋ yoban opbal yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Jil kɨŋ emat amɨn 200 gat, ae oskon akwaŋ amɨn 70 gat, ae jaŋgwa tɨmɨt amɨn 200 gat yaŋ tɨmɨtjil. Tɨmɨkbal tagap taŋek kalbi 9 kilok Sisaria kɨni.
Do nak don jikon aeno abɨŋ altaŋ damdɨsat. Aŋapbo ji nak do but galak nandaŋek Yesu Kristo aŋkɨsini.
Uŋun do Piŋkop da mɨŋat wɨli kɨlɨ paŋmuwukgɨt, do amɨn da dɨma paŋwasekdo.”
Ae amɨn yurɨ kɨnda dakon amɨn da pudaŋ kɨ kabɨ bamot aŋek emat wamjil kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yut tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ.
Mani bɨsap kɨnda apjak, ae kɨlɨ abɨk, uŋun bɨsapmon amɨn Telagɨ Wup da tapmɨmon da, ae aŋpak bamɨsikon da Dat gawak ɨmdaŋ. Dat da uŋuden amɨn da gawak ɨmni do galak tosok.
Nin kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop da niaŋ egɨpneŋ do tɨlak agɨt uŋun da arɨpmon egɨpneŋ. Piŋkop da wasok wasok yaŋ nimgut bɨsapmon niaŋ egɨpgumaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon gɨn egɨpneŋ. Nak paŋmuwukbi morap do gen teban on yɨpmaŋdat.
Aŋakwan amɨn kabi kɨnda da amɨn kɨsirɨ kandapmɨyo kɨmakbi kɨnda wamaŋ aŋaŋ opgwit. Uŋun wayɨgon yɨpba pagakwan aŋaŋ Yesu da akgɨron awɨgɨk do awit.
Aŋek amɨn da madepsi abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek gen pikon yɨpmaŋek yaŋ dagok kɨlegɨ dɨma aŋɨmgwit. Mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni gwayeŋba yerɨ mɨni agɨt.”
Ae jap yet joŋ kelɨ toŋ bɨkbɨkgwan mawit, uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon gen nandaŋek kɨŋ mɨktɨmon egɨp egɨpni do nandaba kɨk aŋ uŋun dakon tɨlak asak. Uŋun moneŋ gat ae on mɨktɨm dakon yo morap gat do galagɨ nandaŋakwa uŋun da wutjɨŋ yomɨŋakwa bamɨ dɨma toŋ.
Yaŋban koŋ da amɨn uŋun ukwayɨgek madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek yɨpmaŋ degek wɨŋ kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋek tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda kokup kɨndakon kɨk do aŋek oman amɨni do pi kokwinɨk yomɨŋek yut dakon kɨla ani do yoyɨsak. Aŋek yoma sopsop dakon kɨla amɨn yoma kɨlani tebai asak do iyɨsak.
Mani Kristo da but galak do yo madepsi nimgut uŋudeŋ gɨn Piŋkop da nin morap kaloŋ kaloŋ do nandaŋ yawotni nimɨŋ nimɨŋ agɨt.
Gaga gen yosol uŋun da tɨlagon gak amɨn kɨlegɨ bo amɨn yokwi yaŋ gayɨkdɨsak.”
Amɨn kabɨ uŋun manjɨŋ yabekbi kabɨ da ɨŋamon yopba akgwit. Agakwa pi uŋun ani do kɨsitni kwenikon wutjɨŋek gɨsam yomɨŋek bɨsit awit.
