Amɨn da ji tɨmɨk paŋpaŋ gen pikon depni bɨsapmon dɨma pasolni. Ni gen baŋ yoyɨneŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon Piŋkop da ni gen dayɨsak uŋun baŋ yoyɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa ji dakon gen dɨma asak, uŋun Telagɨ Wup dakon gen asak.
Amɨn Tagɨ da dabɨlon dɨsi do nandaba pɨni. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ da ji pawɨgɨkdɨsak.
“Niaŋ nandaŋ? Monjɨ bamoron da jɨt amɨn da datni dakon gen guramɨkgɨt?” Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak asisi yosot, takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn yokwi gat ae kosit oba mɨŋat gat da ji gwapmaŋek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kwaŋ.
Not kabɨ, ji kɨla amɨnji gawak yomni. Uŋun amɨn ji dakon wukwisi egek ji da binapmon pi tebai aŋek nawa gen dayaŋ. Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun amɨn kɨla amɨnji egɨpni do paŋalon aŋ yopgut.
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak naga kosit, ae gen bamɨ, ae egɨp egɨp. Daron kɨgɨk kosit ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨmasi tosok. Nak kaloŋgɨn.
Nak Pol, nak Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbini. Piŋkop da iyɨ da galaktogon pi uŋun namgut. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti gat da papia on Piŋkop dakon paŋmuwukbi Korin kokup papmon ekwaŋ gat, ae telagɨ paŋmuwukbi morap Akaia provinskon ekwaŋ, ji kɨsi do mandaŋ damamak.
Kalɨp Israel amɨn da nandawit, uŋudeŋ gɨn ninyo Gen Bin Tagɨsi nandagɨmaŋ. Mani ɨsal nandawit, aŋek Piŋkop gen do dɨma nandaŋ gadawit. Do Gen Bin Tagɨsi uŋun nandawit da dɨma paŋpulugagɨt.
Yaŋsi dayɨsat, bɨsit yaŋ ani kaŋ, tepmɨsi paŋpulugokdɨsak. Mani, Amɨn Dakon Monji mɨktɨmon apjak bɨsapmon amɨn nandaŋ gadatni toŋ pɨndatjak, bo dɨma?”
Kɨŋ altaŋban wain pi dakon kɨla amɨn da uŋun pi monjɨ abɨdaŋ aŋagek bamɨ kɨnda dɨma ɨmɨŋek yɨpba kɨgɨt.
Piŋkop gen papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: “Nak Piŋkop nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgum, do yaŋ teŋteŋok agɨm.” Ae yaŋ gɨn ninyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat amaŋ, do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ.
Nandaŋ gadat dakon bɨsap dɨma altaŋakwan, gen teban da nin dam tebanon nipban egɨpgumaŋ. Dam tebanon sigɨn egapno wɨgɨ nandaŋ gadat dakon bɨsap uŋun altaŋ kɨlɨ noman tagɨt.
Paŋdetgoni da yol ɨmni do bɨsit tebai yoyɨgɨm, mani aŋtɨdok awit.”
Piŋkop gen da yaŋ yosok: “Amɨn kɨnda yo kɨnda do yo madepsi yaŋ nandak do kaŋ, Amɨn Tagɨ dogɨn yo madepsi yaŋ nandaŋ ɨmdo.”
Paŋdetni kɨnda Yesu da but dasi galak taŋ ɨmgut uŋun Yesu da ɨleŋɨkon yɨkgɨt.
Imenius gat Aleksanda gat da yaŋ abal nak da Sunduk da kɨsiron yopgum. Uŋun nandak nandak kɨlegɨ tɨmɨgek buŋon Piŋkop do gen yokwi dɨma yonjil do aŋek uŋun agɨm.
Jon da gapman dakon kɨla amɨn madep Erot tebai kaŋ yagɨt, nido Erot da padɨge dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt, ae aŋpak yokwi dɨ kɨsi agɨt.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ kaloŋɨ kɨnda agɨm uŋun do wɨrɨpdakgwit.
Uŋun babɨknin 12 kabɨkon da dɨwarɨ da Josep do nandaba yokwi tok aŋek amɨn do yomɨŋek tomni tɨmɨkgwit. Tɨmɨkba uŋun amɨn da Josep oman monjɨ egɨpjak do Isip mɨktɨmon aŋkɨwit. Mani Piŋkop uŋun Josep gat egek
Mani, Piŋkop da papiakon gen uŋun do yaŋ yosok: “Yo kalɨp dabɨl da dɨma pɨndakgwit, ae mɨragon da dɨma nandawit, ae nandak nandagon dɨma noman taŋbi, uŋun Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmaŋ amɨn do paŋnoman agɨt.”
Ji yo morapmon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ. Ji Piŋkop tebaisi nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, ae gen tagɨsi yoŋ, ae nandak nandakji toŋ, ae Piŋkop dakon pi ak do galagɨ madepsi nandaŋ. Ae nin do but dasi galaktaŋ nimaŋ. Yaŋdo, nandaŋ yaworon da paret ak do nandaŋ uŋun but dasi nandaŋek kɨlegɨsi ani.
Abɨsok gen on dayɨko jɨgɨsi nandaŋ.
Sonda pɨlɨn kaga paŋdetni Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn do pasalek yut kɨndakon muwugek yoma beŋgan aŋek yɨkgwit. Yɨgakwa Yesu da abɨŋ bɨkbɨk nikon agek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Butji yaworɨ tosak.”
Nak ji mayagɨ dam do gen on dɨma mandɨsat. Ji monjɨ gwayono but dasi galak taŋ damɨsat, do nawa gen on dayɨsat.
“Yaŋdo, kaŋ kɨmotni. Amɨn Tagɨsi ni gɨldaron apdɨsak uŋun ji dɨma nandaŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon da kɨnda mani Judas Iskariot uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨgɨt.
Aŋek topmon da man madep ɨmɨŋ mudaŋek ɨmal gami ɨlɨgek iyɨ dakon pabɨ pɨgɨk paŋ ɨmgwit. Paŋ ɨmɨŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakba kɨmotjak do ɨlɨk aŋaŋ kɨwit.
Yaŋba Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “On amɨn iyɨ yokwi agɨt bo ae meŋ datniyo da yokwi agɨmal uŋun do dɨma. Piŋkop da wasok kɨnda on amɨnon noman aban amɨn da koni do dabɨlɨ mɨni altagɨt.
Yaŋban nandaŋek Juda amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yaŋ yaŋaki gak da buron koŋ kɨnda asisi egɨsak yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Abraham gat kombɨ amɨn gat uŋun kɨsi kɨlɨ kɨmakgwit, mani gak da yosol ‘Amɨn kɨnda da nak dakon gen guramɨtjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn dɨmasi kɨmotjak.’
Pi on naga da nandak nandagon asat tam tomni tagɨ tɨmɨkgom. Mani naga da nandak nandagon dɨma asat. Piŋkop da namgut baŋ asat.
“Nak naga wain obi ae ji kɨlɨŋno morap. Amɨn kɨnda nagon saŋbeŋban nak uŋun amɨnon saŋbekeŋ kaŋ, bamɨ morapmɨ tokdɨsak. Ji nak nipmaŋ degek yo kɨnda arɨpmɨ dɨma ani.
Aŋakwan Parisi amɨn dɨwarɨ da Yesukon abɨŋ aŋkewalek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin da gen tebanon niaŋ tosok? Amɨn kɨnda da mɨŋatni galak toknikon tagɨ kwɨnɨtjak, bo dɨma?”
Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Jikon bret niaŋ da toŋ?” Yaŋban yawit, “Ninon bret 7 ae tap kɨlap monɨŋgok bamorɨsok dagɨn taŋ nimaŋ.”
Mani yopmaŋ kɨk do aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da ji do aeno opbeŋ do nandɨsagon don opbeŋ.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek tap wakgakon wɨgek Epesas yɨpmaŋek kɨgɨt.
Sipsip dakon kɨla amɨn yokwi moneŋ do nandaŋek pi asak uŋun sipsip dakon ami dɨma, do joŋ pɨŋan abɨsak bɨsapmon si pasalek sipsip yopmaŋ kɨsak. Yopmaŋ kɨŋakwan joŋ pɨŋan da obɨŋ sipsip dapmaŋ nok do aŋakwan waseŋ kwaŋ.
Erot da Pita wɨsɨŋ koni do amɨn yabekban kɨŋ wɨsɨwit mani dɨma kawit. Dɨma kawit do Erot da obip amɨn Pita kɨla awit uŋun gen pikon yopmaŋek dapba kɨmotni do yoyɨgɨt. Don Erot Judia mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek Sisaria kokupmon paŋkɨ egɨpgut.
Aŋakwan pi ɨsalni dɨwarɨ da kaŋek burɨ yokwi taŋba kɨŋ amɨn tagɨnikon yo uŋun agɨt do iyɨwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni da Yesukon kɨŋek yaŋ iyɨwit, “Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan namɨn da amɨn dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek man madepni toŋ?”
Nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda amɨn monɨŋ da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun abɨdoŋ uŋun da tɨlak dɨma abɨdoni kaŋ, uŋungwan arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨkdaŋ.”
Mani Yesu da kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Bret dagɨn amɨn egɨp egɨp tagɨ dɨma yomjak. Piŋkop dakon gen kɨsi morap paŋek egɨp egɨp paŋ.’ ”
Not kabɨno, ji nak dakon aŋpak baŋ yolek ani. Nin ji gat egɨpgumaŋ bɨsapmon aŋpak tagɨsi aŋapno amɨn dɨwarɨ da pɨndagek yolgwit. Ji uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo baŋsi pɨndak kɨmagek aŋpakni uŋun si yolni.
Nit Piŋkop gat pi kaloŋɨ amaŋ. Ae ji Piŋkop dakon pigagani. Ji Piŋkop dakon yutni.
Wɨsa dagokdo 9 kilok aŋakwan aŋakgwit.
Yesu uŋun gat gɨldat bamorɨ egɨ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek Galili Provinskon kɨgɨt.
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Telagɨ Yut Madep amɨn da awit uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan yut ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda abeŋ. Yut uŋun amɨn kɨsit da agagɨ dakon tɨlak dɨma abeŋ.’ ”
Mani nak naga dakon egɨp egɨp do yo madep kɨnda yaŋ nandaŋek egɨp egɨpno aŋkutnok do dɨma nandɨsat. Nak kosit uŋun agɨsat naŋgɨn agek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da pi namgut uŋun aŋ mudokeŋ. Pi uŋun Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek yo madepsi ninon asak uŋun dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
Jamba but amɨn, ji da mɨktɨmon ae kwen yo morap toŋ pɨndagek kokwin tagɨsi aŋ. Mani abɨsok yo morap altoŋ uŋun pɨndagek kokwin nido tagɨ dɨma aŋ?”
Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨsi altaŋ damjak uŋun dakon bɨsap ji dɨma nandaŋ, do tagap taŋek egɨpni.”
Amɨn Tagɨ da sakwabat uŋun kaŋek bupmɨsi nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak kunam dɨma takgi.”
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn paŋdetni bamorɨ Emeas kokupmon kɨk do kɨgɨmal. Emeas uŋun Jerusalem da dubagɨsi, 11 kilomita da arɨp tosok.
Nak dakon papia da ji butjɨk damgut, mani uŋun do bupmɨ dɨma nandɨsat. Asi, mibɨltok bupmɨ nandagɨm, mani abɨsok bupmɨ dɨma nandɨsat. Papia uŋun da butjɨk damgut, mani uŋun do bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨn nandawit.
Iyɨ do ‘nak Piŋkop dakon Monji’ yaŋ yosok, do ji da niaŋ aŋ ɨmneŋ do nandaŋ?” Yaŋban kɨsi morap da yawit, “Gulusuŋ asak, do si kɨmotjak.”
Yaŋban yawit, “On amɨn gulusuŋni dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do amɨn dɨ gat yaŋ yomno nido apni? Iyɨ dakon gen kaga da kɨlɨ uŋun yaŋban nandamaŋ.”
Uŋun dɨmasi! Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji but tobɨl dɨma ani kaŋ, uŋun amɨn kabɨ da kɨmakgwit jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn kɨmotdaŋ.
Iyɨŋba nandaŋek Yesu uŋun boron wɨgakwan amɨn koŋ gat egɨpgut uŋun da Yesu yol do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Paŋdetni gen uŋun nandaŋek mɨktɨmon maŋ pagek madepsi pasal nɨmnɨmɨkgwit.
Gen uŋun yaŋba nandaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo gat ae kokup pap dakon kɨla amɨn gat wɨrɨpdagek upbalap madep awit.
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Dabɨlɨ mɨni kɨnda dabɨlni mɨni notni kɨnda kosit tagɨ yolɨsak? Kaŋ kɨsi bamot gapmagwan mokdamal.
Gak notgo dɨma noknogɨ yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun yokwi aŋ ɨmɨsal bɨsapmon Kristo yo kɨsi yokwi aŋ ɨmɨsal.
Uŋun Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon tɨlɨm madepni da kagagwan egɨpni do nandɨsak. Yaŋ do aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi nin da yaŋ teŋteŋagɨmaŋ uŋun da ji kɨlɨ yaŋ damgut.
Amɨn da kɨndap sop bamɨ baŋ pɨndagek kɨndap yokwi bo tagɨ yaŋ pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋ. Amɨn da pik kɨndap dakon bamɨ pak do nap kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma dekgaŋ. Ae wain sop kɨndap yokwi kelɨ toŋon kɨŋ dɨma paŋ.
Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen morap yoyɨŋ mudaŋek uŋun kokup yɨpmaŋek
Yaŋdo, naga gagon dɨma abɨt. Mani gak da kɨlek tosak do yaŋaki tagɨ kɨlek tosak.
Nak Jems, Piŋkop ae Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu Kristo dakon oman amɨni. Papia on Israel amɨn 12 kabɨ ji kokupji yɨpmaŋek mɨktɨm ŋwakŋwarɨkon kɨwit da ekwaŋ ji do mandaŋ yɨpbo obɨsak. Gɨldat tagɨsi.
“Ji abɨŋ amɨn kɨnda koni. Uŋun amɨn da yo morap kalɨp agɨm uŋun nayɨŋ mudak. Uŋun Kristo bo?”
Yaŋ yaŋban amɨn madep da yaŋ nandawit: On amɨn bamot amɨn ɨsalɨ, papia yutnon dɨma yɨkbi, mani pasol pasolɨ mɨni gen tapmɨmɨ toŋ yomal. Yaŋ pɨndagek but morap nandaŋek on amɨn kalɨp Yesu gat egɨpgwit yaŋ nandaŋ kokwinɨkgwit.
Yesu Kristo dakon mɨŋat amɨni but kalɨpni gat, ae galaktokni gat ae wagat wagat aŋpak yokwini uŋun tɨmɨk tɨlak kɨndapmon dapba kɨlɨ kɨmak mudawit.
Piŋkop da nagon pi agɨt uŋun dakon geni nandaŋek mani aŋkɨsiwit.
Dagaŋakwan boron yɨkgwit amɨn uŋun Yesu gawak ɨmɨŋek yawit, “Asisi, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Amɨn bamot uŋun egɨp egɨpni dɨma paŋkutnaŋek Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon man yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨmal.
Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawotni do aŋek nak kɨsit kɨlda nandak nandakni tagɨsi yombem kɨnda naŋ manjɨgɨt. Aban yut ak do gwak magɨm. Aŋapbo amɨn dɨwarɨ da yut uŋun gwak magɨmon wɨtjaŋ. Mani mɨŋat amɨnyo morap kaloŋ kaloŋ yut uŋun aŋ uŋun pakyaŋsi kaŋ kɨmagek wɨtjɨni.
Yesu da tɨlak gen bamot uŋun yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat ae Parisi amɨn gat da nin do yosok yaŋ nandawit.
Ae kɨsi morap Piŋkop dakon Wup da pakbi yomgut uŋun nawit. Asi, Wup dakon tɨp uŋun gat kɨsi agɨpgwit uŋun dakon pakbi nawit. Tɨp uŋun Kristo.
Yaŋ do aŋek Telagɨ Wup da yaŋ yosok: “Ji abɨsok Piŋkop dakon gen nandani kaŋ,
Bɨsap kaloŋ kaloŋ amɨn mɨktɨmni toŋ ae yutni toŋ uŋun amɨn do yomɨŋek moneŋ tɨmɨk paŋkɨ yabekbi kabɨ do yoba bupmɨ amɨn do kokwinɨk yomgwit, do bɨkbɨknikon bupmɨ amɨn kɨnda dɨma egɨpgut.
Yaŋ yaŋban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do kosit wɨsɨwit. Uŋun Yesu do si pasalgwit, nido mɨŋat amɨnyo da Yesu dakon gen yogokni do tamtam yawit.
Ji nandaba kɨk aŋek egɨp egɨpji tɨmɨsok dɨ gat tagɨ saŋbeŋba wɨgɨsak yaŋ nandaŋ, ma? Uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨmasi.
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun do yaŋba yokwi tok aba burɨ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun do nandaŋ gadatji wɨtdal kɨsak, ma?
Ji nak da aŋpak uŋun at dakon mibɨlɨ kɨlɨ uŋun nandaŋ. Ji yaŋ gɨn ani kaŋ, kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ.
Muwugek paŋdet kabɨnikon da dɨwarɨ kɨsitni dɨma sugaŋek jap ɨsal tɨmɨk naŋyo aba pɨndakgwit.
Ji aŋpakni pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek kombɨ amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ pɨndakba pɨsoni. Nap kelɨ toŋ da wain sop arɨpmɨ dɨma potni. Ae jal da kɨmɨp arɨpmɨ dɨma wigɨljak.
Yesu da gen uŋun yagɨt do nandaban yo madepsi aban buŋon yol awɨlgwit amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, Israel amɨnon nandaŋ gadatni madep on amɨn dakon yombem kɨnda dɨma kagɨm.
Nin Piŋkop da ji paŋpulugaŋakwan yokwi kɨnda dɨma ani do bɨsit amaŋ. Ji da nin do Kristo dakon pi amɨn yaŋ nindani yaŋon da gen on dɨma yomaŋ. Ji da nin do pi amɨn toptopmɨ yaŋ tagɨ nandani, mani yo madep uŋun ji da aŋpak tagɨsi baŋgɨn ani do nandamaŋ.
Kɨŋakwan Pita burɨ pɨsaŋakwan yagɨt, “O, kɨlɨ nandako pɨsosok. Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋeloni kɨnda yabekban pɨŋ nak aŋpulugak. Erot gat ae Juda amɨn gat da yo morap ak do nandaŋek nepgwiron naŋ aŋpulugosok.”
Yaŋdo, nak amɨn kapbɨ uŋun yabekgo mibɨltaŋ jikon obɨŋ paŋpulugaŋba paret uŋun yop do yawit uŋun paŋmuwutni do nandɨsat. Do nin da opneŋ bɨsapmon amɨn da ji but galagon da paret aŋ yaŋ dandani. Nin da teban teban yaŋapno aŋ yaŋ dɨma nandani.
Mɨktɨm yɨpmaŋek apgwit uŋun dogɨn nandaŋek egɨpgwit tam tobɨl kokup egɨpgwiron tagɨ kwam.
Papia on manjɨŋek amɨn da gen morap gayɨwit uŋun nandabɨ bamɨsi asak.
“Yaŋban amɨn tagɨ da oman monjɨ uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Gak oman monjɨ wagɨl yokwisi! Gaga gen yosol uŋun dogɨn gen pikon gepbeŋ. Nak teban teban amɨn kɨnda ae amɨn da yo yopmaŋgaŋ tɨmɨkdat, ae jap amɨn da kwaokgaŋ uŋun pɨlɨkdat yaŋ nandaŋ namɨsal.
Aŋakwa uŋudon gɨn Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda altaŋakwan teŋteŋɨ madepsi kɨnda dam teban yutgwan teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan aŋelo da Pita gekgegɨkon tɨdaŋ aŋ yolek iyɨgɨt, “Gak tepmɨsi pɨdaŋ at!” Yaŋ iyɨŋakwan kɨsirɨkon nap teban bamot wɨtdal kɨŋ mibɨlɨkon magɨmal.
Mani amɨn dɨpmɨn pak mudaŋakwa uwalni da abɨŋ jap yet tagɨ yopgut uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan joŋ yokwi dakon yerɨ tɨŋtɨŋaŋek kɨgɨt.
Nin gen uŋuden do mɨrak dɨma yopneŋ. Aŋek amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak aŋek gen bamɨ gɨn yoneŋ. Yaŋ aŋek nin mɨŋat amɨnyo tebaisi agek Kristokon tagok tagok aneŋ. Kristo uŋun paŋmuwukbi dakon busuŋɨ.
Yesu paŋdetni 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban opba, bamot bamot Piŋkop dakon gen yoni do yabekgɨt. Yabegek koŋ yolni do yaŋ mudaŋ yomɨŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Jon Yesu da gen yagɨt nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ, nin kaŋapno amɨn kɨnda da gak da manon koŋ yolban kamaŋ. Mani nin da kabɨkon nani kɨnda dɨma, do yaŋsop aŋɨmɨmaŋ.”
Uŋun da Telagɨ Wup da ji paŋtagap aban amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ uŋun do niyɨgɨt.
Mani, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon gulusuŋni pɨndagek yaŋ yagɨt: “Amɨn Tagɨ da yaŋ yosok, ‘Nandani, bɨsap kɨnda apdɨsak, nak uŋun bɨsapmon Israel amɨn kabɨ gat ae Juda amɨn kabɨ gat saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ abeŋ.
Uŋun bɨsapmon yo jɨgɨsi altokdaŋ. Piŋkop da mibɨlɨkon yo morap wasagɨron da egɨ abɨsok ekwamaŋon yo jɨgɨsi uŋuden kɨnda dɨma altagɨt, ae buŋon dɨma altokdɨsak.
Babɨkno Piŋkop da dabɨlon gulusuŋnin mɨni yaŋsi nandaŋek Piŋkop dakon pi awit, nakyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn pini asat. Kalbi ae gɨldarɨ yɨpmaŋ derɨ mɨni bɨsit aŋek gak do nandaŋek Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨsat.
Uŋun da kalɨp Juda amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kaloŋ kɨnda dagɨn amɨn morap kɨsi do aŋek kɨmotjak kaŋ, uŋun tagɨ.”
Mani Piŋkop dakon aŋpagon kɨlɨ tagaŋ teban tawit amɨnon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi uŋudon yaŋ teŋteŋomaŋ. Uŋun nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi yombem dɨma. Ae on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn si pasɨldaŋ uŋun dakon nandaŋ kokwin tagɨsi yombem dɨma.
Aŋelo uŋun oman amɨn gɨn. Uŋun wup, Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨtdɨsak uŋun paŋpulugoni do yabekdak.
Apban kokup ɨsalni gat ae yo do bɨsit yaŋakwan kawit amɨn gat da yaŋ yawit, “On amɨn uŋun kalɨp yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt uŋun amɨn bo?”
Nido, Kristo da tapmɨm namɨŋakwan yo morap tagɨ abeŋ.
mani ji da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdok do nagon ap do dɨmasi galak toŋ.
Jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn ekwaŋ. Amɨn da dandaba ji amɨn kɨlegɨsi ekwaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ, mani butjikon ji jamba but amɨnsi ae gen teban yapyap amɨnsi ekwaŋ.
Gen tebanon Moses da gen kɨnda yagɨt uŋun yaŋ: mɨŋat uŋuden tɨpbaŋ aŋakba kɨmotjak. Gak da uŋun do niaŋ nandɨsal?”
Nin yaŋsi egɨpneŋ kaŋ, but dasi galak taŋ yomyom dakon aŋpak ninon bamɨsi tosak. Nin on mɨktɨmon Kristo yombem da ekwamaŋ, do Piŋkop da amɨn kokwin asak bɨsapmon pasol pasol dɨma aneŋ.
Moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda takis do yɨpmaŋgaŋ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ naba koko.” Yaŋ yaŋban moneŋ tabɨlɨ kɨnda aŋobɨŋ ɨba
uŋun da aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Aŋakwa gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan Piŋkop da kɨmoron naŋ aban pɨdokdɨsak.” Gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek bupmɨsi nandawit.
Nin ji do but dasi galak taŋ damgumaŋ, do Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi damgumaŋ. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, notsi agɨmaŋ do aŋek ji paŋpulugok do egɨp egɨpnin kɨsi parekgɨmaŋ.
Nandak nandak amɨn uŋun kɨŋ mudaŋakwa, Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo da Josep dɨpmɨnon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Erot da Monjɨ aŋakban kɨmotjak do wɨsɨkdɨsak, do gak pɨdaŋ monjɨ ŋakŋak gat meŋi gat tɨmɨkbɨ Isip mɨktɨmon pasal kɨni. Isip sigɨn egakwa nak da aesi apni do don gayɨkeŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo dɨwarɨ yopmaŋek, Pita, Jems ae padɨge Jon uŋun baŋgɨn tɨmɨkban kɨwit.
Yesu uŋun tɨlak gen yoyɨŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn yaŋ yobi uŋun da morapmɨsi asak, mani yutnon amɨn tagɨ gat yɨtni do kokwinɨkbi uŋun da tagapmɨ.”
Mani kɨmoron da pɨdaŋek nak da kalɨp Galili mɨktɨmon mibɨltaŋ damɨŋek kɨkeŋ.”
Kabɨ bamot uŋun gɨptɨm kaloŋɨkon paŋmuwugek Piŋkopmon paŋop do aŋek tɨlak kɨndapmon kɨmakgɨt. Ae tɨlak kɨndapmon uwal uwal uŋun kalɨp tagɨt uŋun aŋakban kɨmakgɨt.
Ae Pita kon altaŋek don yabekbi 12 kabɨkon kɨsi altaŋ yomgut.
Piŋkop da yo morap ak do yagɨt uŋun arɨpmɨsi akdɨsak. Piŋkop da ji Monji Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo gat egɨp egɨpnikon kaloŋɨ egɨpni do yaŋ damgut.
Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨn kabɨni nin gen pikon nipjak dakon bɨsap kɨlɨ noman tak. Mibɨltok ninon asak, do mɨŋat amɨnyo Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi manji ɨmaŋ amɨn kabɨkon asak bɨsapmon kobogɨ yokwisi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Piŋkop da wasaŋek Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨkon amɨn tɨmɨkban iyɨ dakon amɨn kabɨ awit uŋun do Saimon da kɨlɨ niyɨk.
Ji aesi kalɨp Piŋkop dakon teŋteŋɨ abɨdawit bɨsap uŋun do nandani. Uŋun bɨsapmon jɨgɨ tepmɨyo madepsi pawit, mani ji tebaisi akgwit.
Timoti, monjɨno, gak do kombɨ gen yawit, nak uŋun do nandaŋek gak da yo abi uŋun do gayɨkdɨsat. Kombɨ gen uŋun da gak aŋteban aŋakwan aŋpak yokwi pabɨŋ yop do emat abi.
Yaŋdo, Amɨn Tagɨ da sigɨn yaŋ yagɨt: “Ji uŋun yopmaŋ degek dɨsi dage egɨpni. Uŋun amɨn dakon yoni Piŋkop da pɨndakban ɨŋani aŋ uŋun dɨma ɨgayɨni. Yaŋ aŋakwa nak da ji but dasi tɨmɨgek
Piŋkop da ji do tagɨsi nandaŋek Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni do bɨkbɨk damgut. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, Kristo dakon man do jɨgɨyo kɨsi pani do nandaban tagɨsi asak.
Abraham yaŋ agɨt nido nandaŋ gadat aŋek kokup pap toktogɨsi uŋudon don egɨpbeŋ yaŋ nandagɨt. Piŋkop da kokup pap uŋun niaŋ wasogɨ uŋun iyɨ nandaŋ mudaŋek wasagɨt.
Nak abɨsok bɨt kɨlapyo kokup kɨdat do parekbi uŋun dakon geni yokdɨsat. Nin kɨsi morap nandak nandaknin toŋ, yaŋ nandamaŋ. Nandak nandak uŋun da kwen wɨgɨk aŋpak paŋalon asak, mani but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak da paŋmuwukbi paŋteban asak.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek dubagɨsok amɨn da tɨp maba kwaŋ uŋun da arɨpmon kɨgɨt. Kɨŋ ŋwakbeŋ aŋek bɨsit aŋek yaŋ yagɨt,
Kristo asi nak da gen kagakon da gen yosok bo dɨma ji uŋun kok do yoŋ, do uŋun aŋpak abo, nak Kristo dakon gen abɨdaŋek yosot yaŋsi nandakdaŋ. Kristo ji paŋmɨlɨp ak do tapmɨm wɨsɨk dɨma asak, jikon tapmɨmni madepsi.
Do Pita Jerusalem kwan nandaŋ gadat amɨn gɨptɨmɨ mandabi da nandaba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmgwit.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo yabekbini 12 kabɨ da obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Kokup amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, do yoyɨŋbɨ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo kɨŋek kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ ae tɨmɨ dɨgwan kɨŋ jap pakbiyo gat ae dɨpmɨn potpot tamoyo gat wɨsini.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nak da kɨŋ aŋmɨlɨp abeŋ.”
Kɨlek taŋban Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaki, gak uŋun do amɨn dɨma yoyɨŋek mukwa sogogon kɨŋek gɨptɨmgo yolɨki. Aŋek Moses da yagɨt uŋun da tɨlagon paret aŋaki amɨn da asi kɨlek tal yaŋ gandani.”
“Nak asisi dayɨsat, uŋun bɨsapmon egɨpni amɨn dɨma kɨmagakwa yo morap uŋun kɨsi altaŋ mudokdaŋ.
Yesu uŋun amɨn kabɨ tɨmɨkban ɨleŋon da mɨktɨm kuldukgɨbaŋ kɨndakon pukwa paŋdetni morapmɨ gat kɨsi akgwit. Aŋakwa Judia mɨktɨm dakon amɨn morapmɨ gat, ae Jerusalem kokup papmon amɨn gat, ae tap amɨn Tair ae Saidon kokup da kapmatjok egɨpgwit amɨn uŋun gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Nin Gen egɨp egɨpmɨ toŋ uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋok amaŋ. Uŋun Gen abɨkisigwan wasok wasogɨkon kɨlɨ egɨpgut da egɨsak. Nin mɨrak yopmaŋapno gen yagɨt, ae dabɨl da kagɨmaŋ, ae kɨsit da kwenikon ɨgayɨgɨmaŋ.
Amɨn kɨnda da mɨktɨm dakon yo morap paŋ egakwan egɨp egɨpni pasɨljak kaŋ, uŋun yo morap da niaŋ aŋek aŋpulugoni? Bo egɨp egɨpni aeni abɨdok do tomni ninaŋ yumjak?
Yɨgakwa oman mɨŋat kɨnda da Pita uŋun kɨndap da teŋteŋɨkon yɨkban kagɨt. Pakyaŋsi kaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “On amɨn Yesu gat kɨsi egɨpgumal.”
Pakbi yɨpmaŋek wɨŋakwal uŋudon gɨn Amɨn Tagɨ dakon Wup da Pilip aŋaŋ kɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn madep uŋun saŋbeŋek Pilip dɨma kagɨt. Mɨni kagɨt mani amɨn uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk aŋek aeni tamonikon pawɨŋ yɨgek kɨgɨt.
Uŋun kɨlɨ kɨmakgɨt, mani abɨsok gak da Piŋkop yo niaŋen kɨnda do bɨsit iyɨŋbɨ uŋun da tagɨ gamjak yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Mani, gak Piŋkop dakon amɨn egɨsal, do aŋpak yokwi uŋuden morap yopmaŋ degek pasal kɨki. Pi tebai aŋek yo oden baŋ tɨmɨkgi: aŋpak kɨlegɨ, ae Piŋkop dakon aŋpak, ae nandaŋ gadat, ae amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak, ae tebaisi agek jɨgɨ ɨmet ɨmet aŋpak, ae amɨn do yo yaworɨ aŋ yomyom aŋpak.
Ji uŋun dosi nandaŋek, pi tebaisi aŋek nandaŋ gadatji da tebai tosok uŋudeŋ aŋpak tagɨsi aba teban tosak. Ae nandak nandak tagɨsi tɨmɨt do dakon pi ani, yaŋ aba uŋun da aŋpakji tagɨsi da yaŋ jikon teban tosak.
Yaŋban paŋdetni nandaba ŋwakŋwarɨsi aban notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Yaŋ kaŋ namɨn da egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdosak?”
Do nin nandamaŋ, Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo yɨk yawot taŋ yomɨsak. Uŋun Sabat yɨk yawot bɨsap yombem.
Piŋkop da butnin paŋkɨlɨk nindaŋek iyɨ dakon galaktok yolek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoneŋ dakon pi nimgut. Yaŋdo, mɨŋat amɨnyo da nindaba pi tagɨsi aŋ yaŋ nindani do dɨma amaŋ. Piŋkop nin dakon but pɨndat pɨndat amɨn uŋun da nindaban tagɨsi amaŋ uŋun dogɨn nandaŋek amaŋ.
Nin jikon kɨk do nandagɨmaŋ. Nak Pol da jikon kosirɨ morapmɨ kɨk do pini agɨm, mani Sunduk da kosit sopmaŋ nimgut.
Yaŋdo, pakyaŋsi nandani, Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Wup da amɨn kɨnda aŋtagap aban “Yesu jobɨt tagɨ pasak!” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yosak. Ae Telagɨ Wupni mɨni amɨn da “Yesu uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ” yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma yosak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji wigat gɨtni naŋ pɨgɨni. Amɨn wagɨl tasɨk tokdaŋ dakon kokupmon pɨgɨk dakon wigat gat ae kositni gat uŋun ɨlalogɨsi, do uŋun naŋ yolek pɨgɨk uŋun tagapmɨsi. Amɨn morapmɨsi da wigat uŋun naŋ pɨkwaŋ.
Ji dɨsi baŋ paŋkɨlɨgek Piŋkop aŋkewalneŋ yaŋ dɨ nandabam. Ji da arɨpmɨ dɨmasi. Ni jap yet naŋ kwaokgi uŋun naŋgɨn pakdɨsal.
Yaŋ yoyɨŋek paŋmuwukbi kabɨ morap egɨ aŋaŋ kɨwit uŋun do kɨla amɨni manjɨŋ manjɨŋ awit. Aŋek Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egek bɨsit pi aŋek egɨpgwit. Aŋek uŋun kɨla amɨn kabɨ egɨp egɨpni Amɨn Tagɨkon tosok yaŋsi nandawit amɨn uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ da kɨsiron yopgumal.
Iyɨŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun bamɨ yoŋ. Elaija kɨlɨ abɨŋ yo morap paŋmɨlɨp agɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn da galaktokni yolek yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ Piŋkop da papiakon gen tosok uŋun da tɨlagon aŋ ɨmgwit. Mani Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mandabi uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn da Amɨn Dakon Monji manji ɨmɨŋek yo yokwi madepsi aŋ ɨmdaŋ.’ Uŋun gen mibɨlɨ nido tosok?”
Bo ae Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda mukwa sogok amɨn do yosok uŋun kɨsi dɨma manjɨŋ nandaŋyo awit? Mukwa sogok amɨn Sabat bɨsap morapmon gen teban yapmaŋek pi aŋ, mani dɨwarɨni mɨni ekwaŋ.
Aŋakwa Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen da uŋun mɨktɨm da kokup morap kɨsi ɨreŋ tagɨt.
Piŋkop but dasi galak taŋ ɨmamaŋ kaŋ, nin gen tebani guramɨtneŋ. Ae gen tebani uŋun guramɨt do jɨgɨ dɨma pamaŋ,
Mani Piŋkop da iyɨ nandaŋ kokwinɨgek yerɨ kaloŋ kaloŋ do obi tamɨyo iyɨkon iyɨkon wasosok.
Mɨŋat bamorɨ bret sok do plaua wasaŋakwal, kɨnda abɨdaŋek kɨnda yɨpdɨsak.”
Yesu da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek paŋdetni morapmɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Gen on yosok uŋun jɨgɨsi. Namɨn da arɨpmɨ abɨdosak?”
Yaŋ yaŋban binap gen kɨnda paŋmuwukbi kabɨkon kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Uŋun paŋdet dɨma kɨmotdɨsak.” Mani Yesu da paŋdet uŋun dɨma kɨmotjak yaŋ dɨma yagɨt. “Egakwan gɨn nak aeno tobɨl apbeŋ do nandakeŋ bo dɨma, uŋun nak dakon yo”, uŋun gɨn yagɨt.
Do bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ nandak nandakji si paŋtagap aŋek egɨpni, aŋek dɨsi do kɨla tagɨsi aŋek egɨpni. Yesu Kristo da noman altosak bɨsapmon Piŋkop da nandaŋ yawok damɨŋek jikon yo tagɨsi uŋun akdɨsak uŋun do nandaŋ gadat tebaisi aŋek jomjom ani.
Mani Segius da Yesu dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmjak do amɨn bamot uwal aŋ yomgut. (Ba-Yesu uŋun sot wamwam amɨn kɨnda do Grik genon da Elima yaŋ iyɨwit.)
Sunduk do yoma dɨma wɨtdal ɨmni.
Amɨn yutnikon kwa kɨlani tagɨ asak, ae aŋpak tagɨsi morap do galagɨsi nandɨsak, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi, ae telagɨsi egɨsak, ae iyɨ do kɨla aŋek aŋpak kalɨpmɨ pabɨŋ yopmaŋdak.
Not kabɨ, gen madepsi kɨnda uŋun yaŋ: Ji Kwen Kokup bo mɨktɨm bo ae yo dɨ da manon genji dɨma yaŋ paŋteban ani. Yo kɨnda ak do nandaŋ kaŋ “Asi” yaŋ gɨn yoni. Mani dɨma ak do nandaŋ kaŋ “Dɨma” yaŋ gɨn yoni. Genji yo dɨ da manon yaŋ paŋteban aba Piŋkop da kobogɨ yokwi dɨ daban.
Gagon gulusuŋ dɨ agɨt, bo ae gagon goman dɨ agɨt kaŋ, mani kulabɨk aŋek uŋun gomanon nak dakon man mandaki.
Yaŋban Agripa da Pol yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gen nayɨŋbɨ Kristo Dakon Amɨn kɨnda dagokeŋ yaŋ nandɨsal, ma?”
Yaŋban Yesu da iyɨgɨt, “Pilip, nak bɨsap dubagɨ ji gat egɨpgumaŋ, mani nak dɨma nandaŋ namɨsal, ma? Amɨn kɨnda nak nandɨsak uŋun Dat naŋ kosok. Gak niaŋon da Dat nolɨŋbɨ kono yaŋ yosol?
Pita gen sigɨn yaŋakwan Telagɨ Wup amɨn morap mɨrak paŋek yɨkgwit uŋun kabɨkon pɨgɨt.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Moses altagɨt. Moses uŋun monjɨ ŋakŋak tagɨsi ae Piŋkop da kaŋ galak tagɨt. Datni da yutnon kɨlani aŋakwa kanekni kapbɨ agɨt.
Morapmɨ da yaŋ yawit, “Koŋ kɨnda burɨkon egakwan but upbal asak. Ji nido geni nandaŋ?”
Amɨn kɨnda Yesu Kristokon egɨsak kaŋ, gɨptɨmni mandɨsak bo dɨma mandɨsak uŋun kɨsi yo ɨsalɨ. Mani amɨn kɨnda nandaŋ gadat aŋek uŋun da aŋtagap aban amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun da yo bamɨsi.
Agek Yesu obɨŋakwan kaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Kabɨt, on Piŋkop dakon Sipsip Monɨŋni!”
Yesu da tɨlak gen kɨnda gat yoyɨŋek yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da ɨmal kalugɨ kɨnda pudaŋ ɨmal garaŋɨ dagaŋ kwi kɨndakon bupjak kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma. Yaŋ asak kaŋ, ɨmal kalugɨ aŋupbal asak. Ae ɨmal kalugɨ uŋun kalɨpmɨ gat arɨp dɨma.
Aŋakwan gen teban yoyɨŋdet gat Parisi amɨn gat da mɨŋat kɨnda abɨdaŋ aŋapgwit. Amɨn da kaŋakwa uŋun mɨŋat da yumabi agɨt. Aŋabɨŋ amɨn da dabɨlon yɨpba
Yaŋ aŋek gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Piŋkop da papiakon gen yaŋ tosok: ‘Nak dakon yut uŋun mɨŋat amɨnyo da abɨŋ bɨsit aŋnamni do tosok.’ Mani ji da kulabɨk aba ‘kabo noknok dakon pasɨlɨ tamo’ yombem asak.”
Yaŋsi ani, nido Piŋkop gen papia da yaŋ yosok. “Ji bulmakau wit gɨp golek do bamaŋ mɨsɨŋɨkgaŋ bɨsapmon jap noni do gen kagani dɨma sopni.” Ae kɨnda yaŋ yosok: “Pi amɨn yumaŋ nogɨni arɨpmɨ tagɨ tɨmɨtjak.”
nandaŋek yutnon wɨgek Monjɨ gat meŋi Maria gat pɨndakgwit. Pɨndagek ŋwakbeŋ aŋek Monjɨ gawak ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aŋek yɨkni wɨtdalek gol ae yo dɨwarɨ kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwi but galak do ɨmgwit.
Yapyap Bɨlagon amɨn Piŋkop gawak ɨm do Jerusalem egɨpgwit uŋun bɨkbɨkgwan Grik amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Mani Yesu gen kagani sopmaŋek gen kobogɨ kɨnda dɨma iyɨgɨt. Yaŋ aban mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn da aeni iyɨgɨt, “Gak Kristo? Gak Piŋkop gawak ɨmamaŋ uŋun dakon Monji bo dɨma?”
Uŋudon egakwan amɨn morapmɨ Yesukon abɨŋ yaŋ yawit, “Jon uŋun geni paŋteban asak do wasok tapmɨmɨ toŋ dɨma agɨt, mani gen morap on amɨn do yagɨt uŋun gen bamɨsi gɨn yagɨt.”
“Ji kɨŋek yaŋ nandani: Ji sipsip monɨŋ baŋ yaŋ joŋ pɨŋan da bɨkbɨgon yabekdat.
Paŋkewal yokwisi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨkon da wagɨl tasɨk tokdaŋ amɨn baŋ paŋkewaldɨsak. Uŋun wagɨl tasɨk tokdaŋ, nido gen bamɨ but dasi abɨdaŋek yokwikon da pulugaŋ kɨk do dɨmasi galak tawit.
Amɨn kɨŋ ap awit uŋun da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek wunda kwalkwal aŋek yaŋ iyɨwit,
Mani Yesu da yo agɨt dakon geni sigɨn kɨŋ ɨreŋ tagɨt. Aŋakwan amɨn morapmɨ da geni nandak do opgwit. Ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp aŋyomjak do opgwit.
Pakbi ɨdap terɨ kɨnda Genesaret mɨktɨmon kɨŋ ɨleŋɨkon wɨgakwan
Uŋun yokwi morap amɨn buron da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn paŋupbal aŋ.”
Uŋudeŋ gɨn, Kristo mɨŋat amɨnyo morapmɨ dakon yokwini dakon jɨgɨni tɨmɨt do aŋek bɨsap kaloŋ kɨndagɨn iyɨnaŋ paregek kɨmakgɨt. Ae bɨsap kɨnda gat don apdɨsak, mani uŋun bɨsapmon yokwi wɨrɨrɨt do dɨma apdɨsak. Mɨŋat amɨnyo uŋun do jomjom aŋ amɨn yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨt do apdɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap kaŋek butji pɨsosak. Kɨlɨŋɨ pakbini toŋ ae tamɨ kaluk yopmaŋdak, uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaŋ.
Ji da binapmon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae nandak nandakni tagɨsi amɨn kɨnda egɨsak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ aŋpak tagɨsi asak, ae nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi do iyɨ dakon man dɨma awɨgɨsak. Yaŋ aŋakwan amɨn da kaŋba amɨn nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi ae nandak nandakni tagɨsi asak.
Iyɨŋban Maria Makdala kokupmon nani da kɨŋ paŋdet kabɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ nak da kɨlɨ kat.” Yaŋ yoyɨŋek Yesu da gen iyɨgɨt uŋun yoyɨgɨt.
Notnoni, ji yo kaloŋ on do dɨma ɨŋtoni: Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandagon gɨldat kaloŋɨ uŋun bɨlak 1 tausen da arɨp asak, ae bɨlak 1 tausen uŋun bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok gɨldat kaloŋɨ yombem gɨn yaŋ kosok.
Nak naga wigat. Amɨn kɨnda nagon abɨŋek damon pɨgɨsak kaŋ, Piŋkop da yokwikon naŋ abɨdokdɨsak. Aŋakwan uŋun amɨn damon pɨgɨ ae waŋga kɨŋ gɨn aŋek jap do arɨpmɨ dɨma akdɨsak.
Piŋkop dakon yaŋ teban tok geni morapmɨ toŋ, ae uŋun yaŋ teban tok morap da bamɨ toŋ ani do Kristo da “Nak da akeŋ” yaŋ yosok. Mibɨlɨ yaŋ do nin Yesu da manon da Piŋkop dakon man awɨgek “Uŋun asi” yaŋ yomaŋ.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Ji pik kɨndap kaŋek butji pɨsosak. Kɨlɨŋɨ pakbini toŋ ae tamɨ kaluk yopmaŋdak, uŋun bɨsapmon gɨldat bɨsap kwaŋ tosok yaŋ nandaŋ.
“Mɨktɨm saut tetgɨn dakon kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep uŋun Solomon dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨsi iyɨŋakwan nandak do mɨktɨm dubagɨsikon da apgut. Mani amɨn kɨnda oni egɨsak, uŋun da Solomon yapmaŋdak, mani geni dɨma nandaŋ. Do gen kokwin bɨsap madepmon uŋun kɨla amɨn mɨŋat madep da pɨdaŋ agek abɨsok ekwaŋ amɨn kabɨ dakon aŋpak yokwi uŋun do yaŋ teŋteŋokdɨsak.
uŋun amɨn aŋpak tagɨsisi naŋ asak. Gen on do pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn kɨnda yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda aŋpulugaŋek kosit yokwikon naŋ abɨdaŋ Piŋkopmon ae aŋopjak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨmoron naŋ abɨdaŋakwan kɨmot dɨma asak. Ae Piŋkop da yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon yokwini morapmɨ yopmaŋ yomgut.
Oman monjɨni Dewit da kabɨkon da nin paŋpulugosak do amɨn tebaisi kɨnda aŋnoman agɨt.
Amɨn mibɨltok opgwit uŋun da kɨrɨŋɨk ɨmɨŋek tayaŋgok yɨtjak do tebai iyɨwit. Mani tebai sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yagɨt, “Dewit Dakon Monji, bupmɨ nandaŋ nam!”
Nak gen on yosot, nido amɨn dɨ da top dayɨŋek paŋgalak ani yaŋ do dɨma galak tosot.
Ji ‘asi’ bo ‘dɨma’ yaŋ gɨn yoni kaŋ, uŋun da tagɨ. Gen uŋun da kwenon saŋbeŋek yoŋ uŋun Yokwi Ami da paŋalon asak.”
Bɨsit yaŋ aŋek namɨn da noman tosak yaŋ do wasok kɨnda awit. Tɨp wasok aba Matias da noman tagɨt. Noman taŋek yabekbi 11 kabɨkon saŋbegɨt.
Gen bin tagɨsi ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda dɨmasi tosok. Amɨn dɨwarɨ da ji dakon nandak nandak paŋduŋgam aŋek Kristo dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi kulabɨk aŋek aŋtasɨk aŋ.
Yesu gen yaŋ mudaŋakwan Parisi amɨn kɨnda da yutnikon kwan yɨgek jap nonjil do iyɨgɨt. Iyɨŋban Yesu kɨŋ yutnikon wɨgɨ jap noknok tamokon yɨkgɨt.
Ae uŋun da buŋon yaŋ tosok: ‘Gaga do but dasi niaŋ galak tosol, uŋudeŋ gɨn amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yobi.’ Uŋun gen teban bamot da gen teban morap yapmaŋ mudomal.”
Yesu da yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek jɨkgo yanjaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ aba yoyɨŋban yomakon pɨgɨ mudaŋakwa, mɨŋatjok dakon meŋi datniyo ae paŋdetni tɨmɨkban mɨŋatjok pakgɨron wɨgɨwit.
Aŋakwa mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep Yesu kaŋek but galak nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn Yesukon kɨŋek “Gɨldat tagɨ!” yaŋ iyɨwit.
Nak jikon tepmɨsi tobɨl opbeŋ do bɨsit aŋ kɨmotni.
“Gen teban gat ae kombɨ amɨn dakon gen gat yaŋ teŋteŋaŋba Jon da bɨsapmon wugɨt. Mani Jon da bɨsapmon da wasaŋek Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoŋ. Aŋakwa amɨn uŋungwan pɨgɨk do pi tebaisi aŋ.
Ae jap yet dɨwarɨ mɨktɨm tagɨsikon maŋ kwawit. Uŋun bamɨ 100 taŋ taŋ awit.” Yesu da tɨlak gen uŋun yaŋ mudaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Gen on nandak do galak toŋ amɨn ji pakyaŋsi nandaŋek mibɨlɨ nandaŋ pɨsoni.”
Amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Josep. Uŋun Juda dakon kokup pap kɨnda mani Arimatea uŋudon nani. Uŋun amɨn tagɨsi ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨsi. Ae uŋun Piŋkop da amɨn kɨla akdɨsak uŋun do jomjom aŋek egɨpgut. Uŋun Juda amɨn dakon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkon nani kɨnda, mani gen kokwin amɨn kabɨ notni Yesu do nandak nandak awit ae yo awit uŋun do but kaloŋ dɨma agɨt.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋek burɨgwan da jɨgɨsi nandaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da nak uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
Niaŋɨ? Nak gen bamɨ dayɨŋek uwalji dagagɨm, ma?
Gak jamba but amɨn. Mibɨltok gaga da dabɨlon kɨndap kwɨk tosok uŋun abɨ kɨŋakwan notgo da dabɨlon jɨmjɨmjok tosok uŋun kaŋbɨ pɨsaŋakwan tagɨ paki.
Amɨn morap nak do nandaŋek yutni, notni, sami, meŋi, datni, mɨŋat monjɨyoni, ae jap pini yopmaŋ detni, uŋun yo morapni kosirɨ 100 yaŋ tɨmɨk tɨmɨk akdaŋ. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni abɨdokdaŋ.
Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨsak uŋun yaŋ: nandak nandak yokwi, yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ, yo kabo, amɨn dapdap,
Nin Mukwa Sogok dakon Mibɨltok Amɨnin egɨsak. Uŋun wukwisi ae Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morap kɨlani asak.
Uŋun bɨsapmon ji da nak yo kɨnda do bɨsit dɨma nayɨkdaŋ. Asisi dayɨsat, yo kɨnda do nak da manon da Dat bɨsit iyɨni kaŋ, uŋun damdɨsak.
Kokup ŋwakŋwarɨkon da apbo yutjikon dɨma aŋkɨ nepgwit, ae ɨmalno mɨni egapbo ɨmal dɨma namgwit, ae sot agɨm ae dam teban yutnon yɨkgɨm bɨsapmon kɨlano dɨma awit.’
“Asisi yosot, gak do yo tagɨsi aŋ gamɨŋek babɨkgo dakon gwakni paŋpulugoko morapmɨsi akdaŋ.”
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Uŋun amɨn dukwan egɨsak?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Nak dɨma nandɨsat.”
Ae wit bo ae jap dɨwarɨ dakon yerɨ kwaokdal uŋun jap bamɨ don kwokdɨsak uŋun yombem dɨma.
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu do gen kobogɨ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin dɨma nandamaŋ.” Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nakyo kɨsi namɨn da pi uŋun abeŋ do yaŋ mudaŋ namgut uŋun dɨma dayɨkeŋ.”
Kalɨp Taitus da niaŋon da paret wasaŋek ani uŋun do dayɨgɨt, do jikon tobɨl kɨŋek paret dakon pi aŋ mudoni yaŋ dayɨsak do nin da tebai iyɨgɨmaŋ.
Amɨn morapmɨ da buŋon yolek madepsi sigɨn yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Aŋakba kɨmakban!”
Piŋkop dakon papia da yaŋ yosok: “Yokwikon baŋ amɨn kɨlegɨ tɨmɨt tɨmɨt uŋun jɨgɨsi, do Piŋkop manji ɨmaŋ amɨn gat yokwi pakpak gat niaŋ agagɨ?”
Yaŋban yaŋ tɨdaŋek yawit, “Tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakbɨ kɨmotjak!”
Egek wain naŋ mudaŋba Yesu meŋi da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Wain kɨlɨ mudaŋ.”
Yaŋdo, amɨn kɨnda nak tebaisi akdat yaŋ nandɨsak amɨn uŋun kaŋ kɨmotjak. Yokwikon dɨ maŋban.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Yesu da wasaŋek paŋdetni yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn Dakon Monji da tepmɨ madepsi pakdɨsak. Aŋakwan kɨla amɨn, ae mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da manji ɨmɨŋek aŋakba kɨmotdɨsak. Kɨmagek gɨldat kapbɨ aŋakwan kɨmoron da pɨdokdɨsak.”
Abɨsok yabekgo nak dakon but gat kɨsi gagon tobɨl obɨsak.
Gak da yo morap nin dakon pɨŋbi egɨpni do yaŋ mudaŋ nimgul.” Uŋun da yo morap kɨlani ani do yaŋ yosok, do yo kɨnda ɨsal dɨma tosak, yo kɨsisi kɨlani ani. Mani abɨsok yo morap pɨndatno kɨlani dɨma aŋ, yo dɨwarɨ dakon kɨlani baŋ gɨn aŋ.
“Gen dayɨkdɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Amɨn Dakon Monji amɨn da kɨsiron yɨpdaŋ.”
“Nin da nandaŋapno Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Nak da Piŋkop dakon Telagɨ Yut Madep uŋun tuwɨlek gɨldat kapbɨ da butgwan ae wɨtjɨkeŋ.’ ”
Mani Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok asat bɨsapmon mano arɨpmɨ dɨma awɨgɨkeŋ. Amɨn Tagɨ da uŋun pi namɨŋek pi uŋun abeŋdosi nayɨgɨt. Ae Gen Bin Tagɨsi dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ kaŋ, awa yo jɨgɨsi noman taŋ namdɨsak.
Banabas uŋun Sus yaŋ iyɨŋek Pol uŋun gen yogok amɨn do Emes yaŋ iyɨwit.
Pɨdaŋ agakwan kombɨ amɨn Aisaia dakon papia ɨba abɨdaŋ wɨtdalek gen yaŋ naŋ manjɨgɨt:
Do ji Piŋkop dakon Monji do nandaba yo ɨsalɨ asak amɨn do niaŋsi nandaŋ? Uŋun amɨn jɨgɨ madepsi pakdaŋ. Kristo dakon yawi da saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ aŋteban asak, uŋun da paŋmɨlɨp aban uŋun amɨn Piŋkop dakon amɨnsi dagawit aŋek telagɨsi egɨpgwit. Mani, abɨsok uŋun amɨn da aba yawi yo ɨsalɨsi asak. Aŋek nandaŋ yawot dakon Wup do aŋpak yokwisi aŋ ɨmaŋ.
Asi, nin yo kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi paŋalon aŋ uŋun yombem baŋ Kristo da tɨmɨk Piŋkop do paret asak. Uŋun kɨbaŋ Piŋkop da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkdak amɨn gat, ae Tɨpdomon pɨgɨkdaŋ amɨn kɨsi da nandaŋ.
nido nin Kristo dakon gɨptɨm dakon kandap ae kɨsit dabɨlyoni.
Not kabɨ, amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak uŋun Piŋkopmon da abɨsak, do amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomneŋ. Amɨn morap amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomaŋ uŋun Piŋkopmon da altaŋbi, ae Piŋkop nandaŋ ɨmaŋ.
Paŋmuwuk Banabas gat Sol gat do yomɨŋek yabekba Jerusalem paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn do paŋkɨgɨmal.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo morap altokdɨsak uŋun dakon bɨsap amɨn kɨnda da dɨma nandɨsak. Kwen Kokup aŋeloyo dɨma nandaŋ, ae Monjɨyo kɨsi dɨma nandɨsak. Dat da iyɨ gɨn nandɨsak.
Saimon Pita, ae Tomas (Yayat yaŋ iyɨwit), ae Nataniel (Galili mɨktɨm, Kana kokupmon nani kɨnda), ae Sebedi dakon monji bamot gat, ae Yesu dakon paŋdetni bamorɨ gat kɨsi egɨpgwit.
Mani kokupmɨ kokupmɨ amɨn da Juda amɨn nin da bɨkbɨgon amɨn kabɨ kɨnda nandaŋ gadat ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda awit uŋun do gen yokwi yaŋ yoba nandamaŋ, do gaga dakon nandak nandak niyɨŋbɨ nandaneŋ do nandamaŋ.”
Ji gen teban on dayɨsat uŋun guramɨtni kaŋ, ji nak dakon notnoni kabɨ akdaŋ.
Uŋun kokupmon amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut mani Sakius. Sakius uŋun takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn dakon amɨn madep kɨnda egɨpgut. Uŋun yoni morapmɨ amɨn kɨnda egɨpgut.
Asi, amɨn kɨlegɨ Lot uŋun Sodom amɨn da binapmon egek gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ aŋpakni yokwi uŋun pɨndakgɨt, ae gen yokwini yaŋakwa nandaŋ yomgut. Uŋun burɨ kɨlegɨsi taŋakwan, gen teban pabɨŋ yopyop aŋpak awit uŋun do nandaban yokwi taŋban burɨkon da jɨgɨsi nandagɨt.
Ae don gen uŋun saŋbeŋek yaŋ yosok: “Nak da yokwini gat ae gen teban ɨragek yo yokwi aŋ do wagɨl ɨŋtokeŋ.”
“Amɨn morap, gen dayɨsat uŋun pakyaŋsi nandani. Nin kɨŋapno bɨsap yokwisi kɨnda noman taŋ nimdɨsak. Aŋakwan yɨk gat ae tap wakga gat ae nin gat kɨsi mudokdamaŋ.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon Jon dakon paŋdetni gat ae Juda amɨn kɨnda gat gen emat awit. Ni kosiron da pakbi soŋek Piŋkop da dabɨlon tagɨ kɨlek togɨ yaŋ do gen emat awit.
Uŋun ɨmalon bɨt kɨlapyo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ae bɨrombak tuŋon amɨnyo ae mɨnam kɨsi uŋungwan taŋba pɨndakgɨt.
Bɨsit aŋek abɨŋ pɨndakban paŋdetni dɨpmɨn do yokwisi aŋek aeni dɨpmɨn sigɨn pakgwit. Paŋyolban pɨdaŋ ni gen naŋ iyɨneŋ yaŋ do ɨŋtaŋek ɨsal yɨkgwit.
Mukwa sogok uŋuden da mɨŋat amɨnyo paŋmɨlɨp aban tagɨsisi aŋ tam, mukwa sogok dɨ gat saŋbeŋek dɨma abam. Mukwa sogok da mɨŋat amɨnyo telagɨ yutnon apgwit uŋun wagɨl paŋmɨlɨp aban gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlɨ awit tam, butnikon da suŋ agɨmaŋ dakon gulusuŋnin uŋun sigɨn taŋ nimaŋ yaŋ dɨma nandabam.
“Wain sop pakpak bɨsap kwaŋ taŋakwan oman monjɨ kɨnda yabekban wain bamɨ tɨmɨk paŋopjak do kɨgɨt.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, nandaŋ gadat asak amɨn uŋun egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn asak.
Yaŋ yaŋbal gen kokwin amɨn da saŋbeŋek but pasol gen dɨwarɨ yoyɨŋek amɨn do pasalek yopba kɨgɨmal. Amɨn da wasok agɨmal uŋun do Piŋkop aŋkɨsiwit. Do ni jɨgɨ naŋ tagɨ yomneŋ yaŋ kɨnda dɨma nandawit.
Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da yagɨt, “Moses uŋun but tebanji do aŋek gen teban uŋun mandagɨt.
Ji da gen tebanon gen yaŋ tosok, Amɨn bamorɨ da gen kaloŋɨ naŋgɨn yaŋkwok amal kaŋ, uŋun da gen bamɨ asak.
Yoyɨŋban aŋobɨŋ yɨpba agakwan Juda amɨn Jerusalem da pɨwit da Pol aŋgwasɨŋ akgwit. Aŋek gulusuŋ yokwisi morapmɨsi agɨt yaŋ yaŋek gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Mani gen uŋun bamɨ mɨni ɨsalsi yaŋ ɨmgwit.
Kɨŋ 3 kilok aŋakwan Yesu da yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Eloi, eloi lama sabaktani?” Gen uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yaŋ: “Piŋkopno, Piŋkopno, nido nepmaŋ dekdal?”
Kundu gat mɨktɨm gat wagɨl tasɨk tokdamal, mani gak toktok teban egɨpdɨsal. Uŋun ɨmal gɨraŋɨ da yaŋ pasɨldamal.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, kombɨ amɨn morap kokup kaloŋni da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomaŋ.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn Sunduk da pudaŋ kɨ kabi bamot aŋek iyɨ emat wamjil kaŋ, amɨn kabɨni tebai dɨma egɨpdaŋ. Yaŋ ani kaŋ pasɨl mudokdaŋ.
Yopmaŋakwa uŋun kalbi Amɨn Tagɨ dakon aŋelo kɨnda da dam teban yut dakon yoma wɨtdalek ɨlɨkban waŋga pɨgɨwit.
Wɨsawɨsa do Pol da amɨn morap jap noni do yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Bɨsap dubak butji tagɨ dɨma taŋakwa jap dɨma nawit. Ɨsalsi agakwa gɨldat 14 mudak.
Amɨn Tagɨ uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn, ae nandaŋ gadat uŋun kaloŋɨ, ae telagɨ pakbi sogok uŋun kaloŋɨ gɨn.
Nak abɨsok ji gat dɨma ekwamaŋ. Nak ji gat kɨsi ekwamaŋ tam, gen tagɨsok dɨ tagɨ dayɨkom. Nak ji do nandaba kɨk asat. Niaŋon da ji paŋpulugokeŋ uŋun dɨma nandɨsat.
Altaŋek yaŋ yagɨt, ‘Konilias, gak bɨsit pi asal ae yoni mɨni amɨn paŋpulugosol Piŋkop da uŋun aŋpak kaŋban tagɨsi asak.
Yaŋ aŋakwa yabekbi bamot Banabas gat Pol gat paret aŋ yom do aŋ dakon geni nandaŋ wurɨpdak ɨmalni pɨdaŋek mɨŋat amɨn morap kabɨkon pɨgɨ yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ yagɨmal,
Yaŋban yaŋ iyɨwit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak kɨnda dɨma tam, gagon dɨma aŋopnom.”
“Yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da yagɨt, ‘Abraham dat, uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma. Mani amɨn kɨmakbi kɨnda da kɨŋ altaŋ yomjak kaŋ, padɨk padɨkno da but tobɨl tagɨ ani.’
Yoyɨŋban kɨŋakwa iyɨ bɨsit pi ak do kabapmon wɨgɨgɨt.
Nin ɨleŋɨkon tagɨsi wɨgɨgɨmaŋ. Wɨgek mɨktɨm tɨmjok kɨnda tap binap tosok uŋun mani Malta uŋudon obɨmaŋ yaŋ kokup amɨn da niyɨŋba nandagɨmaŋ.
Yaŋban Samaria mɨŋat da Yesu yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn kɨnda, ae nak Samaria mɨŋat kɨnda, do nido pakbi nabɨ noko yaŋ nayɨsal?” (Mɨŋat uŋun mibɨlɨ yaŋ do yagɨt, Juda amɨn da Samaria amɨn gat not dɨma aŋek egɨpgwit.)
Bamɨ taŋakwa pi ami da bamɨ pasak.”
Yoba tɨmɨk amɨn morap kɨsisi arɨpmɨsi naŋakwa jap nawit dakon dɨwarɨ tawit uŋun paŋdetni da sɨmɨlba yɨgɨ 12 yaŋsi tugawit.
Paŋmuwukbi sugaŋban iyɨ da dabɨlon wagɨl tagɨsisi asak do aŋek yaŋ agɨt. Aban jɨmjɨmɨ mɨni ae garak bo ae yo uŋuden mɨnisi aŋek telagɨ ae gulusuŋni mɨni egɨpni yaŋ do agɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋban Jon Telagɨ Pakbi Sogok Amɨn dakon paŋdetni da abɨŋ yaŋ iyɨwit, “Nin gat ae Parisi amɨn gat Piŋkop do nandaŋek jap kelek egapno gak dakon paŋdet kabɨgo nido yaŋ dɨma aŋ?”
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae tɨmɨsok dɨ egek donjok nandakdaŋ.”
Mibɨltok tepmɨ madep paŋek kɨmakgɨt da buŋon egɨp egɨp aeni abɨdaŋek uŋun amɨn kabɨnikon altaŋ yomgut. Altaŋ yomɨŋek asi kalugɨ egɨsak yaŋ nandani do yo morapmɨ agɨt. Gɨldat 40 uŋun gat egek Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ yoyɨgɨt.
“Pi ɨsalni uŋun geni nandaŋek ŋwakbeŋ aŋ ɨmɨŋek bɨsit tebai yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan egaki don gomango gabeŋ.’
Yesu da saŋbeŋek amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak depmaŋ kɨko ji nak wɨsɨkdaŋ, mani yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Nak da kɨkeŋon arɨpmɨ dɨma apni.”
Juda amɨn gen uŋun nandaŋek aeni waseŋ kɨ kabi bamorɨ awit.
Yo madepsi uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop da ni aŋpak yolneŋ do kɨlɨ niyɨgɨt uŋun tebaisi tɨmɨgek yolneŋ.
Uŋun kɨla amɨn madep da nin dakon babɨknin madepsi paŋkewalek yo jɨgɨsi aŋ yomgut. Yaŋ aŋek gen tebaisi yoyɨŋban monjɨ ŋakŋakni waŋga pabɨgɨ yopba taŋek kɨmakgwit.
Amɨn Dakon Monji uŋun Datni dakon tɨlɨmni gat ae aŋelo kabɨni gat apdɨsak. Uŋun bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn morapyo aŋpakni awit uŋun da arɨpmon tomni yomdɨsak.
Bɨsap kɨndakon Yesu da amɨn Telagɨ Yut Madep da nagalgwan yoyɨŋdet aŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi yoyɨŋ teŋteŋagɨt. Aŋakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨ gat, ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat, ae kɨla amɨn gat kɨsi da Yesukon abɨŋ
Yaŋdo, on mɨktɨm gɨptɨmon ekwamaŋ, bo ae on gɨptɨm yɨpmaŋek Amɨn Tagɨkon kwamaŋ, nin bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ iyɨ aŋpak galak tosok uŋun yol do madepsi galak tomaŋ,
Aŋakwan kadɨm da gen yawit, ae kandapmɨ yokwi ae gɨreŋɨkbi da kosit agɨpgwit, ae dabɨlɨ mɨni da sɨŋtawit. Amɨn da uŋun pɨndagek Israel dakon Piŋkop do tamtam yaŋek aŋkɨsiwit.
Nak asisi dayɨsat, abɨsok amɨn ekwaŋ ji da uŋun dakon kobogɨ yo jɨgɨsi tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Mani yaŋsi nandaki, mibɨ bɨsapmon jɨgɨ morapmɨ yokwisi da noman tokdaŋ.
Gɨldat kanek ae gɨkyo tɨlɨmni ŋwakŋwat ŋwakŋwat. Ae gɨk morap tɨlɨmni iyɨkon iyɨkon taŋ yomaŋ.
Mɨŋat monjɨyono, ji kokup kɨdat da kagɨkon egɨpni.
Mani amɨn kɨnda gen tebani guramɨkdak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop pakyaŋsi but dasi galak taŋ ɨmɨsak. Yaŋ aŋek egɨp egɨpni Piŋkopmonsi taŋakwan egɨsak.
yaŋ iyɨwit, “Namɨn da pi uŋun abi do yaŋ mudaŋ gamgut da yo uŋun asal? Ae namɨn da man madep gamgut?”
Iyɨ dakon kɨsit dasi pi tapmɨmɨ toŋ agɨt. Amɨn iyɨ do nandaba wɨgɨwit amɨn uŋun yolban waseŋ kɨwit.
Yaŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun pɨsɨpmɨsi, yaŋ do aŋek aŋtɨdok ayɨŋ. Nak asisi dayɨsat, ji dakon nandaŋ gadatji uŋun monɨŋɨsisok, mastat yet yombem taŋ damɨsak kaŋ, ji kabap on iyɨŋba tuwɨl kɨ tɨmɨ kɨndakon tagɨ kɨsak. Ae pi morap kɨsi tagɨ ani.”
Ji paŋmuwukbi notji do but dasi galak taŋ yomyom aŋpak dɨma yɨpmaŋ detni.
Yesu gen uŋun yaŋakwan mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ madep kabɨgwan da mɨŋat kɨnda da pɨdaŋ yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Meŋgo si aŋalaŋek mum gaban nagɨl uŋun dasi kɨsɨk kɨsɨk tagɨ asak!”
Uŋun do nak yaŋ dayɨsat, ni yo kɨnda do Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋek yo uŋun tɨmɨtni do nandaŋ gadaŋ kɨmotni kaŋ, yaŋ gɨn tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Yaŋ abal pɨndagek Saimon da moneŋ yom do aŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Nin nandamaŋ, gen teban Piŋkop da ni pi naŋ asak do nandagɨt uŋun asak kaŋ, gen teban uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda.
Not kabɨno, Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo tɨlɨmni madepsi, uŋun nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda do aŋpak tagɨ aŋek ae kɨnda do manji ɨmni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Piŋkop da ji telagɨsi egek yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ dɨma ani do nandɨsak.
Pɨgakwa amɨn morap da kaŋba pɨlɨk bamok aŋek Piŋkop aŋkɨsiŋban
Amɨn da napbɨ gwapbokon teban taŋek tomni tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun kɨlɨ tagap tak da nak do jomaŋek tosok. Tomni uŋun yaŋ: Amɨn Tagɨ da amɨn kɨlegɨ yaŋ nayɨkdɨsak. Amɨn Tagɨ da aŋpak kɨlegɨ yolek amɨn dakon aŋpakni kokwin aŋek mɨŋat amɨnyo gen pikon yopjak bɨsap madepmon tomni uŋun namdɨsak. Ae nak kaloŋ dogɨn dɨma namdɨsak, amɨn morap Yesu noman altaŋban kok do but kɨndap aŋ uŋun do kɨsi yomdɨsak.
Amɨn Tagɨnin Yesu Kristo dakon nandaŋ yawotni ji morap kɨsikon tosak do bɨsit amaŋ.
Yaŋban mɨŋat da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn tagɨ, gak kombɨ amɨn kɨnda yaŋ gandɨsat.
Nak Troas kokup papmon Yesu dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋok ak do abɨŋ altagɨm bɨsapmon, Amɨn Tagɨ da geni yoyɨkeŋ do kosit tagɨsi yɨpmaŋ namgut.
Wudɨp madepsi akdaŋ, ae mɨktɨm dɨkon amɨn da jap do madepsi aŋek amɨn dɨwarɨ da kɨmotdaŋ, ae amɨn morapmɨsi sot akdaŋ. Ae kundukon tɨlak masɨ masɨmɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ altaŋakwa pɨndagek pasal nɨmnɨmɨkyo akdaŋ.
Kalɨp kombɨ amɨn yaŋ gɨn dapmaŋ yolyo awit. Do jiyo kɨsi aŋpakji kɨlegɨ dakon tomni wukwisi Kwen Kokupmon tɨmɨtdaŋ, do but galak nandaŋek kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ani.”
Paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨ do aŋpak tagɨsi aŋ yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Piŋkop da Kristo da manon dɨwarɨsi yopmaŋ damɨsak, yaŋ gɨn ji dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni.
Pɨlɨn pɨlɨndo bot pakbi ɨdap binapmon taŋakwan Yesu iyɨ gɨn tap kɨdɨpmɨŋon egɨpgut.
Mani Yesu da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da jap madepsi kɨnda paŋkosit aŋek amɨn morapmɨ yaŋ yomgut.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Amɨn kɨnda da amɨn tagɨ bamorɨ dakon oman arɨpmɨ dɨma asak. Yaŋ kaŋ, kɨnda naŋgɨn galak taŋ ɨmɨŋek kɨnda do nandaban yokwi taŋ ɨmdɨsak. Ae kɨnda dakon gen guramɨgek kɨnda manji ɨmdɨsak. Ji Piŋkop gat ae moneŋ gat kɨsi dakon oman monjɨni arɨpmɨ dɨma egɨpmɨ.”
Kɨŋakwa mɨŋat kɨnda da abɨŋ manjigwan da Yesu dakon ɨlɨkba pɨgɨkni ɨleŋɨkon ɨgayɨgɨt. Mɨŋat uŋun dagaŋ mok aŋek yawini maŋakwa egakwan bɨlak 12 agɨt.
Ji bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsap madep gat, ae kanek kalugɨ dakon bɨsap madep gat, ae bɨlak kalugɨ dakon gawat gawat bɨsap madep uŋun yol kɨmotdosi nandaŋ.
Papia uŋun mandaŋ damgum uŋun ji paŋkɨlɨk dandak do mandagɨm. Ji yo morapmon nak dakon gen guramɨkgaŋ bo dɨma, uŋun kok do aŋek mandagɨm.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Tap uŋun yo tagɨsi kɨnda. Mani galagɨni pasɨlni kaŋ, niaŋsi aŋek galagɨni aŋkaluk aneŋ?
Amɨn morapmɨ da uŋun amɨn dakon yumabi aŋpakni mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ uŋun yoldaŋ. Yaŋ aba amɨn da aŋpak bamɨ dakon kosit do yaŋba yokwi tok akdaŋ.
Aŋakwan dɨwarɨ da yawit, “Yum kaŋba koneŋ. Elaija da abɨŋ aŋpulugaŋban koneŋ bo dɨma?”
Pailat da aeni gapman da yutnon wɨgɨ Yesu iyɨŋban opban yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep, ma?”
Yaŋba Yesu da nandaŋ yoban koŋ da amɨnon da wɨŋek bɨt da butgwan pɨgɨwit. Pɨgakwa bɨt uŋun pasal abɨgɨŋek pakbi ɨdap tagɨt uŋungwan pɨgek kɨmakgwit. Bɨt kaloŋɨsok dɨma, 2 tausen da kɨmakgwit.
Gak busuŋnokon bɨt nelak dɨma tagal namɨl. Mani mɨŋat on da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi kandapnokon soŋ namɨk.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Sol da yagɨt, “Amɨn Tagɨ gak namɨn?” Yaŋ iyɨŋban yagɨt, “Nak Yesu, nak naŋ aŋupbal ak do pi asal.
Yaŋdo, ji kaloŋ kaloŋ dɨwarɨsi Piŋkop dakon mɨŋat amɨnyokon yaŋkwok ani. Aŋek ji kaloŋ kaloŋ Piŋkop da amɨn dɨwarɨ paŋpulugosak do bɨsit ani, aŋakwa Piŋkop da ji paŋmɨlɨp asak. Amɨn kɨlegɨ kɨnda da bɨsit asak kaŋ, bɨsitni uŋun tapmɨmɨ toŋ, ae amɨn dɨwarɨ tagɨsi paŋpulugogɨ.
Aŋakwan mɨŋat dɨwarɨ dubagɨsogon da agek pɨndak nandaŋyo awit. Uŋun mɨŋat kabɨkon kɨnda mani Maria, kokupni Makdala, ae Maria ŋwakŋwarɨ kɨnda uŋun Jems buŋon nani gat Josep gat dakon meŋi, ae Salome gat kɨsi akgwit.
Kristo dakon gen bamɨ nagon tosok, do nak asisi dayɨsat, amɨn kɨnda da aŋpak agɨm do naga do nandabo wɨgɨsak dakon kositno Akaia provins amɨn kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma sopmaŋ namjak.
Aŋakwan uŋun mibɨltok amɨn da Yesu dakon gen bini nandagɨt, do Juda amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn dɨ yabekban Yesukon kɨwit. Kɨŋ Yesu da abɨŋ oman amɨni aŋmɨlɨp asak do iyɨwit.
Uŋun kaloŋgɨn dagok dagogɨ mɨni tapmɨm morap kɨsi taŋ ɨmɨsak. Uŋun asi.
Ae nin ji do jomjom amaŋ. Ji dɨwarɨ nin dakon gen morap guramɨk kɨmotni bɨsapmon, gen pabɨŋ yopmaŋgaŋ amɨn tepmɨ pi yom do tagap tomaŋ.
Asisi dayɨsat, ji kunam madepsi tatdaŋ, ae bupmɨ kunamyo kɨsi madepsi akdaŋ. Mani mɨktɨm amɨn da kɨsɨk kɨsɨk akdaŋ. Butji wagɨlsi yokwi tokdaŋ, mani but yokwisi dakon kulabɨgɨ don kɨsɨk kɨsɨk madepsi nandakdaŋ.
Gakyo kɨsi uŋun amɨn do kaŋ kɨmokgi. Uŋun nin dakon gen do uwal madepsi agɨt.
Koŋ da amɨn uŋun yɨpmaŋ detjak do Yesu da kɨlɨ iyɨgɨt, uŋun do madepsi yaŋ tɨdaŋek gen uŋun yagɨt. Uŋun amɨn koŋ da bɨsap morapmɨ aŋupbal awit, do amɨn da bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ kɨlani tebaisi aŋek nap teban tebaisi baŋ kɨsit kandapyoni paŋteban awit. Mani nap teban uŋun paŋdagaŋek koŋ da ɨmɨŋ sugaŋakwan mɨktɨm amɨn dɨma ekwaŋ tɨmon kɨŋ kɨŋ agɨt.
Datno da yo morap nolɨgɨt uŋun do dayɨsat. Ae datji da aŋpak ani do dayɨgɨt, ji uŋun baŋ aŋ.”
Yaŋ kaŋek tap wakga kɨŋ tɨpmon tɨdaŋban wagɨl tuwɨl kɨsak yaŋdo si pasalgwit, do tap wakga da buŋɨkon kɨrat madep tap wakga abɨdaŋban akgaŋ 4 kabɨ yopba pɨgɨwit. Yaŋ aŋek wɨsa tepmɨ dagosak do bɨsit pi awit.
Uŋudon Yesu do nandaba wukwan ɨmɨŋek jap pakbiyo madep awit. Aba Mata da jap pɨlɨk yomɨŋakwan Lasarus gat amɨn dɨwarɨ gat kɨsi yɨgek Yesu gat jap nawit.
Ae Amɨn Dakon Monji da abɨŋ jap pakbiyo agɨt. Yaŋ aŋakwan kaŋek ji da yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Kabɨt, jap morapmɨ noknok amɨn ae wain morapmɨsi noknok amɨn. Takis tɨmɨt tɨmɨt ae yokwi pakpak amɨn dakon notni.’
Nin morap kɨsi 276 yaŋ da tap wakgakon agɨpgumaŋ.
Pi madepsi aŋ uŋun do nandaŋek nandaba wukwan yomɨŋek but dasi galak taŋ yomni. Ae not kabɨsi gat but kaloŋ aŋek yaworɨ egɨpni.
Do mibɨltok Piŋkop dakon Amɨn Kɨla Agakni uŋun wɨsɨŋ kok do pini ani, ae aŋpakni kɨlegɨ wusɨk do pini ani. Yaŋ aŋakwa yo dɨwarɨ do wadak wadak aŋ uŋun kɨsi damdɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda yut kwenon egɨpjak kaŋ, yo kabɨni tɨmɨt do yutgwan dɨma pɨgɨsak.
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Nak on gen morap tɨlagon da dayɨsat. Don tɨlak gen ae dɨma dayɨkeŋ. Dat do nomansi dayɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsat.
Ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ Yesu da koŋni yol yomgut ae sotni paŋmɨlɨp agɨt uŋun kɨsi Yesu gat agɨpgwit. Kɨnda uŋun Maria. Maria uŋun Makdala kokupmon nani yaŋ iyɨwit. Kalɨp Yesu da koŋni 7 kabɨ yol ɨmgut.
Uŋun da Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun dakon but paŋteŋteŋ aban Piŋkop dakon mibɨlɨ nandakdaŋ. Aŋek gak dakon amɨn kabɨgo Israel dakon tɨlɨmni egɨpdɨsak.”
Yaŋban Yesu da yaŋ yagɨt, “Jiyo kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ pɨsoŋ?
Yesu da saŋbeŋek yaŋ yagɨt, “Yo amɨn but nandak nandagon da wɨŋ waŋga kwaŋ uŋun da amɨn dakon but paŋupbal aŋ.
Nandaŋek jopbaŋ dakon tamɨ mandaŋ tɨmɨk Yesu kok do kokup pap da waŋga pɨgɨwit. Pɨgek gen papmon da yaŋ yawit: “Osana! Piŋkop aŋkɨsino! ‘Amɨn Tagɨ da manon abɨsak amɨn uŋun gɨsamɨ toŋ egɨsak.’ Israel amɨn dakon kɨla amɨn madep uŋun gɨsamɨ toŋ egɨsak.”
Gen bamɨ dɨma nandaŋ yaŋon da on gen dɨma mandaŋ damɨsat. Ji gen bamɨ nandaŋ, ae gen bamɨ da top gen dɨma paŋalon asak yaŋ nandaŋ do aŋek papia on mandaŋ damɨsat.
Mani amɨn kɨnda mɨktɨm dakon yoni taŋ ɨmɨŋakwa notni kɨnda wadak wadak aŋek egakwan kaŋek bupmɨ nandaŋ ɨmɨŋek dɨma aŋpulugosak kaŋ, Piŋkop da amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak uŋun dakon aŋpak uŋun amɨnon dɨma tosok.
Mani Telagɨ Wup jikon pɨŋban tapmɨm pakdaŋ. Tapmɨm paŋek nak dakon gen Jerusalem kokup papmon yaŋ teŋteŋoni. Ae uŋudon da Judia kokup morap kɨsi, ae Samaria mɨktɨm kɨsi, ae mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨsi yaŋ teŋteŋoni.”
Nido Kristo dasi kɨla amɨn madep egakwan wɨgɨ uwal morapni pabɨŋ yopmaŋakwan pɨŋbini egɨpdaŋ.
“Piŋkop amɨn mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨŋek Monjɨ kaloŋɨ yomgut. Uŋun do nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmni amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn dɨma ani. Egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn ani.
Do mɨŋatjok sakwabat egɨpni uŋun amɨn paŋek monjɨ paŋalaŋek yutni kɨla ani do nandɨsat. Yaŋ ani kaŋ, uwal da aŋpakni tagɨsi uŋun kaŋek gen yokwi arɨpmɨ dɨma yaŋ ɨmni.
Nagal si gawut do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma jokgaljak. Ae lam kɨmot do asak uŋun arɨpmɨ dɨma aban kɨmotjak. Pi tebai aŋakwan wɨgɨ aŋpak kɨlegɨ da aŋpak yokwi wutjɨban tapmɨmɨ mɨni akdɨsak.
Yaŋ aba yokwi iyɨkon gɨn tosok yaŋ nandani do kandapnikon kɨmbabaŋ tawit uŋun tɨdaŋbal kɨŋakwa Ikoniam kokup papmon kɨgɨmal.
Mani ji da amɨn gulusuŋ yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyaŋ, ‘Meŋ datyo do nandaba wɨkwanek yo kabɨ uŋun do paŋpulugogɨ uŋun Piŋkop do paretni kaŋ uŋun tagɨ’ ji da suŋ yaŋ yoyaŋ.
Iyɨŋba Yesu da nandaŋek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji mɨŋat on yum koni. Nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
Pasalba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Nak da naga obɨsat. Ji dɨma pasolni.”
Ae paret awit uŋun moneŋ baŋgɨn dɨma awit. Mibɨltok iyɨ baŋ Piŋkop do paret awit. Ae Piŋkop dakon galaktok yolek iyɨ baŋ nin do kɨsi paret awit.
Aŋakwa Pita uŋun yut da nagalgwan egakwan mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon oman mɨŋatjok kɨnda da opgut.
Yesu uŋun do nayɨkdaŋ yaŋ pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen uŋun yat dakon mibɨlɨ nandak do dɨsi gɨn yoŋ, ma? Yaŋ dayɨt, ‘Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok nak saŋbeŋek ae dɨma nandakdaŋ. Ae bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek ae donjok nandakdaŋ.’
Mukwa sogok amɨn dakon mibɨltok amɨn gat ae gen teban yoyɨŋdet amɨn gat da Yesu aŋman ak do pi madep awit. Yaŋ aŋek amɨn dɨ yabekba abɨŋ Yesu aŋman awit. Uŋun amɨn topmon da Yesu dakon gen nandaŋ galak tawit. Suŋ kɨnda yaŋban abɨdaŋ gapman dakon mibɨltok amɨn madepmon yɨpno gen pikon yɨpjak yaŋ do aŋkewal do awit.
Uŋun do ji mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ kɨŋ mɨŋat amɨn morapyo paŋpulugaŋba nak dakon paŋdet kabɨno dagoni. Aŋek Dat ae Monji ae Telagɨ Wup uŋun da manon telagɨ pakbi soŋ yomni.
Iyɨŋban Yesu da yagɨt, “Kɨlɨ op.” Yaŋ yaŋban Pita da bot yɨpmaŋek pɨŋ pakbi kwenon bamaŋek Yesukon kɨgɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋek amɨn aŋgwasɨŋek yɨkgwit kabɨkon dabɨl sɨŋtaŋek yagɨt, “Nak dakon meŋno ae padɨk padɨkno oni.
Kɨŋek kokup kɨndakon wɨgɨk do aŋakwan amɨn wuda tebani toŋ 10 kabɨ da dubagɨkon agek
Nak amɨn dakon moneŋ ae yo kabɨni do pɨndak galaktok dɨma agɨm.
Abɨsok nak paŋmuwukbi dakon kɨla amɨn gat gen yogogɨ. Nakyo kɨsi kɨla amɨn kɨnda. Naga da dabɨlon Kristo kaŋapbo tepmɨ pagɨt. Ae nak gat ji gat Kristo dakon tapmɨm ae man madep noman altosak bɨsapmon Piŋkop da yo tagɨsi nin morap kɨsi do nim do yagɨt uŋun tɨmɨtdamaŋ. Kɨla amɨn ji pi yaŋ baŋ ani do dayɨsat.
Gebriel Mariakon altaŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gɨldat tagɨ. Amɨn Tagɨ gak gat egɨsak. Piŋkop da mɨŋat dɨwarɨ yapmaŋek gak do yo madep yaŋ nandɨsak.”
Ae jikon amɨn dɨ gat gen dɨ toŋ kaŋ, but tobɨl ani do bɨkbɨk yomni. Aŋek yum pɨndagek dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni. Amɨn Tagɨ da dɨwarɨsi kɨlɨ yopgut, do jiyo kɨsi notji dakon dɨwarɨni yopmaŋ yomni.
Yaŋban iyɨ gɨn notni yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aŋek yaŋ yawit, “Kobogɨ ni gen kɨnda naŋ iyɨneŋ? ‘Piŋkop da yabekgɨt’ yaŋ iyɨneŋ kaŋ, gen tebai yaŋ niyɨsak, ‘Ji nido dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit?’
Gak toktogɨsi Yesu Kristo do nandaki. Uŋun Kɨla Amɨn Madep Dewit da kabɨkon nani, uŋun kɨmagek aeni pɨdagɨt. Nak Gen Bin Tagɨsi on naŋ yaŋ teŋteŋosot.
Geno on yosot uŋun do nandaki, aŋaki Amɨn Tagɨ da nandak nandakgo aban pɨsaŋban gen morap uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ nandabɨ pɨsokdɨsak.
Yaŋ iyɨŋban Pita da pɨdaŋ pɨgɨ amɨn uŋun yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn wɨsaŋ uŋun nak mani. Ji mibɨlɨ nido abeŋ?”
Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gen teban kɨnda mandabi naŋ yolek kɨgɨmal. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Mɨŋat kɨnda monjɨ mibɨltogɨ uŋun wɨli kaŋ, uŋun Amɨn Tagɨ do paret do.”
Aŋek yaŋ tɨdaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Yesu, Piŋkop Wɨkwisi dakon Monji, gak niaŋsi aŋnam do abɨsal? Piŋkop da manon tepmɨ pi dɨma nabi do yaŋ teban ta.”
Telagɨ Wup da but kaloŋ egɨpneŋ dakon aŋpak nimɨŋakwan but yawot da nap da yaŋ waban kabɨ kaloŋɨsi ekwamaŋ. Ji uŋun aŋpak abɨdok do tapmɨmji kɨsi uŋun do paretni.
Mani nin morap Piŋkop da sɨlɨp yɨpgut uŋun da arɨpmon pɨdokdamaŋ. Mibɨltok Kristo, ae don tobɨl apjak bɨsapmon mɨŋat amɨn kabɨ morapni nin kɨmoron da pɨdokdamaŋ.
Gak bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ bɨsitno nandɨsal, mani abɨsok on amɨn ɨdon akgaŋ uŋun da gak da nak yabekbɨ pɨgɨm yaŋ nandani uŋun do aŋek gen uŋun gayɨsat.”
Yesu uŋun gen yaŋek egɨ gɨldat 8 yaŋ da tɨlak mudaŋakwa Pita, Jon ae Jems gat tɨmɨkban ɨleŋ kɨndakon bɨsit pi ak do wɨgɨwit.
Uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morapyo nandaŋ gadat awit do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨŋat amɨnyo tagɨsi yaŋ nandaŋ yomgut. Mani mɨktɨmon egek Piŋkop da yo yom do yaŋ teban tok agɨt uŋun dɨma tɨmɨkgwit,
Enok Piŋkop do nandaŋ gadat agɨt. Aban aŋpakni do tagɨsi nandagɨt, do dɨma kɨmagakwan Piŋkop da abɨdaŋ aŋaŋ Kwen Kokup wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn da wɨsɨŋek dɨma kawit, nido Piŋkop da kɨlɨ abɨdagɨt.
Uŋun amɨn kabɨ gat ae mɨŋat dɨwarɨ gat ae Yesu dakon meŋi gat ae padɨk padɨkni gat kɨsi but kaloŋon da muwugek bɨsit pi saŋbek saŋbek awit.
“Bɨsap dubak gen dɨma yoneŋ, nido on mɨktɨm dakon kɨla amɨn madep kɨlɨ uŋun apdɨsak. Uŋun da nak arɨpmɨ dɨma abɨŋ nepjak.
Yesu da paŋdetni yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ da abɨŋ amɨn paŋkewalba yokwi aŋek maŋ mudokdaŋ. Mani uŋun yokwi ani do dayɨkdaŋ amɨn, awa!
Yut kabeŋ ɨmalnaŋ wasaŋbi uŋun guramɨk awɨlgwit uŋun nak dakon yut dɨma. Dɨsi dakon kokup kɨdatji Molek uŋun dakon yutnaŋ awɨlgwit. Ae kokup kɨdatji Repan uŋun dakon gɨk wup wasaŋek uŋun kɨsi pawɨlek gawak yomgwit. Yaŋ awit do nak da ji dolbo mɨktɨmji yɨpmaŋek Babilon umogap tetgɨn do kɨni.’ ”
Mɨŋat uŋun gɨptɨmɨkon wasok noman tagɨt uŋun nandaŋek burɨ sugaŋban nɨmnɨmɨgek Yesu da buron gawak ɨmɨŋek mibɨlni yaŋ teŋteŋagɨt.
Mani Piŋkop da amɨn manjɨgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ dɨma amɨn yaŋ pɨndakgwit amɨn baŋ manjɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek mɨktɨm dakon nandaŋ kokwini tagɨ amɨn paŋmayak agɨt. Ae Piŋkop da amɨn manjɨgɨt uŋun mɨktɨm amɨn da dabɨlon tapmɨmni mɨni yaŋ pɨndakgwit uŋun baŋ manjɨgɨt. Yaŋ aŋek mɨktɨm dakon amɨn tapmɨmni toŋ paŋmayak agɨt.
Uŋun gɨldaron gɨn kɨla amɨn da wasaŋek Yesu aŋakba kɨmotjak do gen yaŋ paŋkosit awit.
Yesu Jeriko kokup pap kɨŋ aŋkapmat aŋakwan dabɨlɨ mɨni amɨn kɨnda da kosit ɨleŋon yɨgek amɨn da moneŋ ɨmni do bɨsit yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋdo, not kabɨ, Yesu dakon yawini da yokwinin kɨlɨ wɨrɨrɨk mudagɨt, do nin pasol pasolɨ mɨni Yut Burɨ Telagɨsi uŋungwan tagɨ wɨgɨneŋ.
Nido, Kristo da paŋmuwukbi dakon busuŋɨ yɨkdak, uŋun da tɨlak wɨli uŋun mɨŋatni dakon busuŋɨ egɨsak. Paŋmuwukbi uŋun Kristo dakon gɨptɨmɨ, ae Kristo da yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt.
Nak gak gat egɨsat. Nak dakon amɨn morapmɨsi on kokup papmon ekwaŋ, do amɨn kɨnda da dɨma gɨtjak.”
Jikon aŋpak agɨm uŋudeŋ gɨn paŋmuwukbi dɨwarɨkon yaŋ gɨn agɨm. Yo kaloŋɨ kɨnda gɨn jikon dɨma agɨm, ji da nak paŋpulugok ani do jɨgɨ dɨma damgum. Uŋun suŋ agɨm yaŋ nandaŋ? Yaŋ kaŋ dɨwarɨno yɨpmaŋ namni.
Yo morap yaŋ da arɨpmon wasaŋek mukwa sogok amɨn gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ telagɨ yut dakon yut burɨ mibɨltogɨ do wɨgek pini awit.
Yaŋba Yesu da amɨn pɨndagek yoyɨgɨt, “Yaŋ kaŋ Piŋkop da papiakon gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ niaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Yut agak amɨn da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt, uŋun gwak yut kodɨgɨkon tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.’
Kalɨpsigwan Piŋkop da yo tagɨ don noman toni do yagɨt. Yaŋ teban tok uŋun Piŋkop da Abraham gat monji gat do aŋ yomgut. Piŋkop gen papia da “gak dakon gwakgo do” yaŋ dɨma yosok. Monjɨ morapmɨ do dɨma yosok. Kaloŋɨ kɨnda dogɨn yaŋek yaŋ yosok: “Gak dakon monjɨ do.” Uŋun Monjɨ uŋun Kristo.
Naŋakwa Maria da pakbi kɨbaŋɨ toŋ tagɨsi kɨnamɨ kɨnda abɨdagɨt. Uŋun pakbi dakon tɨlakni uŋun 1 lita dakon binap, ae yumaŋ nogɨ uŋun wukwisi. Uŋun pakbi kɨnam abɨdaŋek Yesu da kandapmon tagalek iyɨ dakon busuŋ daŋgwani baŋ ɨkdɨgagɨt. Aban uŋun pakbi dakon kɨbaŋɨ da yut kɨsi ɨlɨmɨk mudagɨt.
Mani Juda amɨn da mɨŋat man madepni toŋ Piŋkop dosi pasalgwit, ae uŋun kokup pap dakon kɨla amɨnyo kɨsi dakon but sugawit. Yaŋ aŋek Pol gat Banabas gat yokwi aŋyomɨŋek uŋun mɨktɨmon dɨma egɨpjil do yolgwit.
Yaŋ iyɨŋba Yesu gat kɨsi kɨwit. Kɨŋ yutni aŋkapmat aŋakwa mibɨltok amɨn da notni dɨ yabekban obɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mibɨltok amɨn da gak do yaŋ yosok, ‘Amɨn Tagɨ, pi madep dɨma gabeŋ. Nak amɨn pɨŋbisi, do nak da yutnon wɨki uŋun da tagɨ dɨma asak.
Nin do nandaba wukwan nimɨŋek but galak do yo morapmɨ nimgwit. Ae tap wakga abɨdok do agɨmaŋ bɨsapmon kosit agek naŋ paŋyo aneŋ do yo uŋun tap wakgakon yopgwit.
Kɨŋek mɨktɨm tɨm kɨnda mani Busuŋ Kɨdat uŋudon Yesu tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋagek yokwi pakpak kɨnda amɨn tet do, ae kɨnda gwandeŋ tet do yaŋ dapgwit.
Uŋun bɨsapmon Amɨn Dakon Monji dakon tɨlak kundukon altaŋban kaŋek mɨktɨmɨ mɨktɨmɨ amɨn kɨsi morap da kunam tatdaŋ. Kaŋakwa Amɨn Dakon Monji tapmɨmni gat ae tɨlɨm madepni gat gɨkwemon da apban kokdaŋ.
Gak gen teban nandaŋ mudosol, uŋun yaŋ: ‘Amɨn dɨma dapba kɨmotni; mɨŋat eyo kɨlɨ abi ji yumabi dɨma ani; yo kabo dɨma noni; top dɨma yoni; top gen yaŋek amɨn notji yum dogɨn gen pikon dɨma yopni; amɨn dakon yo kabɨ paŋkɨlɨgek dɨma tɨmɨtni; meŋ dat do nandaba wukwanek geni guramɨtni.’ ”
Yaŋban Parisi amɨn da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Datgo dukwan egɨsak?” Yaŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji nak dɨma nandaŋ namaŋ, ae Datno kɨsi dɨma nandaŋ ɨmaŋ. Nandaŋ namaŋ tam, Datnoyo kɨsi tagɨ nandaŋ ɨbam.”
Aŋek gen morap amɨn morapmɨ da dabɨlon yaŋ teŋteŋaŋapbo nandagɨl, uŋun Piŋkop gen tebai abɨdoŋ amɨn do yobi. Aŋaki uŋun da amɨn dɨwarɨ kɨsi tagɨ yoyɨŋdetni.
Yaŋdo, kɨlɨ dayɨt, ji yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ. Ji nak Uŋun Amɨn yaŋ dɨma nandaŋ gadaŋ namni kaŋ, yokwisi taŋ damɨŋakwa kɨmotdaŋ.”
Gen uŋun nandaŋek uŋudon gɨn terɨ terɨ sɨŋtaŋek amɨn bamot ae dɨma pɨndakgwit. Yesu iyɨ gɨn kawit.
Yesu gat paŋdetni gat Jerusalem kokup pap aŋkapmat aŋek Betpage ae Betani kokupmon kɨŋ altawit. (Kokup bamot uŋun Ɨleŋ Olipmon tomal.) Altaŋek Yesu da paŋdetni bamorɨ yabegek,
On Juda amɨn kabɨ nak asɨdon gen kokwin amɨn kabɨni da ɨŋamon agapbo kɨlɨ nandawit. Do ni gulusuŋno naŋ kawit uŋun naŋsi gayɨni do yoyɨ.
Paŋdetni da gen uŋun nandaŋek iyɨwit, “Amɨn Tagɨ, uŋun yo morap dukon noman toni?” Iyɨŋba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Amɨn kɨmakbi dakon bumjotni dukwan toŋ, sɨŋgɨŋ uŋudon gɨn muwukgaŋ.”
Kɨla amɨn madep Agripa, gak kombɨ amɨn dakon gen nandaŋ teban tosol yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Wɨli kɨnda gɨptɨmni mandabi da don Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, dɨma mandabi yaŋ koni dakon pi dɨma asak. Ae wɨli kɨnda gɨptɨmni dɨma mandabi da don Piŋkop da yaŋ ɨlɨkgɨt kaŋ, gɨptɨmni dɨma mandɨsak.
Ae gen morap yoni, ae pi morap anikon nin Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu dakon mɨŋat amɨnyo yaŋ nandaŋek ani. Aŋek Yesu da manon yo morap do Piŋkop ya yaŋ iyɨni.
Gak yo morap pɨndak nandaŋyo agɨl uŋun mɨŋat amɨn morap yoyɨŋ teŋteŋokdɨsal.
Yesu saŋbek saŋbek kalugɨ dakon binap amɨnon apgwit. Ae Yesu dakon yawi mumumni mawiron apgwit. Uŋun yawi da yokwinin wɨrɨrɨkdak, do uŋun Abel dakon yawi yapmaŋdak. Abel dakon yawi da kobogɨ tɨmɨt do yosok.
Nak Amɨn Tagɨsi ae Yoyɨŋdetji da kandapji sugat. Do jiyo kɨsi notji dakon kandap sugaŋ sugaŋ ani.
Aŋakwan Pailat da iyɨgɨt, “Kobogɨ nayɨk do dɨma nandɨsal, ma? Gepbo kɨki bo ae tɨlak kɨndapmon gɨtni dakon yaŋ dagok nagon gɨn tosok. Gak uŋun dɨma nandɨsal, ma?”
Nak naga egɨp egɨp dakon bret.
Yesu ɨleŋon egakwan paŋdet kabɨni boron da kɨŋ dubak taŋakwa mɨrɨm da abɨŋ bot tomnikon tɨdaŋakwan pakbi da madepsi tamalɨgakwan bot tobɨl tobɨl agɨt.
But yawot gagon tosak. Notgoni ɨdon ekwamaŋ uŋun da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ gayaŋ. Notnoni uŋudon ekwaŋ amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ manikon da gɨldat tagɨ yaŋ yoyɨŋ yoyɨŋ aki.
“Amɨn morap iyɨ do nak butnokon yo tagɨ mɨnisi yaŋ nandaŋ amɨn, uŋun amɨn da Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak da kagagwan ekwaŋ, do uŋun kɨsɨk kɨsɨk ekwaŋ.
Yesu da oman amɨn yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji pakbi koleŋ tɨbɨrɨkon tagalba pɨkwan.” Yoyɨŋban yaŋ aba genikon wɨŋ tugawit.
Mɨrɨm uŋun galaktokni yolek dukwan dukwan tagɨni kɨsak. Wuwɨgɨ nandamaŋ mani dukwan da abɨsak ae dukwan kɨsak uŋun dɨma kaŋ pɨsomaŋ. Amɨn morap Wupmon da altoŋ uŋun yaŋ gɨn.”
Nak mɨktɨmon naŋ aŋenotni bɨsapmon amɨn kɨsisi ɨlɨkgo nagakon apdaŋ.”
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek Yesu da yoyɨgɨt, “Mɨŋat on nido jɨgɨ ɨmaŋ? Mɨŋat on nak do yo tagɨsi asak.
Uŋudon tɨlak kɨndapmon aŋakgwit. Amɨn bamorɨ kɨsi tɨlak kɨndap terɨ terɨ dapmaŋakwa Yesu binapmon akgɨt.
Yaŋ egakwan uŋun da yut yoma kagakon yoni mɨni amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋudon pak egɨpgut. Lasarus yaŋ nandagɨt, yoni morapmɨ amɨn dakon jap tamokon da jap jɨmjɨm moŋ uŋun baŋ nokeŋ kaŋ tagɨsi yaŋ nandagɨt. Ae pɨŋan da abɨŋ wudani asɨwukgwit.
Mukwa sogok dakon mibɨltok amɨn dakon mibɨlɨ uŋun yaŋ. Piŋkop da amɨn kɨnda abɨdaŋ mɨŋat amɨnyo dakon binap amɨni egɨpjak do manjɨsak. Uŋun Piŋkop do but galak dakon yo mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ ɨmɨm gat ae yokwi wɨrɨrɨt dakon paret mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ agak dakon pi baŋ asak.
Do nibaŋ abeŋ do nandaŋ? Si baljaŋek paŋkɨlek ak do opbeŋ do nandaŋ? Bo but dasi galaktaŋ damɨŋek aŋpak yaworɨsi aŋdabeŋ do nandaŋ?
Egek uŋudon gɨn Juda amɨn dakon muwut muwut yut agek Piŋkop dakon gen yaŋek yagɨt, “Yesu uŋun Piŋkop dakon Monji.”
Paŋmuwukbi notnin kɨnda bo ae samɨnin kɨnda ɨmalni yokwi gɨn, aŋakwan japni mɨni kaŋ,
Uŋun mɨŋat Israel mɨŋat kɨnda dɨma, uŋun Grik mɨŋat kɨnda Ponisia tetgɨn Siria mɨktɨmon altagɨt. Yesu da gwi dakon koŋ yol ɨmjak do bɨsit tebai iyɨgɨt.
Nataniel uŋun gen nandaŋek yaŋkwok yaŋ agɨt, “Yoyɨŋdet, gak Piŋkop dakon Monji. Gak Israel amɨn dakon Kɨla Amɨn Madep.”
Tɨmɨsok dɨ egek amɨn kapmatjok akgwit uŋun da kɨŋ Pita yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak dakon tek nandano asi gak uŋun amɨn kabɨ dakon kokup ɨsalni kɨnda yaŋ asak, do gak uŋun da kabɨkon nani yaŋ nandamaŋ.”
Jap naŋ yɨgek Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Asisi dayɨsat, jikon da kɨnda da uwal da kɨsiron nepdɨsak.”
Uŋun bɨsapmon paŋdetni 12 kabɨkon kɨnda egɨpgut mani Judas Iskariot. Uŋun da mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨkon kɨŋek Yesu kɨsitnikon yɨpjak do yoyɨgɨt.
Yaŋ aŋakwa notni da pɨndak nandaŋyo aŋek Sol Sisaria kokupmon aŋkɨ yabekba Tasas kokupmon kɨgɨt.
paŋdetni yaŋ yoban apba 12 kabɨ manjɨgɨt. Manjɨŋek yabekbi man yomgut.
Mani asisi dayɨsat, nak ji paŋpulugok do depmaŋ dek wɨgɨkdɨsat. Dɨma wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, Paŋpulugokji jikon dɨma pɨkdɨsak. Mani nak wɨgɨkeŋ kaŋ, nak da yabekgo jikon pɨkdɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda da Kwen Kokup dɨmasi wɨgɨgɨt. Amɨn Dakon Monji Kwen Kokup da pɨgɨt uŋun dagɨn wɨgɨgɨt.
Aban Yesu da tobɨl kaŋek yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gwano, dɨma pasolgi. Nandaŋ gadaŋ namɨsal, do kɨlek tosol.” Yaŋ yaŋban uŋudon gɨn gɨptɨmni kɨlek tagɨt.
Yesu da yabekbini 12 kabɨ yaŋ yoban obɨŋ muwukba sot amɨn paŋmɨlɨp agak, ae koŋ kɨsisi yolni dakon pi ani do yaŋ mudaŋ yomgut.
Mani Yesu da kɨsirɨkon abɨdaŋek aban pɨdaŋ akgɨt.
Betani kokup uŋun Jerusalem da kapmatjok 3 kilomita da tɨlak tosok.
Ji pakyaŋsi nandani. Yokwi pakpak amɨn da Yesu aŋpak yokwisi aŋ ɨmɨŋakwa tebaisi akgɨt. Ji uŋun do nandaŋek tapmɨm yawot dɨma ani, ae butji dɨma yawotjak.
“Yaŋ nayɨŋban nak da wasaŋek yaŋapbo Telagɨ Wup ninon mibɨltok pɨgɨt uŋun amɨn kabɨkon yaŋ gɨn pɨgɨt.
Kalɨp Erot da padɨge Pilip dakon mɨŋatni Erodias tuwɨl pagɨt. Aban Jon da Erot yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Gak gen teban yapmaŋek padɨgɨgo dakon mɨŋatni tuwɨl pal. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.” Gen uŋun nandaŋek Erot da obip amɨni yabekban kɨŋ Jon abɨdaŋek nap teban naŋ wamaŋ dam tebanon yɨpgwit.
Pol da gen uŋun yaŋban nandaŋek Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu da manon telagɨ pakbi sowit.
Ji amɨn kokwin aŋ uŋun mɨktɨm da aŋpagon kokwin aŋ. Nak amɨn kɨnda dɨma kokwinɨkdat.
Ae Kristo meme bo ae bulmakau monɨŋ dakon yawi baŋ tɨmɨgek uŋun Yut Burɨ Telagɨsigwan dɨma wɨgɨgɨt. Uŋun iyɨ dakon yawi naŋ tɨmɨgek telagɨ yutgwan bɨsap kaloŋ kɨnda gɨn wɨgɨgɨt. Aŋek nin yokwikon baŋ yumaŋ naŋban egɨp egɨp dagok dagogɨ mɨni do amɨn agɨmaŋ.
Mɨŋat amɨnyo kɨmot do pasolgoŋ, aŋek mɨktɨmon ekwaŋ bɨsap morap kɨmot da pasol yoban dam tebangwan yaŋ ekwaŋ. Mani Yesu uŋun dam teban yɨpmaŋ detni do aŋek kɨmakgɨt.
Asisi, bɨt madepsi kamel uŋun da ɨmal bupbup da kosit gwagagon arɨpmɨ dɨma pɨgɨgɨ asak. Mani uŋun yapmaŋek yoni morapmɨ amɨn uŋun Piŋkop da Amɨn Kɨla Asak uŋun da kagagwan arɨpmɨ dɨmasi pɨgɨgɨ asak.”
Gɨsam yomyom gat ae jobɨt gat kɨsi uŋun gen kaga kaloŋon dagɨn noman tomal. Not kabɨ, uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Eliakim uŋun Melea dakon monji. Melea uŋun Mena dakon monji. Mena uŋun Matata dakon monji. Matata uŋun Natan dakon monji. Natan uŋun Dewit dakon monji.
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek gen kokwin amɨn da japmɨsi nandaŋek yabekbi kabɨ dapba kɨmotni do nandawit.
Pol da amɨn kɨmoron da pɨdoni do yaŋban amɨn dɨwarɨ da jɨgɨlak gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Mani dɨwarɨ da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Yo uŋun yosol uŋun do dɨ gat niyɨŋbɨ nandaneŋ do nandamaŋ.”
Ji paret ak do wagɨlsi tagap taŋ yaŋsi nandamaŋ. Mani nak gat Masadonia amɨn dɨ gat da obɨŋ dandano ji dɨma tagap toni kaŋ, nak gat ji gat kɨsi mayagɨ pakdamaŋ.
Wɨgakwal pɨndagek amɨn da yaŋba yokwi tok aŋ ɨmɨŋek yaŋ yawit, “Uŋun yokwi pakpak amɨn kɨnda da yutnon wɨgɨk.”
Yaŋban Pita da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn dɨwarɨ dakon nandaŋ gadat wɨtdal kɨsak kaŋ, nak yaŋ arɨpmɨ dɨma abeŋ.”
Kwen Kokup Datji gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨsak, do jiyo yaŋ gɨn gwaljɨgɨ mɨni kɨlegɨsi egɨpni.”
Yaŋ nandaŋek Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak on gen yoŋ nandɨsal?” Yaŋ yaŋba Yesu da gen kobogɨ yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gen yoŋ uŋun nandɨsat, mani ji gen kɨnda tosok uŋun dɨma manjaŋ? Gen uŋun yaŋ: ‘Gak mɨŋat monjɨyo gat ae monjɨ ŋakŋak gat paŋtagap aŋaki mango yaŋ aŋenokgoŋ.’ ”
Nak gen on kɨlɨ nandawit yaŋ nandɨsat, uŋun yaŋ: Piŋkop da ji do aŋek nak do nandaŋ yawok namɨŋek pi uŋun abeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt.
Yaŋ do aŋek, ae aŋelo da nindaŋ do aŋek, mɨŋat uŋun busuŋni wɨtjɨsaksi. Yaŋ asak uŋun da eni do gawat gawat asak dakon tɨlak.
Yaŋba uŋudon gɨn amɨn kɨnda tɨmtɨm yaŋek kɨŋ yo kɨnda gugɨdan yombem jol dɨwaron wamaŋ wain gat ae pakbi ɨsɨpmɨ gat uŋungwan sɨbɨŋek Yesu da nosak do aŋenak ɨmgut.
Nido Amɨn Tagɨ dakon gɨptɨm tɨm do dɨma nandaba wɨgakwan bret wainyo noni kaŋ, gulusuŋ aŋ do Piŋkop da kobogɨ damdɨsak.
Amɨn kɨnda amɨn do but dasi galak taŋ yomɨsak kaŋ, uŋun teŋteŋɨkon egɨsak. Teŋteŋɨkon agakwan yo kɨnda da arɨpmɨ dɨma kesalban aŋatjak.
Aŋakwan pɨlɨndo paŋdetni da abɨŋ Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Mɨktɨm amɨni mɨnikon ekwamaŋ, ae gɨldat kɨlɨ pɨgɨkdɨsak, do yoyɨŋbɨ amɨn kabɨ madep kokup monɨŋ monɨŋ kɨŋek iyɨ do jap yumaŋ noni.”
Nak Jerusalem wɨgɨgɨm bɨsapmon Juda amɨn dakon mukwa sogok amɨn dakon amɨn madep kabɨni gat, ae kɨla amɨni gat da uŋun amɨn gen yaŋ ɨmgwit. Yaŋ ɨmɨŋek suŋ agɨt dakon kobogɨ nak da yaŋ dagok aŋapbo kobogɨ yokwi abɨdosak do yawit.
Bɨsap pɨsɨpmɨsok egek mɨktɨm amɨn da nak dɨma nandakdaŋ. Mani ji da nak nandakdaŋ. Nak egɨsat, do jiyo kɨsi yaŋ gɨn egɨpdaŋ.
Yesu do tɨlak gen kɨnda yaŋ yaŋbi: ‘Yut agak amɨn ji da gwak yokwi yaŋ yaŋek maba kɨgɨt. Uŋun gwak tɨp kɨnda naŋ tɨdawit da akdak.’
Piŋkop da Telagɨ Yutnon telagɨ pi aŋ amɨn uŋun Telagɨ Yut dakon jap baŋ tɨmɨkgaŋ. Ae alta dakon pi aŋ amɨn da altakon paret do bɨt kɨlapyo mukwa sosoŋ uŋun dakon dɨwarɨ noŋ. Ji uŋun dɨma nandaŋ, ma?
Toktogɨsi tebaisi agek jɨgɨ guramɨtni, yaŋ aŋakwa uŋun aŋpak da jikon teban tosak. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop dakon aŋpak kɨnda do wadak wadak dɨma ani. Aŋpakji da tagɨsi ae kɨlegɨsi akdɨsak.
Amɨn bamot Telagɨ Wup da yabekban Selusia kokup papmon pɨgɨgɨmal. Pɨgek uŋudon da tap wakgakon da Saiprus wɨgɨgɨmal.
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji dabɨlji mɨni ekwaŋ tam, yokwisi mɨni. Mani ‘dabɨlnin toŋ’ yaŋ yoŋ, do yokwisi dakon gen uŋun sigɨn taŋ damɨŋ aŋaŋ kɨsak.”
Amɨn kɨnda yumabi aŋpak asak do kaŋ kɨmotni. Bo amɨn kɨnda Iso da Piŋkop manji ɨmgut uŋudeŋ asak do kaŋ kɨmotni. Uŋun jap bɨsap kaloŋ noknogɨ uŋun tɨmɨt dogɨn aŋek yo kabɨni monjɨ mibɨltogɨ amɨn da tɨmɨrɨ uŋun kɨsi ɨmgut.
Yaŋ yaŋban nandaŋek Parisi amɨn da Yesu yaŋ iyɨwit, “Gak gaga naŋ joŋɨgek gaga do yaŋkwok asal, do nandano bamɨ dɨma asak.”
Yaŋ do aŋek Piŋkop da mɨktɨm wasagɨron da kombɨ amɨn morap dapba kɨmakgwit uŋun dakon kobogɨ amɨn abɨsok ekwaŋ uŋun da tɨmɨtdaŋ.
Mɨŋat on Abraham dakon gwi, Sunduk da tebai abɨdaŋakwan bɨlakni 18 agɨt. Sabat bɨsapmon dɨma pulugaŋ kɨsak do nandaŋ, ma?”
Yaŋ yaŋakwan kombɨ amɨn kɨnda da kalɨpsigwan gen yagɨt uŋun bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ:
Nak wɨli kokupmɨ kokupmɨ ekwaŋ uŋun telagɨ kɨsitni paŋenagek bɨsit ani do nandɨsat. Butjap ae gen emarɨ mɨni egek bɨsit ani do nandɨsat.
Gen paŋteban agak dakon aŋpak uŋun yaŋ. Amɨn kɨnda da manon gen yaŋ aŋteban aŋ kaŋ, uŋun amɨn wukwisi ae iyɨ yapmaŋdak yaŋ yolɨsak. Amɨn kɨnda gen yaŋ aŋteban ak asak kaŋ, uŋun da geni aŋteban aŋakwan amɨn geni abɨŋ yɨp do nandayɨŋ amɨn dakon gen kositni sopmaŋ yomɨsak.
Gɨldat kabi dɨ egɨ mudaŋakwa Peliks gat mɨŋatni Drusila gat apgumal. Drusila uŋun Juda mɨŋat kɨnda. Peliks da Pol yaŋ ɨban obɨŋ Yesu Kristo nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨm dakon mibɨlɨ do iyɨŋakwan nandagɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋba nandaŋek yoyɨŋban kɨwit. Kɨŋakwa pasɨlɨkon da gɨk dakon mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn Erot da yoyɨŋban apgwit. Apba yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Gɨk uŋun ni bɨsapmonsi altagɨt?”
Nit kaloŋɨ ekwamak yaŋ gɨn uŋun amɨn kaloŋɨsi egɨpni, yaŋ do tɨlɨm namgul uŋun kɨlɨ yomgum.
Emat uŋudon Yesu nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmɨŋ kɨmagek butgokon da yokwi tagɨyo dakon kokwin tagɨsi aŋek egɨpbi. Amɨn dɨwarɨ yokwi amaŋ yaŋ nandaŋ mani yaŋkwok aba Piŋkop da paŋkɨlek asak do dɨma nandaŋ. Do nandaŋ gadatni tap wakga da yaŋ tɨpmon tɨdaŋek tuwɨl kwaŋ.
Gak mɨŋat amɨnyo aego butni pabɨ pɨsaŋba kɨla amɨn madep gat ae gapman dakon pɨŋbini egek geni guramɨk kɨmotni. Aŋek bɨsapmɨ bɨsapmɨ pi tagɨsi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ morapmɨ ak do tagap toni.
Iyɨŋban Nikodemus da iyɨgɨt, “Amɨn pelaŋ kɨlɨ abi kɨnda da niaŋ aŋek aeni altosak? Meŋi da butgwan pɨgek aeni tagɨ altosak?”
Amɨn kɨnda mani Lasarus uŋun sot agɨt. Kokupni uŋun Betani, uŋun Maria gat peni Mata gat dakon kokupni.
Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun nak nol kɨmotjak. Aŋek nak da egɨsaron oman amɨno kɨsi egɨpdeŋ. Nak do oman asak amɨn uŋun Datno da man madep ɨmdɨsak.”
Yaŋ yaŋek tobɨl Yesu akban kagɨt. Mani Maria da uŋun Yesu yaŋ dɨma kaŋban pɨsagɨt.
Yaŋ yaŋek meŋi ae datni dɨma paŋpulugosok. Aŋek ji da uŋun amɨn do yaŋ yoŋ, ‘Uŋun amɨn tagɨ asak nido yo uŋun Piŋkop do kɨlɨ manjɨgɨt.’
Juda amɨn da Amɨn Tagɨ Yesu aŋakba kɨmakgɨt, ae kombɨ amɨn kɨsi dapba kɨmakgwit, ae nin nolba kɨgɨmaŋ. Piŋkop da aŋpak pɨndakban ɨŋani aŋ uŋun aŋek amɨn morap kɨsi uwal aŋ yomaŋ.
Melkisedek Abraham gat domdom agɨmal bɨsapmon Liwai Israel amɨn dakon yo tɨmɨt tɨmɨt amɨn uŋun babɨkni Abraham da yawikon egɨpgut, do nin yaŋ tagɨ yoneŋ, Abraham da Melkisedek do yo ɨmgut bɨsapmon Liwai da ɨmgut yaŋ asak.
Yo uŋun si kagɨt amɨn uŋun da iyɨ uŋun dakon yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Ae iyɨ bamɨsi yosot yaŋ nandɨsak, do jiyo kɨsi nandaŋ gadat ani yaŋ do gen uŋun yaŋ teŋteŋosok.
Kalɨp kɨlɨ dayɨgɨmaŋ gen uŋun baŋgɨn ae dayɨsat: amɨn kɨnda da Gen Bin Tagɨsi kɨnda nin da dayɨno abɨdawit uŋudensi dɨma yaŋ teŋteŋosak kaŋ, uŋun amɨn Tɨpdom do amɨn asak.
Uŋudeŋ gɨn kabo noknok bamot terɨ terɨ dapbi uŋunyo kɨsi yaŋba yokwi tok yaŋ gɨn agɨmal.
Mandaŋ dagaŋ ɨdapmon yɨpmaŋ aŋabɨŋ mɨŋatjok uŋun do ɨba aŋkɨ meŋi do ɨmgut.
Amɨn morap mibɨltok apgwit uŋun kabo noknok ae amɨn dapmaŋek yoni gwayaŋ amɨn. Mani sipsip da geni dɨma nandaŋ yomgwit.
Mani Parisi amɨn gat ae gen teban mibɨlɨ nandak nandak amɨn gat uŋun Jonon telagɨ pakbi dɨma sowit. Yaŋ aŋek Piŋkop da kosit kɨlegɨ yolɨk do agɨt uŋun manji ɨmgwit.)
Mɨŋat eyo aŋpak uŋun yo madepsi kɨnda, do amɨn morap kɨsi da uŋun do nandaba wɨgakwan kɨlani aŋakwa gwaljɨgɨ mɨnisi tosak. Nido Piŋkop da yumabi aŋpak mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ aŋ amɨn uŋun kobogɨ yo yokwisi aŋ yomdɨsak.
Moses dakon gen teban da yaŋ yosok, Israel amɨn yo kabɨni kokwinɨkba kabi 10 aŋakwa uŋudon baŋ kabi kɨnda Liwai amɨn kabɨkon mukwa sogok pi tɨmɨkgaŋ amɨn do yomni. Israel amɨn uŋun Liwai dakon notni, ae uŋun Abraham dakon monjini kɨsi, mani Israel amɨn da yo kabɨni taŋ yomaŋ uŋun dakon kabi kɨnda notni uŋun do yomaŋ.
Ae emat amɨn dɨwarɨ da yaŋ iyɨwit, “Ae nin niaŋsi aneŋ?” Iyɨŋba yoyɨgɨt, “Ji amɨn yo yokwi aŋ yomɨŋek top yoyɨŋek moneŋni dɨma tɨmɨtni. Topmon da gen pikon dɨma yopni. Pi aŋ dakon yumaŋ nogɨ tɨmɨkgaŋ uŋun arɨpninon tɨmɨkgamaŋ yaŋ nandaba mudosak.”
Mani gen morap gat ae aŋpak morap gat kokwin tagɨsi ani. Aŋek yo tagɨsi baŋ tɨmɨgek
Yaŋ aŋakwal Pol Sailas naŋ abɨdagɨt. Aŋakwan paŋmuwukbi da Amɨn Tagɨ dakon nandaŋ yawotni jilon tosak yaŋ yoyɨŋba kɨgɨmal.
Pol da sɨŋtaŋban gen kokwin amɨn kabɨkonsi kɨŋakwan pɨndagek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Not kabɨ, abɨkikon da wɨŋ abɨsok egɨsaron nak Piŋkop da dabɨlon butnokon da tagɨsi egɨ aŋaŋ wɨt yaŋ nandɨsat.”
Uŋun dakon tɨlak uŋun yaŋ. Nak monɨŋɨsok egɨpgum bɨsapmon gen amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlagon yagɨm, ae nandak nandakno gat ae kokwin agakno gat amɨn monɨŋ da tɨlak egɨpgum. Mani amɨn madep aŋek amɨn monɨŋ aŋpak yɨpmaŋ mudagɨm.
Nak Pol, Yesu Kristo dakon yabekbi kɨnda. Piŋkop da iyɨ da galak togon yabekbi pi abeŋ do nak manjɨgɨt. Nak gat ae notnin Timoti gat nit da
Mani aŋelo da yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Sekaraia, Piŋkop da bɨsitgo kɨlɨ nandagɨt, do dɨma pasolgi. Mɨŋatgo Elisabet da monji wɨli kɨnda aŋalakdɨsak. Mani Jon yaŋ iyɨki.
Yaŋban iyɨwit, “Yawi dɨwatjikon Jon man kɨnda dɨma tosok.”
Ji da nin do Kristo dakon pi amɨni yaŋ nandaŋ nimni, ae Piŋkop dakon geni pasɨlɨ kɨlani tagɨsi aŋek yaŋ teŋteŋok dakon pi ninon tosok yaŋ nandaŋ nimni.
Yaŋdo, opbeŋ kaŋ aŋpak asak uŋun do yaŋkwok abeŋ. Uŋun nin do yaŋba yok aŋek gen yokwi mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ yosok. Ae Yesu dakon pi amɨn yutnikon dɨma paŋkɨsak. Ae uŋun gɨn dɨma, paŋmuwukbi da pi amɨn iyɨ da yutnon paŋkɨk do aba yaŋsop aŋyomɨsak. Ae paŋmuwukbi kabɨ da waŋga egɨpni do yoldak.
Paŋmuwukbi notji top gen dɨma yoyɨni. Nido, but kalɨp gat aŋpakni gat kɨlɨ yopgwit.
Ae Amɨn Ŋwakŋwarɨ Kabɨ jiyo kɨsi gen bamɨ kɨlɨ abɨdawit. Uŋun Piŋkop dakon Gen Bin Tagɨsi ji yokwikon baŋ tɨmɨkgɨt uŋun. Ji Kristo kɨlɨ nandaŋ gadaŋ ɨmgwit, aŋakwa Piŋkop da yaŋ teban tok kalɨp agɨt uŋun yolek ji do Telagɨ Wup damgut. Uŋun da iyɨ dakon mɨŋat amɨn bamɨsi awit dakon tɨlak asak.
Uŋun Wup kaloŋ dagɨn uŋun yo morap paŋalon asak. Iyɨ da galaktogon but galak dakon yo kokwinɨgek amɨn kaloŋ kaloŋ do yomɨŋ yomɨŋ asak.
Nak da yo ani do dolɨsat, uŋun kaŋek uŋun naŋ gɨn ani.
Uŋun dakon mibɨlɨ Telagɨ Wup kɨsi da nin do yaŋ teŋteŋok asak. Mibɨltok yaŋ yosok:
Yaŋ yaŋakwa Yesu da mɨŋat uŋun yaŋ iyɨgɨt, “Nandaŋ gadatgo do aŋek Piŋkop da gak yokwikon naŋ abɨdosok. Butgo yaworɨ taŋakwan kɨki.”
Yaŋba Yesu da yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Piŋkop dakon gen teban yɨpmaŋek babɨkji dakon gen paŋteban aŋek uŋun baŋ paŋ ekwaŋ. Uŋun tagɨ dɨma.
Yesu jap noknok tamokon yɨgakwan mɨŋat kɨnda pakbi kɨbaŋɨ tagɨsi abɨdaŋ awɨŋ Yesu da busuŋon tagalgɨt. (Uŋun pakbi yumaŋ nogɨ wukwisi ae tɨbɨrɨ uŋun tɨpnaŋ wasaŋbi.)
Ji yaŋ aŋek babɨkji dakon gen teban guramɨgek Piŋkop dakon gen teban maba kɨsak.
Gen bamɨ ninon tosok, ae dagok dagogɨ mɨni tokdɨsak. Uŋun do aŋek but dasi galak taŋ damamaŋ.
Do ji Piŋkop da emat dakon yo damɨsak uŋun kɨsi morap tɨmɨgek bɨsap yokwikon emaron tebai tagɨ atni. Ae emat dagosak bɨsapmon ji tebai sigɨn atni.
Uŋun nandaŋek kokup kɨnda mani Nasaret, Galili mɨktɨmon tosok, uŋudon paŋkɨ egɨpgwit. Yaŋ aba kombɨ amɨn dakon gen bamɨ noman tagɨt. Gen uŋun yaŋ: “Nasaret amɨn yaŋ iyɨni.”
Gɨldatno tagɨ Prisila gat ae Akwila gat ae Onesiporus dakon gwakni kɨsi do yoyɨki.
Yaŋ aba Yesu da nawa gen yaŋ yoyɨgɨt, “Ji Parisi amɨn gat ae Erot gat uŋun dakon yis do pasalek kaŋ kɨmotni.”
Nak Onesimus yabekgo Tikikus gat kɨgɨmal. Onesimus uŋun notnin tagɨsi. Uŋun pi do but dasi nandaŋek aŋ kɨmokdok. Uŋun ji da kabɨkon amɨn kɨnda. Uŋun bamot da yo morap ɨdon noman tawit uŋun do dayɨkdamal.
Ae jɨgɨ dɨwarɨ mibɨlɨ mibɨlɨ gat kɨsi pagɨm. Ae gɨldarɨ gɨldarɨ paŋmuwukbi morap do nandaba kɨk aŋek jɨgɨ madepsi pasat.
Apba yoyɨŋ degek yaŋ yoyɨgɨt,
Nandani. Nak ji da tuŋon amɨn emarɨ toŋ gat ae skopion gat bamoni, ae uwal dakon tapmɨm kɨsisi pabɨŋ yopni do yaŋ mudaŋ damɨsat. Yo kɨnda da ji arɨpmɨ dɨma paŋupbal asak.
Do ji yis kalɨpmɨ wɨrɨrɨkba kɨŋ mudoni, aŋakwa bret kalugɨ yisni mɨni da yaŋ egɨpni. Nak nandɨsat, ji bret yisni mɨni yombem da ekwaŋ, nido Kristo naŋ Yapyap Bɨlak do Sipsip mukwa sosoŋ uŋudeŋ nin dakon dɨwarɨnin mudoni do kɨlɨ soŋbi.
Mani Juda amɨn da yaŋ do dɨma galak tawit. Yaŋ awit do Sisa dagɨn geno nandɨsak do yagɨm. Mani nak naga dakon amɨn kabɨno gen pikon yopbeŋ yaŋon da dɨma agɨm.
Abɨsok yaŋsi nandaŋ, yo morap namgul uŋun gak dasi namgul yaŋ nandaŋ.
“Yaŋ yaŋban yoni morapmɨ amɨn da gen tebaisi yaŋ iyɨgɨt, ‘Yaŋ kaŋ, dat, nandaŋ namɨŋek Lasarus iyɨŋbɨ datno da yutnon kɨŋ
Ae Piŋkop bɨsit iyɨŋba nakyo kɨsi aŋpulugosak. Aŋakwan geni nak da gen kagakon yɨpmaŋakwan pasol pasol abɨŋ yɨpmaŋek Gen Bin Tagɨsi dakon gen pasɨlɨ yaŋ teŋteŋokeŋ.
